trans-unit.source: Provides field representations of the Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions for emission by the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator" /> class members (such as <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit(System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode)" />).
trans-unit.target: 提供 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 指令的欄位表示，以用於 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator" /> 類別成員 (例如 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit(System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode)" />) 的發出。

trans-unit.source: For a detailed description of the member opcodes, see the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition III: CIL Instruction Set" and "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics".
trans-unit.target: 如成員 opcode 的詳細說明，請參閱 Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) 文件，尤其是 < 磁碟分割 III: CIL 指令集 > 和 < 資料分割第二部分： 中繼資料定義和語意 >。

trans-unit.source: The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.
trans-unit.target: 您可以線上取得這份文件；請參閱 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和通用語言基礎結構標準](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)，以及 Ecma International 網站上的[標準 ECMA-335 - 通用語言基礎結構 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the construction of a dynamic method using <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator> to emit `OpCodes` into a <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範動態方法，使用的建構<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator>發出`OpCodes`到<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder>。

trans-unit.source: Adds two values and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.
trans-unit.target: 相加兩個值，並將結果推送至評估堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: add
trans-unit.target: 加入

trans-unit.source: Adds two numeric values, returning a new numeric value.
trans-unit.target: 將兩個數值，傳回新的數值。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: `value1` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value1` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `value1` is added to `value2`.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 和`value1`取出從堆疊。`value1`加入至`value2`。

trans-unit.source: The result is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 結果會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: Overflow is not detected for integer operations (for proper overflow handling, see <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Add_Ovf>).
trans-unit.target: 溢位未偵測到適用於整數作業 (如適當溢位處理，請參閱<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Add_Ovf>)。

trans-unit.source: Integer addition wraps, rather than saturates.
trans-unit.target: 整數加法包裝，而不是飽和。

trans-unit.source: For example, assuming 8-bit integers where `value1` is set to 255 and `value2` is set to 1, the wrapped result is 0 rather than 256.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設 8 位元整數其中`value1`設為 255 和`value2`設為 1，已包裝的結果會是 0，而不是 256。

trans-unit.source: Floating-point overflow returns `+inf` (`PositiveInfinity`) or `-inf` (`NegativeInfinity`).
trans-unit.target: 傳回浮點溢位`+inf`(`PositiveInfinity`) 或`-inf`(`NegativeInfinity`)。

trans-unit.source: The acceptable operand types and their corresponding result data type are listed in the table below.
trans-unit.target: 可接受的運算元類型和其對應的結果資料類型會在下表中列出。

trans-unit.source: If there is no entry for a particular type combination (for example, `int32` and `float`; `int32` and `int64`), it is an invalid Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) and generates an error.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有任何項目，針對特定類型組合 (例如，`int32`和`float`;`int32`和`int64`)，它是無效 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL)，並產生錯誤。

trans-unit.target: 運算元

trans-unit.target: value1 類型

trans-unit.source: value2 type
trans-unit.target: value2 類型

trans-unit.source: result type
trans-unit.target: 結果型別

trans-unit.source: Adds two integers, performs an overflow check, and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.
trans-unit.target: 相加兩個整數、執行溢位檢查，並將結果推送至評估堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: D6
trans-unit.target: D6

trans-unit.source: add.ovf
trans-unit.target: add.ovf

trans-unit.source: Adds two signed integer values with an overflow check.
trans-unit.target: 將兩個溢位檢查的帶正負號的整數值。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: `value1` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value1` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `value1` is added to `value2` with a check for overflow.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 和`value1`取出從堆疊。`value1`加入至`value2`溢位檢查。

trans-unit.source: The result is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 結果會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.OverflowException> is thrown if the result is not represented in the result type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.OverflowException> 如果結果不會出現在結果型別，會擲回。

trans-unit.source: You can perform this operation on signed integers.
trans-unit.target: 您可以執行這項作業帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: For floating-point values, use <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Add>.
trans-unit.target: 浮點值，使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Add>。

trans-unit.source: The acceptable operand types and their corresponding result data type are listed in the table below.
trans-unit.target: 可接受的運算元類型和其對應的結果資料類型會在下表中列出。

trans-unit.source: If there is no entry for a particular type combination (for example, `int32` and `float`; `int32` and `int64`), it is an invalid Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instruction and generates an error.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有任何項目，針對特定類型組合 (例如，`int32`和`float`;`int32`和`int64`)，它是無效的 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 指示並產生錯誤。

trans-unit.target: 運算元

trans-unit.target: value1 類型

trans-unit.target: value2 類型

trans-unit.target: 結果型別

trans-unit.target: add.ovf.un

trans-unit.source: Adds two unsigned integer values with an overflow check.
trans-unit.target: 將兩個不帶正負號的整數值有溢位檢查。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: `value1` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value1` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `value1` is added to `value2` with a check for overflow.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 和`value1`取出從堆疊。`value1`加入至`value2`溢位檢查。

trans-unit.source: The result is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 結果會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.OverflowException> is thrown if the result is not represented in the result type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.OverflowException> 如果結果不會出現在結果型別，會擲回。

trans-unit.source: You can perform this operation on signed integers.
trans-unit.target: 您可以執行這項作業帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: For floating-point values, use <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Add>.
trans-unit.target: 浮點值，使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Add>。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `add.ovf.un` opcode:

trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.source: Computes the bitwise AND of two values and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.
trans-unit.target: 計算兩個值的位元 AND 運算，並將結果推送至評估堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Instruction
trans-unit.target: 指令

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: 5F
trans-unit.target: 5F

trans-unit.source: and
trans-unit.target: 和

trans-unit.source: Determines the bitwise AND of two integer values.
trans-unit.target: 判斷兩個整數值的位元 AND。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: `value1` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value1` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value1` and `value2` are popped from the stack; the bitwise AND of the two values is computed.
trans-unit.target: `value1` 和`value2`會從堆疊; 推出計算兩個值的位元 AND。

trans-unit.source: The result is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 結果會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The `and` instruction computes the bitwise AND of the top two values on the stack and leaves the result on the stack.
trans-unit.target: `and`指令會在堆疊上的前兩個值的位元 AND 的計算，並將結果留在堆疊上。

trans-unit.source: `And` is an integer-specific operation.
trans-unit.target: `And` 是整數特定作業。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `and` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`and`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.source: Returns an unmanaged pointer to the argument list of the current method.
trans-unit.target: 將 Unmanaged 指標傳回目前方法的引數清單。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: FE 00
trans-unit.target: FE 00

trans-unit.source: arglist
trans-unit.target: 引數清單

trans-unit.source: Returns an argument list handle for the current method.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前方法的引數清單控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: No evaluation stack behaviors are performed by this operation.
trans-unit.target: 沒有評估堆疊行為都是透過這項作業。

trans-unit.source: The `arglist` instruction returns an opaque handle (an unmanaged pointer, of type `native int`) that represents the argument list of the current method.
trans-unit.target: `arglist`指令傳回的不透明控制代碼 (類型的 unmanaged 的指標`native int`)，代表目前方法的引數清單。

trans-unit.source: This handle is valid only during the lifetime of the current method.
trans-unit.target: 這個控制代碼只有在目前方法的存留期間是有效的。

trans-unit.source: You can, however, pass the handle to other methods as long as the current method is on the thread of control.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您可以給其他方法傳遞控制代碼，只要是控制項的執行緒上的目前的方法。

trans-unit.source: You can only execute the `arglist` instruction within a method that takes a variable number of arguments.
trans-unit.target: 您只能執行`arglist`接受可變數目的引數的方法中的指示。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `arglist` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`arglist`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.source: Transfers control to a target instruction if two values are equal.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個值相等，則將控制權傳輸至目標指令。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: beq `target`
trans-unit.target: beq `target`

trans-unit.source: Branch to the target instruction at offset `target` if the two values are equal.
trans-unit.target: 分支至目標指令，位移`target`兩個值是否相等。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: `value1` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value1` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; if `value1` is equal to `value2`, the branch operation is performed.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 和`value1`取出從堆疊; 如果`value1`等於`value2`，執行分支作業。

trans-unit.source: The `beq` instruction transfers control to the specified target instruction if `value1` is equal to `value2`.
trans-unit.target: `beq`指令將控制權傳輸至指定的目標指令如果`value1`等於`value2`。

trans-unit.source: The effect is the same as performing a `ceq` instruction followed by a `brtrue` branch to the specific target instruction.
trans-unit.target: 其效果等同於執行`ceq`指令，後面跟著`brtrue`分支到特定的目標指令。

trans-unit.source: The target instruction is represented as a 4-byte signed offset from the beginning of the instruction following the current instruction.
trans-unit.target: 目標指令以 4 位元組帶正負號的位移，從緊跟在目前指令的開頭。

trans-unit.source: The acceptable operand types are encapsulated below:
trans-unit.target: 封裝可接受的運算元類型如下：

trans-unit.source: If the target instruction has one or more prefix codes, control can only be transferred to the first of these prefixes.
trans-unit.target: 目標指令有一或多個前置詞程式碼，如果控制項只傳送到第一個前置詞。

trans-unit.source: Control transfers into and out of `try`, `catch`, `filter`, and `finally` blocks cannot be performed by this instruction (such transfers are severely restricted and must use the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Leave> instruction instead).
trans-unit.target: 控制傳入和傳出傳輸`try`， `catch`， `filter`，和`finally`區塊無法執行這個指令 (這類傳輸有嚴格限制，而且必須使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Leave>指令改為)。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `beq` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`beq`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Label)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode，標籤）

trans-unit.source: Transfers control to a target instruction (short form) if two values are equal.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個值相等，則將控制權傳輸至目標指令 (簡短形式)。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: 2E < `int8` >
trans-unit.target: 2E < `int8` >

trans-unit.source: beq.s `target`
trans-unit.target: 後 `target`

trans-unit.source: Branch to the target instruction at offset `target` if equal, short form
trans-unit.target: 分支至目標指令，位移`target`如果相等的簡短形式

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: `value1` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value1` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; if `value1` is equal to `value2`, the branch operation is performed.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 和`value1`取出從堆疊; 如果`value1`等於`value2`，執行分支作業。

trans-unit.source: The `beq.s` instruction transfers control to the specified target instruction if `value1` is equal to `value2`.
trans-unit.target: `beq.s`指令將控制權傳輸至指定的目標指令如果`value1`等於`value2`。

trans-unit.source: The effect is the same as performing a `ceq` instruction followed by a `brtrue` branch to the specific target instruction.
trans-unit.target: 其效果等同於執行`ceq`指令，後面跟著`brtrue`分支到特定的目標指令。

trans-unit.source: The target instruction is represented as a 1-byte signed offset from the beginning of the instruction following the current instruction.
trans-unit.target: 目標指令被以 1 個位元組帶正負號的位移，從緊跟在目前指令的開頭。

trans-unit.source: The acceptable operand types are encapsulated below:
trans-unit.target: 封裝可接受的運算元類型如下：

trans-unit.source: If the target instruction has one or more prefix codes, control can only be transferred to the first of these prefixes.
trans-unit.target: 目標指令有一或多個前置詞程式碼，如果控制項只傳送到第一個前置詞。

trans-unit.source: Control transfers into and out of `try`, `catch`, `filter`, and `finally` blocks cannot be performed by this instruction (such transfers are severely restricted and must use the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Leave> instruction instead).
trans-unit.target: 控制傳入和傳出傳輸`try`， `catch`， `filter`，和`finally`區塊無法執行這個指令 (這類傳輸有嚴格限制，而且必須使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Leave>指令改為)。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `beq.s` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`beq.s`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Label)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode，標籤）

trans-unit.source: Transfers control to a target instruction if the first value is greater than or equal to the second value.
trans-unit.target: 如果第一個值大於或等於第二個值，則將控制權傳輸至目標指令。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:

trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: bge `target`
trans-unit.target: bge `target`

trans-unit.source: Branch to the target instruction at the specified offset if the first value is greater than or equal to the second value.
trans-unit.target: 分支到指定之位移的第一個值是否大於或等於第二個值的目標指令。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: `value1` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value1` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; if `value1` is greater than or equal to `value2`, the branch operation is performed.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 和`value1`取出從堆疊; 如果`value1`大於或等於`value2`，執行分支作業。

trans-unit.source: The `bge` instruction transfers control to the specified target instruction if `value1` is greater than or equal to `value2`.
trans-unit.target: `bge`指令將控制權傳輸至指定的目標指令如果`value1`大於或等於`value2`。

trans-unit.source: The effect is identical to performing a `clt.un` instruction followed by a `brfalse` branch to the specific target instruction.
trans-unit.target: 其效果等同於執行`clt.un`指令，後面跟著`brfalse`分支到特定的目標指令。

trans-unit.source: The target instruction is represented as a 4-byte signed offset from the beginning of the instruction following the current instruction.
trans-unit.target: 目標指令以 4 位元組帶正負號的位移，從緊跟在目前指令的開頭。

trans-unit.source: If the target instruction has one or more prefix codes, control can only be transferred to the first of these prefixes.
trans-unit.target: 目標指令有一或多個前置詞程式碼，如果控制項只傳送到第一個前置詞。

trans-unit.source: Control transfers into and out of `try`, `catch`, `filter`, and `finally` blocks cannot be performed by this instruction.
trans-unit.target: 控制傳入和傳出傳輸`try`， `catch`， `filter`，和`finally`區塊無法執行這個指令。

trans-unit.target: 目標指令有一或多個前置詞程式碼，如果控制項只傳送到第一個前置詞。

trans-unit.source: Control transfers into and out of `try`, `catch`, `filter`, and `finally` blocks cannot be performed by this instruction.
trans-unit.target: 控制傳入和傳出傳輸`try`， `catch`， `filter`，和`finally`區塊無法執行這個指令。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `bgt.s` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`bgt.s`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Label)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode，標籤）

trans-unit.source: Transfers control to a target instruction if the first value is greater than the second value, when comparing unsigned integer values or unordered float values.
trans-unit.target: 當比較不帶正負號的整數值或未按順序的浮點值時，如果第一個值大於第二個值，則將控制權傳輸至目標指令。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: bgt.un `target`
trans-unit.target: bgt.un `target`

trans-unit.source: Branch to the target instruction at the specified offset if the first value is greater than the second value (unsigned values).
trans-unit.target: 分支到指定之位移的第一個值是否大於第二個值 （不帶正負號值） 的目標指令。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: `value1` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value1` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; if `value1` is greater than `value2`, the branch operation is performed.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 和`value1`取出從堆疊; 如果`value1`大於`value2`，執行分支作業。

trans-unit.source: The `bgt.un` instruction transfers control to the specified target instruction if `value1` is greater than `value2`, when compared using unsigned integer or unordered float values.
trans-unit.target: `bgt.un`指令將控制權傳輸至指定的目標指令如果`value1`大於`value2`，當使用不帶正負號的整數或未按順序的浮點值進行比較。

trans-unit.source: The effect is identical to performing a `cgt.un` instruction followed by a `brtrue` branch to the specific target instruction.
trans-unit.target: 其效果等同於執行`cgt.un`指令，後面跟著`brtrue`分支到特定的目標指令。

trans-unit.source: The target instruction is represented as a 4-byte signed offset from the beginning of the instruction following the current instruction.
trans-unit.target: 目標指令以 4 位元組帶正負號的位移，從緊跟在目前指令的開頭。

trans-unit.source: If the target instruction has one or more prefix codes, control can only be transferred to the first of these prefixes.
trans-unit.target: 目標指令有一或多個前置詞程式碼，如果控制項只傳送到第一個前置詞。

trans-unit.source: Control transfers into and out of `try`, `catch`, `filter`, and `finally` blocks cannot be performed by this instruction.
trans-unit.target: 控制傳入和傳出傳輸`try`， `catch`， `filter`，和`finally`區塊無法執行這個指令。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `bgt.un` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`bgt.un`作業碼：

trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode，標籤）

trans-unit.source: Transfers control to a target instruction if the first value is less than or equal to the second value.
trans-unit.target: 如果第一個值小於或等於第二個值，則將控制權傳輸至目標指令。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:

trans-unit.target: b `target`

trans-unit.source: Branch to the target instruction at the specified offset if the first value is less than or equal to the second value.
trans-unit.target: 分支到指定之位移的第一個值是否小於或等於第二個值的目標指令。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: `value1` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value1` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; if `value1` is less than or equal to `value2`, the branch operation is performed.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 和`value1`取出從堆疊; 如果`value1`小於或等於`value2`，執行分支作業。

trans-unit.source: The `ble` instruction transfers control to the specified target instruction if `value1` is less than or equal to `value2`.
trans-unit.target: `ble`指令將控制權傳輸至指定的目標指令如果`value1`小於或等於`value2`。

trans-unit.source: The effect is identical to performing a `cgt` instruction (`cgt.un` for floats) followed by a `brfalse` branch to the specific target instruction.

trans-unit.target: 目標指令有一或多個前置詞程式碼，如果控制項只傳送到第一個前置詞。

trans-unit.source: Control transfers into and out of `try`, `catch`, `filter`, and `finally` blocks cannot be performed by this instruction.
trans-unit.target: 控制傳入和傳出傳輸`try`， `catch`， `filter`，和`finally`區塊無法執行這個指令。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: `value1` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value1` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; if `value1` is less than `value2`, the branch operation is performed.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 和`value1`取出從堆疊; 如果`value1`是小於`value2`，執行分支作業。

trans-unit.source: The `blt` instruction transfers control to the specified target instruction if `value1` is less than or equal to `value2`.
trans-unit.target: `blt`指令將控制權傳輸至指定的目標指令如果`value1`小於或等於`value2`。

trans-unit.source: The effect is identical to performing a `clt` instruction followed by a `brtrue` branch to the specific target instruction.
trans-unit.target: 其效果等同於執行`clt`指令，後面跟著`brtrue`分支到特定的目標指令。

trans-unit.source: The target instruction is represented as a 4-byte signed offset from the beginning of the instruction following the current instruction.
trans-unit.target: 目標指令以 4 位元組帶正負號的位移，從緊跟在目前指令的開頭。

trans-unit.source: If the target instruction has one or more prefix codes, control can only be transferred to the first of these prefixes.
trans-unit.target: 目標指令有一或多個前置詞程式碼，如果控制項只傳送到第一個前置詞。

trans-unit.source: Control transfers into and out of `try`, `catch`, `filter`, and `finally` blocks cannot be performed by this instruction.
trans-unit.target: 控制傳入和傳出傳輸`try`， `catch`， `filter`，和`finally`區塊無法執行這個指令。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `blt` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`blt`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Label)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode，標籤）

trans-unit.source: Transfers control to a target instruction (short form) if the first value is less than the second value.
trans-unit.target: 如果第一個值小於第二個值，則將控制權傳輸至目標指令 (簡短形式)。

trans-unit.target: 若要在指定的位移的第一個值是否小於第二個值，簡短形式的目標指令的分支。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: `value1` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value1` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; if `value1` is less than `value2`, the branch operation is performed.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 和`value1`取出從堆疊; 如果`value1`是小於`value2`，執行分支作業。

trans-unit.source: The `blt.s` instruction transfers control to the specified target instruction if `value1` is less than `value2`.
trans-unit.target: `blt.s`指令將控制權傳輸至指定的目標指令如果`value1`是小於`value2`。

trans-unit.source: The effect is identical to performing a `clt` instruction followed by a `brtrue` branch to the specific target instruction.
trans-unit.target: 其效果等同於執行`clt`指令，後面跟著`brtrue`分支到特定的目標指令。

trans-unit.source: The target instruction is represented as a 1-byte signed offset from the beginning of the instruction following the current instruction.
trans-unit.target: 目標指令被以 1 個位元組帶正負號的位移，從緊跟在目前指令的開頭。

trans-unit.source: If the target instruction has one or more prefix codes, control can only be transferred to the first of these prefixes.
trans-unit.target: 目標指令有一或多個前置詞程式碼，如果控制項只傳送到第一個前置詞。

trans-unit.source: Control transfers into and out of `try`, `catch`, `filter`, and `finally` blocks cannot be performed by this instruction.
trans-unit.target: 控制傳入和傳出傳輸`try`， `catch`， `filter`，和`finally`區塊無法執行這個指令。

trans-unit.source: Converts a value type to an object reference (type <see langword="O" />).
trans-unit.target: 將實值型別 (Value Type) 轉換成物件參考 (型別 <see langword="O" />)。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: box `valTypeToken`
trans-unit.target: box `valTypeToken`

trans-unit.source: Convert a value type (of the type specified in `valTypeToken`) to a true object reference.
trans-unit.target: 轉換實值類型 (在指定之型別的`valTypeToken`) 為真正的物件參考。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: A value type is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 實值類型會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The value type is popped from the stack; the `box` operation is performed.
trans-unit.target: 從堆疊，則會彈出實值型別，`box`執行作業。

trans-unit.source: An object reference to the resulting "boxed" value type is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 產生的 「 boxed"的值類型的物件參考被推入堆疊。

trans-unit.source: A value type has two separate representations within the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI):
trans-unit.target: 實值類型有兩種不同的表示法中通用語言基礎結構 (CLI):

trans-unit.source: A 'raw' form used when a value type is embedded within another object or on the stack.
trans-unit.target: 「 原始 」 形式，當實值類型內嵌在另一個物件，或在堆疊上時。

trans-unit.source: A 'boxed' form, where the data in the value type is wrapped (boxed) into an object so it can exist as an independent entity.
trans-unit.target: 實值型別中的資料都包裝 （進行 boxed 處理） 成物件，它可以做為獨立的實體 'boxed' 格式。

trans-unit.source: The `box` instruction converts the 'raw' (unboxed) value type into an object reference (type `O`).
trans-unit.target: `box`指令會將 「 原始 」 (unboxed) 的值類型轉換成物件參考 (類型`O`)。

trans-unit.source: This is accomplished by creating a new object and copying the data from the value type into the newly allocated object.
trans-unit.target: 這會透過建立新物件，並將資料複製到新配置的物件的值型別。

trans-unit.source: `valTypeToken` is a metadata token indicating the type of the value type on the stack.
trans-unit.target: `valTypeToken` 這中繼資料語彙基元表示在堆疊上之值型別的型別。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.OutOfMemoryException> is thrown if there is insufficient memory to satisfy the request.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.OutOfMemoryException> 如果沒有記憶體不足，無法滿足要求，會擲回。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.TypeLoadException> is thrown if the class cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TypeLoadException> 如果找不到類別，會擲回。

trans-unit.source: This is typically detected when Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) is converted to native code, rather than at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 這通常是偵測到 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 轉換為原生程式碼，而不是在執行階段時。

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

trans-unit.source: Unconditionally transfers control to a target instruction.
trans-unit.target: 無條件地將控制權傳輸至目標指令。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: br `target`
trans-unit.target: br `target`

trans-unit.source: Branches to a target instruction at the specified offset.
trans-unit.target: 分支至目標指令指定的位移。

trans-unit.source: No evaluation stack behaviors are performed by this operation.
trans-unit.target: 沒有評估堆疊行為都是透過這項作業。

trans-unit.source: The `br` instruction unconditionally transfers control to a target instruction.
trans-unit.target: `br`指令無條件地將控制權傳輸至目標指令。

trans-unit.source: The target instruction is represented as a 4-byte signed offset from the beginning of the instruction following the current instruction.
trans-unit.target: 目標指令以 4 位元組帶正負號的位移，從緊跟在目前指令的開頭。

trans-unit.source: If the target instruction has one or more prefix codes, control can only be transferred to the first of these prefixes.
trans-unit.target: 目標指令有一或多個前置詞程式碼，如果控制項只傳送到第一個前置詞。

trans-unit.source: Control transfers into and out of `try`, `catch`, `filter`, and `finally` blocks cannot be performed by this instruction.
trans-unit.target: 控制傳入和傳出傳輸`try`， `catch`， `filter`，和`finally`區塊無法執行這個指令。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `br` opcode:

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Label)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode，標籤）

trans-unit.source: Signals the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) to inform the debugger that a break point has been tripped.
trans-unit.target: 以訊號指示 Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) 向偵錯工具告知已經過中斷點。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: break
trans-unit.target: break

trans-unit.source: inform a debugger that a breakpoint has been reached.
trans-unit.target: 通知偵錯工具已到達中斷點。

trans-unit.source: No evaluation stack behaviors are performed by this operation.
trans-unit.target: 沒有評估堆疊行為都是透過這項作業。

trans-unit.source: The `break` instruction is for debugging support.
trans-unit.target: `break`指示適用於偵錯支援。

trans-unit.source: It signals the CLI to inform the debugger that a break point has been tripped.
trans-unit.target: 它會通知來通知偵錯工具中斷點已跳脫 CLI。

trans-unit.source: It has no other effect on the interpreter state.
trans-unit.target: 它有沒有其他影響解譯器的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The `break` instruction has the smallest possible instruction size enabling code patching with a break point and generating minimal disturbance to the surrounding code.
trans-unit.target: `break`指令具有最小可能的指令大小可讓程式碼中斷點修補和產生周圍的程式碼所造成的最小影響。

trans-unit.source: The `break` instruction can trap to a debugger, do nothing, or raise a security exception.
trans-unit.target: `break`指令落入偵錯工具，不執行任何動作，或引發安全性例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The exact behavior is implementation-defined.
trans-unit.target: 確切的行為是由實作定義。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `break` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`break`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.source: Transfers control to a target instruction if <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="false" />, a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic), or zero.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="false" />、Null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />) 或零，則將控制權傳輸至目標指令。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: brfalse `target`
trans-unit.target: brfalse `target`

trans-unit.source: brnull `target`
trans-unit.target: brnull `target`

trans-unit.source: brzero `target`
trans-unit.target: brzero `target`

trans-unit.source: Branches to a target instruction at the specified offset if `false`.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的位移 if 的目標指令的分支`false`。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: `value` is pushed onto the stack by a previous operation.
trans-unit.target: `value` 為推送至堆疊上前一項作業。

trans-unit.source: `value` is popped from the stack; if `value` is `false`, branch to `target`.
trans-unit.target: `value` 從堆疊; 推出如果`value`是`false`，分支到`target`。

trans-unit.source: The `brfalse` instruction (and its aliases `brnull` and `brzero`) transfers control to the specified target instruction if `value` (of type `int32`, `int64`, object reference `O`, managed pointer `&`, transient pointer `*`, `native int`) is zero (`false`).
trans-unit.target: `brfalse`指令 (和其別名`brnull`和`brzero`) 將控制權傳輸至指定的目標指令，如果`value`(型別`int32`， `int64`，物件參考`O`、 managed 指標`&`，暫時性指標`*`， `native int`) 為零 (`false`)。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is non-zero (`true`) execution continues at the next instruction.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`為非零 (`true`) 繼續執行下一個指令。

trans-unit.source: The target instruction is represented as a 4-byte signed offset from the beginning of the instruction following the current instruction.
trans-unit.target: 目標指令以 4 位元組帶正負號的位移，從緊跟在目前指令的開頭。

trans-unit.source: If the target instruction has one or more prefix codes, control can only be transferred to the first of these prefixes.
trans-unit.target: 目標指令有一或多個前置詞程式碼，如果控制項只傳送到第一個前置詞。

trans-unit.source: Control transfers into and out of `try`, `catch`, `filter`, and `finally` blocks cannot be performed by this instruction.
trans-unit.target: 控制傳入和傳出傳輸`try`， `catch`， `filter`，和`finally`區塊無法執行這個指令。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `brfalse` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`brfalse`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Label)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode，標籤）

trans-unit.target: brtrue `target`

trans-unit.source: brinst `target`
trans-unit.target: brinst `target`

trans-unit.source: Branch to a target instruction at the specified offset if non-zero (`true`).
trans-unit.target: 如果不是零，分支至目標指令指定的位移 (`true`)。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: `value` is pushed onto the stack by a previous operation.
trans-unit.target: `value` 為推送至堆疊上前一項作業。

trans-unit.source: `value` is popped from the stack; if `value` is `true`, branch to `target`.
trans-unit.target: `value` 從堆疊; 推出如果`value`是`true`，分支到`target`。

trans-unit.source: The `brtrue` instruction transfers control to the specified target instruction if `value` (type `native int`) is nonzero (`true`).
trans-unit.target: `brtrue`指令將控制權傳輸至指定的目標指令如果`value`(型別`native int`) 為非零值 (`true`)。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is zero (`false`) execution continues at the next instruction.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`為零 (`false`) 繼續執行下一個指令。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is an object reference (type `O`) then `brinst` (an alias for `brtrue`) transfers control if it represents an instance of an object (for example, if it is not the null object reference; see <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Ldnull>).
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`都是物件參考 (類型`O`) 然後`brinst`(別名`brtrue`) 將控制項傳送，如果它代表物件的執行個體 (例如，如果不是 null 物件的參考; 請參閱<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Ldnull>)。

trans-unit.source: The target instruction is represented as a 4-byte signed offset from the beginning of the instruction following the current instruction.
trans-unit.target: 目標指令以 4 位元組帶正負號的位移，從緊跟在目前指令的開頭。

trans-unit.source: If the target instruction has one or more prefix codes, control can only be transferred to the first of these prefixes.
trans-unit.target: 目標指令有一或多個前置詞程式碼，如果控制項只傳送到第一個前置詞。

trans-unit.source: Calls the method indicated by the passed method descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫傳遞的方法描述項所指示的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: call `methodDesc`
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 `methodDesc`

trans-unit.source: Call the method described by `methodDesc`.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫所描述的方法`methodDesc`。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: Method arguments `arg1` through `argN` are pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 方法引數`arg1`透過`argN`推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: Method arguments `arg1` through `argN` are popped from the stack; the method call is performed with these arguments and control is transferred to the method referred to by the method descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 方法引數`arg1`透過`argN`會從堆疊; 推出方法呼叫會使用這些引數來執行，控制權會轉移到方法描述元所參考的方法。

trans-unit.source: When complete, a return value is generated by the callee method and sent to the caller.
trans-unit.target: 完成時，傳回值是由被呼叫端方法所產生並傳送至呼叫端。

trans-unit.source: The return value is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The `call` instruction calls the method indicated by the method descriptor passed with the instruction.
trans-unit.target: `call`指令呼叫指令與傳遞方法描述項所指示的方法。

trans-unit.source: The method descriptor is a metadata token that indicates the method to call and the number, type, and order of the arguments that have been placed on the stack to be passed to that method as well as the calling convention to be used.
trans-unit.target: 方法描述元是中繼資料語彙基元，指出呼叫的數目、 類型及放置在堆疊傳遞至該方法，以及要使用的呼叫慣例，引數順序的方法。

trans-unit.source: The `call` instruction can be immediately preceded by a `tail` (<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Tailcall>) prefix instruction to specify that the current method state should be released before transferring control.
trans-unit.target: `call`指示可以立即加`tail`(<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Tailcall>) 前置詞來指定應在之前將控制權傳輸釋出目前的方法狀態的指令。

trans-unit.source: If the call transfers control to a method of higher trust than the origin method, the stack frame is not released.
trans-unit.target: 如果呼叫會將控制權傳輸至較高的信任，比原始方法的方法，才會釋放堆疊框架。

trans-unit.source: Instead, the execution continues silently as if the `tail` had not been supplied.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，繼續執行無訊息方式如同`tail`尚未提供。

trans-unit.source: The metadata token carries sufficient information to determine whether the call is to a static method, an instance method, a virtual method, or a global function.
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料語彙基元會有足夠的資訊來判斷是否呼叫的是靜態方法、 執行個體方法，虛擬方法或全域函式。

trans-unit.source: In all of these cases the destination address is determined entirely from the method descriptor (contrast this with the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Callvirt> instruction for calling virtual methods, where the destination address also depends upon the runtime type of the instance reference pushed before the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Callvirt>).
trans-unit.target: 在這些情況下的所有目的地位址由都決定完全從方法描述元 (與<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Callvirt>指令呼叫虛擬方法，其中的目的地位址也會根據執行個體的執行階段類型參考推入之前<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Callvirt>)。

trans-unit.source: The arguments are placed on the stack in left-to-right order.
trans-unit.target: 引數會放置在堆疊上，在左到右的順序。

trans-unit.source: That is, the first argument is computed and placed on the stack, then the second argument, then the third, until all necessary arguments are atop the stack in descending order.
trans-unit.target: 也就是第一個引數是計算並放置在堆疊中，第二個引數，然後第三個，直到所有必要的引數以遞減順序堆疊的頂端。

trans-unit.source: There are three important special cases:
trans-unit.target: 有三個重要的特殊情況：

trans-unit.source: Calls to an instance (or virtual) method must push that instance reference before any of the user-visible arguments.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫執行個體 （或虛擬） 方法必須將推入執行個體參考之前的任何使用者可見的引數。

trans-unit.source: The instance reference must not be a null reference.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體參考不能為 null 參考。

trans-unit.source: The signature carried in the metadata does not contain an entry in the parameter list for the `this` pointer; instead, it uses a bit to indicate whether the method requires passing the `this` pointer.
trans-unit.target: 執行中繼資料中的簽章不包含在參數清單中的項目`this`指標; 相反地，它使用位元來表示方法是否必須傳遞`this`指標。

trans-unit.source: It is valid to call a virtual method using `call` (rather than `callvirt`); this indicates that the method is to be resolved using the class specified by method rather than as specified dynamically from the object being invoked.
trans-unit.target: 它是有效的虛擬方法，使用呼叫`call`(而非`callvirt`); 這表示，方法是使用指定的方法，而不是以動態方式叫用的物件中指定的類別來解析。

trans-unit.source: Note that a delegate's `Invoke` method can be called with either the `call` or `callvirt` instruction.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，委派的`Invoke`方法可以呼叫其中一種`call`或`callvirt`指令。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> may be thrown if system security does not grant the caller access to the called method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> 可能會擲回，如果系統安全性不授與被呼叫的方法的呼叫端存取。

trans-unit.source: The security check may occur when the Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions are converted to native code rather than at run time.
trans-unit.target: 原生程式碼，而不是在執行階段轉換的 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 指示時，可能會發生安全性檢查。

trans-unit.source: When calling methods of System.Object on value types, consider using the `constrained` prefix with the `callvirt` instruction instead of emitting a `call` instruction.
trans-unit.target: 當呼叫的 System.Object 方法，實值型別，請考慮使用`constrained`加上前置詞`callvirt`指令，而不是發出`call`指令。

trans-unit.source: This removes the need to emit different IL depending on whether or not the value type overrides the method, avoiding a potential versioning problem.
trans-unit.target: 這會移除需要發出避免潛在的版本控制問題實值型別會覆寫方法，根據不同的 IL。

trans-unit.source: Consider using the `constrained` prefix when invoking interface methods on value types, since the value type method implementing the interface method can be changed using a `MethodImpl`.
trans-unit.target: 請考慮使用`constrained`可以使用變更時叫用介面方法實值型別，因為實作介面方法的值類型方法的前置詞`MethodImpl`。

trans-unit.source: These issues are described in more detail in the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Constrained> opcode.
trans-unit.target: 更詳細地描述這些問題<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Constrained>opcode。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overloads can use the `call` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載可以使用`call`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, MethodInfo)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode，MethodInfo）

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.EmitCall(OpCode, MethodInfo, Type[])
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.EmitCall (OpCode，MethodInfo Type[])

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.EmitCall%2A> method is provided for `varargs` calls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.EmitCall%2A>方法會提供給`varargs`呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method for normal calls.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>一般呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: Calls the method indicated on the evaluation stack (as a pointer to an entry point) with arguments described by a calling convention.
trans-unit.target: 以呼叫慣例所描述的引數，呼叫在評估堆疊上指示的方法 (做為進入點的指標)。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: calli `callSiteDescr`
trans-unit.target: calli `callSiteDescr`

trans-unit.source: Calls the method pointed to with arguments described by the calling convention.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫的呼叫慣例所描述的引數指向的方法。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: Method arguments `arg1` through `argN` are pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 方法引數`arg1`透過`argN`推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The method entry pointer is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 方法進入點指標會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: Method arguments `arg1` through `argN` and the method entry pointer are popped from the stack; the call to the method is performed.
trans-unit.target: 方法引數`arg1`透過`argN`方法進入點指標會從堆疊推出之後，執行方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: When complete, a return value is generated by the callee method and sent to the caller.
trans-unit.target: 完成時，傳回值是由被呼叫端方法所產生並傳送至呼叫端。

trans-unit.source: The return value is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The `calli` instruction calls the method entry pointer with the arguments `arg1` through `argN`.
trans-unit.target: `calli`指令呼叫方法的輸入指標，以引數`arg1`透過`argN`。

trans-unit.source: The types of these arguments are described by the specific calling convention (`callSiteDesc`).
trans-unit.target: 這些引數類型會描述特定的呼叫慣例 (`callSiteDesc`)。

trans-unit.source: The `calli` instruction may be immediately preceded by a `tail` prefix (<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Tailcall>) to specify that the current method state should be released before transferring control.
trans-unit.target: `calli`指示可能立即加`tail`前置詞 (<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Tailcall>) 以指定目前的方法狀態的應該釋放之前將控制權傳輸。

trans-unit.source: If the call would transfer control to a method of higher trust than the origin method the stack frame will not be released; instead, the execution will continue silently as if the `tail` had not been supplied.
trans-unit.target: 如果呼叫，就會傳輸將不會釋放控制項的較高的信任，比原始方法的堆疊框架的方法;相反地，將會繼續執行無訊息方式如同`tail`尚未提供。

trans-unit.source: The method entry pointer is assumed to be a specific pointer to native code (of the target machine) that can be legitimately called with the arguments described by the calling convention (a metadata token for a stand-alone signature).
trans-unit.target: 方法的項目指標會假設為特定原生程式碼 （的目標電腦） 可以合法呼叫 （獨立簽章的中繼資料語彙基元） 的呼叫慣例所描述的引數的指標。

trans-unit.source: Such a pointer can be created using the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Ldftn> or <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Ldvirtftn> instructions, or passed in from native code.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用建立這類指標<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Ldftn>或<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Ldvirtftn>指示，或從原生程式碼中傳遞。

trans-unit.source: The calling convention is not checked dynamically, so code that uses a `calli` instruction does not work correctly if the destination does not actually use the specified calling convention.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫慣例，不會檢查動態，因此程式碼，它使用`calli`指令無法正常運作如果目的地不會實際使用指定的呼叫慣例。

trans-unit.source: The arguments are placed on the stack in left-to-right order.
trans-unit.target: 引數會放置在堆疊上，在左到右的順序。

trans-unit.source: That is, the first argument is computed and placed on the stack, then the second argument, then the third, until all necessary arguments are atop the stack in descending order.
trans-unit.target: 也就是第一個引數是計算並放置在堆疊中，第二個引數，然後第三個，直到所有必要的引數以遞減順序堆疊的頂端。

trans-unit.source: The argument-building code sequence for an instance or virtual method must push that instance reference (which must not be a null reference) before any of the user-visible arguments.
trans-unit.target: 在執行個體或虛擬方法的引數建置程式碼序列必須將該執行個體參考 （即不得為 null 參考） 推入之前的任何使用者可見的引數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> may be thrown if the system security does not grant the caller access to the called method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> 可能會擲回，如果系統安全性不授與被呼叫的方法的呼叫端存取。

trans-unit.source: The security check can occur when the Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions are converted to native code rather than at runtime.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 指示會轉換為原生程式碼，而不是在執行階段，就會發生安全性檢查。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.EmitCalli%2A> methods can be used to perform a `calli` instruction on the stack.
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.EmitCalli%2A>方法可以用來執行`calli`堆疊上的指示。

trans-unit.source: Note that `calli` should be called through the below methods rather than using the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> class to place the instruction directly on the stack.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，`calli`應該透過呼叫方法，而不是使用以下<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>類別，以指示將直接放在堆疊。

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.EmitCalli(Opcode, CallingConventions, Type, Type[], Type[]) for calls using a managed calling convention.
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.EmitCalli (Opcode、 CallingConventions、 型別，Type []，Type[]) 呼叫使用 managed 呼叫慣例。

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.EmitCalli(Opcode, CallingConvention, Type, Type[]) for calls using an unmanaged calling convention.
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.EmitCalli (Opcode，CallingConvention，型別，Type[]) 呼叫使用 unmanaged 呼叫慣例。

trans-unit.source: Calls a late-bound method on an object, pushing the return value onto the evaluation stack.
trans-unit.target: 在物件上呼叫晚期繫結方法，將傳回值推送至評估堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: callvirt `method`
trans-unit.target: callvirt `method`

trans-unit.source: Calls a specific method associated with `obj`.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫相關聯的特定方法`obj`。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: An object reference `obj` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 物件參考`obj`推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: Method arguments `arg1` through `argN` are pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 方法引數`arg1`透過`argN`推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: Method arguments `arg1` through `argN` and the object reference `obj` are popped from the stack; the method call is performed with these arguments and control is transferred to the method in `obj` referred to by the method metadata token.
trans-unit.target: 方法引數`arg1`透過`argN`和物件參考`obj`會從堆疊; 推出方法呼叫會使用這些引數來執行，控制權會轉移到中的方法`obj`方法參考中繼資料語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: When complete, a return value is generated by the callee method and sent to the caller.
trans-unit.target: 完成時，傳回值是由被呼叫端方法所產生並傳送至呼叫端。

trans-unit.source: The return value is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The `callvirt` instruction calls a late-bound method on an object.
trans-unit.target: `callvirt`指令的物件上呼叫晚期繫結方法。

trans-unit.source: That is, the method is chosen based on the runtime type of `obj` rather than the compile-time class visible in the method pointer.
trans-unit.target: 亦即，方法將根據選擇的執行階段類型`obj`而不是編譯時間類別顯示在方法指標。

trans-unit.source: `Callvirt` can be used to call both virtual and instance methods.
trans-unit.target: `Callvirt` 可用虛擬呼叫和執行個體方法。

trans-unit.source: The `callvirt` instruction may be immediately preceded by a `tail` (<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Tailcall>) prefix to specify that the current stack frame should be released before transferring control.
trans-unit.target: `callvirt`指示可能立即加`tail`(<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Tailcall>) 來指定應該釋放目前的堆疊框架，才能將控制權傳輸的前置詞。

trans-unit.source: If the call would transfer control to a method of higher trust than the original method the stack frame will not be released.
trans-unit.target: 如果呼叫，就會傳輸將不會釋放控制項的較高的信任，比原始方法的堆疊框架的方法。

trans-unit.source: The method metadata token provides the name, class and signature of the method to call.
trans-unit.target: 方法的中繼資料語彙基元提供名稱、 類別和要呼叫之方法的簽章。

trans-unit.source: The class associated with `obj` is the class of which it is an instance.
trans-unit.target: 與相關聯的類別`obj`是它的執行個體的類別。

trans-unit.source: If the class defines a non-static method that matches the indicated method name and signature, this method is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果類別定義與指定的方法名稱和簽章相符的非靜態方法，會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise all classes in the base class chain of this class are checked in order.
trans-unit.target: 否則順序會檢查這個類別的基底類別鏈結中的所有類別。

trans-unit.source: It is an error if no method is found.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到任何方法，它會發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: `Callvirt` pops the object and the associated arguments off the evaluation stack before calling the method.
trans-unit.target: `Callvirt` 呼叫方法之前，會顯示物件和相關聯的引數評估堆疊。

trans-unit.source: If the method has a return value, it is pushed on the stack upon method completion.
trans-unit.target: 如果方法具有傳回值，則會將它推入方法完成時的堆疊。

trans-unit.source: On the callee side, the `obj` parameter is accessed as argument 0, `arg1` as argument 1, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 在被呼叫端，`obj`參數會做為引數為 0，存取`arg1`做為引數 1，依此類推。

trans-unit.source: The arguments are placed on the stack in left-to-right order.
trans-unit.target: 引數會放置在堆疊上，在左到右的順序。

trans-unit.source: That is, the first argument is computed and placed on the stack, then the second argument, then the third, until all necessary arguments are atop the stack in descending order.
trans-unit.target: 也就是第一個引數是計算並放置在堆疊中，第二個引數，然後第三個，直到所有必要的引數以遞減順序堆疊的頂端。

trans-unit.source: The instance reference `obj` (always required for `callvirt`) must be pushed before any of the user-visible arguments.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體參考`obj`(一律需`callvirt`) 之前的任何使用者可見的引數都必須推送。

trans-unit.source: The signature (carried in the metadata token) need not contain an entry in the parameter list for the this pointer.
trans-unit.target: 簽章 （中繼資料語彙基元攜帶） 不需要這個包含參數清單中的項目指標。

trans-unit.source: Note that a virtual method can also be called using the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Call> instruction.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，虛擬方法也可以呼叫使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Call>指令。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.MissingMethodException> is thrown if a non-static method with the indicated name and signature could not be found in the class associated with `obj` or any of its base classes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.MissingMethodException> 如果相關聯的類別中找不到具有指定的名稱和簽章的非靜態方法會擲回`obj`或任何基底類別。

trans-unit.source: This is typically detected when Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions are converted to native code, rather than at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 這通常是偵測到 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 指示轉換至原生程式碼，而不是在執行階段時。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.NullReferenceException> is thrown if obj is null.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.NullReferenceException> 如果 obj 為 null，會擲回。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown if system security does not grant the caller access to the called method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> 如果系統安全性不授與被呼叫的方法的呼叫端存取，會擲回。

trans-unit.source: The security check may occur when the CIL is converted to native code rather than at run time.
trans-unit.target: CIL 轉換為原生程式碼，而不是在執行階段時，可能會發生安全性檢查。

trans-unit.source: When calling methods of System.Object on value types, consider using the `constrained` prefix with the `callvirt` instruction.
trans-unit.target: 當呼叫的 System.Object 方法，實值型別，請考慮使用`constrained`加上前置詞`callvirt`指令。

trans-unit.source: This removes the need to emit different IL depending on whether or not the value type overrides the method, avoiding a potential versioning problem.
trans-unit.target: 這會移除需要發出避免潛在的版本控制問題實值型別會覆寫方法，根據不同的 IL。

trans-unit.source: Consider using the `constrained` prefix when invoking interface methods on value types, since the value type method implementing the interface method can be changed using a `MethodImpl`.
trans-unit.target: 請考慮使用`constrained`可以使用變更時叫用介面方法實值型別，因為實作介面方法的值類型方法的前置詞`MethodImpl`。

trans-unit.source: These issues are described in more detail in the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Constrained> opcode.
trans-unit.target: 更詳細地描述這些問題<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Constrained>opcode。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `callvirt` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`callvirt`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, MethodInfo)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode，MethodInfo）

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.EmitCall(OpCode, MethodInfo, Type[])
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.EmitCall (OpCode，MethodInfo Type[])

trans-unit.source: Attempts to cast an object passed by reference to the specified class.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將參考所傳遞的物件轉型為指定的類別。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: castclass `class`
trans-unit.target: castclass `class`

trans-unit.source: Casts an object to a new object of type `class`.
trans-unit.target: 將新物件型別的物件轉換`class`。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: An object reference is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 物件參考推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The object reference is popped from the stack; the referenced object is cast as the specified `class`.
trans-unit.target: 從堆疊，則會彈出物件參考，參考的物件轉換為指定`class`。

trans-unit.source: If successful, a new object reference is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功，新的物件參考被推入堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The `castclass` instruction attempts to cast the object reference (type `O`) atop the stack to a specified class.
trans-unit.target: `castclass`指令嘗試轉換成物件參考 (類型`O`) 至指定的類別堆疊的頂端。

trans-unit.source: The new class is specified by a metadata token indicating the desired class.
trans-unit.target: 指出所需的類別中繼資料語彙基元指定新的類別。

trans-unit.source: If the class of the object on the top of the stack does not implement the new class (assuming the new class is an interface) and is not a derived class of the new class then an <xref:System.InvalidCastException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果在堆疊的頂端物件的類別未實作 （假設新的類別一種介面） 的新類別，而且不是在衍生的類別的新類別則<xref:System.InvalidCastException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: If the object reference is a null reference, `castclass` succeeds and returns the new object as a null reference.
trans-unit.target: 如果物件參考為 null 參考，`castclass`成功並傳回新的物件為 null 參考。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.InvalidCastException> is thrown if obj cannot be cast to class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.InvalidCastException> 如果 obj 無法轉換成類別，會擲回。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.TypeLoadException> is thrown if class cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TypeLoadException> 如果找不到類別，會擲回。

trans-unit.source: This is typically detected when a Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL)instruction is converted to native code rather than at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 這通常是偵測到的 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 指令轉換為原生程式碼，而不是在執行階段時。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `castclass` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`castclass`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

trans-unit.source: Compares two values.
trans-unit.target: 比較兩個值。

trans-unit.source: If they are equal, the integer value 1 <see langword="(int32" />) is pushed onto the evaluation stack; otherwise 0 (<see langword="int32" />) is pushed onto the evaluation stack.
trans-unit.target: 如果相等，則將整數值 1 (<see langword="(int32" />) 推入至評估堆疊，否則將 0 (<see langword="int32" />) 推入至評估堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: FE 01
trans-unit.target: FE 01

trans-unit.source: ceq
trans-unit.target: ceq

trans-unit.source: Pushes 1 if `value1` equals `value2`; else pushes 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果將推送 1`value1`等於`value2`，否則推播通知 0。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: `value1` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value1` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `value1` is compared to `value2`.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 和`value1`取出從堆疊。`value1`相較於`value2`。

trans-unit.source: If `value1` is equal to `value2`, 1 is pushed onto the stack; otherwise 0 is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value1`等於`value2`，1 會推送到堆疊; 否則為 0 會推送到堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The `ceq` instruction compares `value1` and `value2`.
trans-unit.target: `ceq`指令比較`value1`和`value2`。

trans-unit.source: If `value1` is equal to `value2`, then 1 (of type `int32`) is pushed on the stack.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value1`等於`value2`、 然後 1 (型別`int32`) 推送到堆疊上。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise 0 (of type `int32`) is pushed on the stack.
trans-unit.target: 否則為 0 (型別`int32`) 推送到堆疊上。

trans-unit.source: For floating-point number, `ceq` will return 0 if the numbers are unordered (either or both are NaN).
trans-unit.target: 浮點數，如`ceq`的數字為未排序，則會傳回 0 （或兩者皆是 NaN）。

trans-unit.source: The infinite values are equal to themselves.
trans-unit.target: 無限的值會等於其本身。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `ceq` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`ceq`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.source: Compares two values.
trans-unit.target: 比較兩個值。

trans-unit.source: If the first value is greater than the second, the integer value 1 <see langword="(int32" />) is pushed onto the evaluation stack; otherwise 0 (<see langword="int32" />) is pushed onto the evaluation stack.
trans-unit.target: 如果第一個值大於第二個值，則將整數值 1 (<see langword="(int32" />) 推入至評估堆疊，否則，將 0 (<see langword="int32" />) 推入至評估堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: FE 02
trans-unit.target: FE 02

trans-unit.source: cgt
trans-unit.target: cgt

trans-unit.source: Pushes 1 if `value1` is greater than `value2`; else pushes 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果將推送 1`value1`大於`value2`，否則推播通知 0。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: `value1` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value1` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `cgt` tests if `value1` is greater than `value2`.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 和`value1`取出從堆疊。`cgt`測試`value1`大於`value2`。

trans-unit.source: If `value1` is greater than `value2`, 1 is pushed onto the stack; otherwise 0 is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value1`大於`value2`，1 會推送到堆疊; 否則為 0 會推送到堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The `cgt` instruction compares `value1` and `value2`.
trans-unit.target: `cgt`指令比較`value1`和`value2`。

trans-unit.source: If `value1` is strictly greater than `value2`, then an `int32` value of 1 is pushed on the stack.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value1`必定大於`value2`，則`int32`1 的值推入堆疊。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, an `int32` value of 0 is pushed on the stack.
trans-unit.target: 否則，`int32`值為 0 推送到堆疊上。

trans-unit.source: For floating-point numbers, `cgt` returns 0 if the numbers are unordered (that is, if one or both of the arguments are NaN).
trans-unit.target: 浮點數，如`cgt`如果 （亦即，如果一或兩個引數是 NaN） 的數字為未排序，則傳回 0。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `cgt` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`cgt`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.source: Compares two unsigned or unordered values.
trans-unit.target: 比較兩個沒有正負號或未排序的值。

trans-unit.source: If the first value is greater than the second, the integer value 1 <see langword="(int32" />) is pushed onto the evaluation stack; otherwise 0 (<see langword="int32" />) is pushed onto the evaluation stack.
trans-unit.target: 如果第一個值大於第二個值，則將整數值 1 (<see langword="(int32" />) 推入至評估堆疊，否則，將 0 (<see langword="int32" />) 推入至評估堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: FE 03
trans-unit.target: FE 03

trans-unit.source: cgt.un
trans-unit.target: cgt.un

trans-unit.source: Pushes 1 if `value1` is greater than `value2`; else pushes 0 (unsigned values).
trans-unit.target: 如果將推送 1`value1`大於`value2`，否則推播通知 0 （不帶正負號值）。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: `value1` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value1` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `cgt.un` tests if `value1` is greater than `value2`.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 和`value1`取出從堆疊。`cgt.un`測試`value1`大於`value2`。

trans-unit.source: If `value1` is greater than `value2`, 1 is pushed onto the stack; otherwise 0 is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value1`大於`value2`，1 會推送到堆疊; 否則為 0 會推送到堆疊。

trans-unit.source: An `int32` value of 1 is pushed on the stack if any of the following is `true` :
trans-unit.target: `int32`值 1 會推送到堆疊上，如果下列任一`true`:

trans-unit.source: For floating-point numbers, `value1` is not ordered with respect to `value2`.
trans-unit.target: 浮點數，如`value1`相對於未經過排序`value2`。

trans-unit.source: For integer values, `value1` is strictly greater than `value2` when considered as unsigned numbers.
trans-unit.target: 對於整數值`value1`必定大於`value2`時被視為與不帶正負號的數字。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise an `int32` value of 0 is pushed on the stack.
trans-unit.target: 否則`int32`值為 0 推送到堆疊上。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `cgt.un` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`cgt.un`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.source: Throws <see cref="T:System.ArithmeticException" /> if value is not a finite number.
trans-unit.target: 如果值非有限數值，則擲回 <see cref="T:System.ArithmeticException" />。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: C3
trans-unit.target: C3

trans-unit.source: ckfinite
trans-unit.target: ckfinite

trans-unit.source: throw <xref:System.ArithmeticException> if value is not a finite number.
trans-unit.target: 擲回<xref:System.ArithmeticException>如果值不是有限的數字。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: `value` is pushed onto the stack..
trans-unit.target: `value` 已推送至堆疊...

trans-unit.source: `value` is popped from the stack and the `ckfinite` instruction is performed on it.
trans-unit.target: `value` 從堆疊推出和`ckfinite`指令會在其上執行。

trans-unit.source: `value` is pushed back onto the stack if no exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: `value` 被推回堆疊如果擲不回任何例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The `ckfinite instruction` throws <xref:System.ArithmeticException> if `value` (a floating-point number) is either a "not a number" value (NaN) or a `+-` infinity value.
trans-unit.target: `ckfinite instruction`會擲回<xref:System.ArithmeticException>如果`value`（浮點數） 是 「 不是數字 」 值 (NaN) 或`+-`無限大值。

trans-unit.source: `Ckfinite` leaves the value on the stack if no exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: `Ckfinite` 如果擲不回任何例外狀況，讓值在堆疊上。

trans-unit.source: Execution is unspecified if `value` is not a floating-point number.
trans-unit.target: 如果是未指定執行`value`不是浮點數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ArithmeticException> is thrown if `value` is not a 'normal' number.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ArithmeticException> 如果擲回`value`不是 'normal' 的數字。

trans-unit.source: Note that a special exception or a derived class of <xref:System.ArithmeticException> may be more appropriate, passing the incorrect value to the exception handler.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，特殊的例外狀況或衍生的類別的<xref:System.ArithmeticException>可能會更加適合，將不正確的值傳遞至例外狀況處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `ckfinite` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`ckfinite`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.source: Compares two values.
trans-unit.target: 比較兩個值。

trans-unit.source: If the first value is less than the second, the integer value 1 <see langword="(int32" />) is pushed onto the evaluation stack; otherwise 0 (<see langword="int32" />) is pushed onto the evaluation stack.
trans-unit.target: 如果第一個值小於第二個值，則將整數值 1 (<see langword="(int32" />) 推入至評估堆疊，否則，將 0 (<see langword="int32" />) 推入至評估堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: FE 04
trans-unit.target: FE 04

trans-unit.source: clt
trans-unit.target: clt

trans-unit.source: Pushes 1 if `value1` is less than `value2`; else pushes 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果將推送 1`value1`是小於`value2`，否則推播通知 0。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: `value1` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：`value1`推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `clt` tests if `value1` is less than `value2`.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 和`value1`取出從堆疊。`clt`測試`value1`是小於`value2`。

trans-unit.source: If `value1` is less than `value2`, 1 is pushed onto the stack; otherwise 0 is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value1`是小於`value2`，1 會推送到堆疊; 否則為 0 會推送到堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The `clt` instruction compares `value1` and `value2`.
trans-unit.target: `clt`指令比較`value1`和`value2`。

trans-unit.source: If `value1` is strictly less than `value2`, then an `int32` value of 1 is pushed on the stack.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value1`是嚴格小於`value2`，則`int32`1 的值推入堆疊。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, an `int32` value of 0 is pushed on the stack.
trans-unit.target: 否則，`int32`值為 0 推送到堆疊上。

trans-unit.source: For floating-point numbers, `clt` returns 0 if the numbers are unordered (that is, if one or both of the arguments are NaN).
trans-unit.target: 浮點數，如`clt`如果 （亦即，如果一或兩個引數是 NaN） 的數字為未排序，則傳回 0。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `clt` opcode:

trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value1" /> 小於 <paramref name="value2" />，則將整數值 1 (<see langword="(int32" />) 推入至評估堆疊，否則將 0 (<see langword="int32" />) 推入至評估堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
