trans-unit.source: Pushes 1 if `value1` is less than `value2`; else pushes 0 (unsigned values).
trans-unit.target: 如果將推送 1`value1`是小於`value2`，否則推播通知 0 （不帶正負號值）。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: `value1` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value1` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `clt.un` tests if `value1` is less than `value2`.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 和`value1`取出從堆疊。`clt.un`測試`value1`是小於`value2`。

trans-unit.source: If `value1` is less than `value2`, 1 is pushed onto the stack; otherwise 0 is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value1`是小於`value2`，1 會推送到堆疊; 否則為 0 會推送到堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The `clt.un` instruction compares `value1` and `value2`.
trans-unit.target: `clt.un`指令比較`value1`和`value2`。

trans-unit.source: An `int32` value of 1 is pushed on the stack if any of the following is true:
trans-unit.target: `int32`值 1 會推送到堆疊上，如果下列任一項為真：

trans-unit.source: `value1` is strictly less than `value2` (as for `clt`).
trans-unit.target: `value1` 是嚴格小於`value2`(與`clt`)。

trans-unit.source: For floating-point numbers, `value1` is not ordered with respect to `value2`.
trans-unit.target: 浮點數，如`value1`相對於未經過排序`value2`。

trans-unit.source: For integer values, `value1` is strictly less than `value2` when considered as unsigned numbers.
trans-unit.target: 對於整數值`value1`是嚴格小於`value2`時被視為與不帶正負號的數字。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, an `int32` value of 0 is pushed on the stack.
trans-unit.target: 否則，`int32`值為 0 推送到堆疊上。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `clt.un` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`clt.un`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.source: Constrains the type on which a virtual method call is made.
trans-unit.target: 限制其上可進行虛擬方法呼叫的類型。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: constrained.
trans-unit.target: 受到條件約束。

trans-unit.source: Call a virtual method on a type constrained to be type `T`.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫虛擬方法的型別上限制類型`T`。

trans-unit.source: The `constrained` prefix is permitted only on a `callvirt` instruction.
trans-unit.target: `constrained`前置詞僅允許`callvirt`指令。

trans-unit.source: The state of the MSIL stack at this point must be as follows:
trans-unit.target: 此時 MSIL 堆疊的狀態必須如下所示：

trans-unit.source: A managed pointer, `ptr`, is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 受管理的指標， `ptr`，推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The type of `ptr` must be a managed pointer (`&`) to `thisType`.
trans-unit.target: 型別`ptr`必須是 managed 的指標 (`&`) 至`thisType`。

trans-unit.source: Note that this is different from the case of an unprefixed `callvirt` instruction, which expects a reference of `thisType`.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，這不同於無前置詞的大小寫`callvirt`指令，需要的參考`thisType`。

trans-unit.source: Method arguments `arg1` through `argN` are pushed onto the stack, just as with an unprefixed `callvirt` instruction.
trans-unit.target: 方法引數`arg1`透過`argN`推入至堆疊，就像處理未加前置詞`callvirt`指令。

trans-unit.source: The `constrained` prefix is designed to allow `callvirt` instructions to be made in a uniform way independent of whether `thisType` is a value type or a reference type.
trans-unit.target: `constrained`前置詞的設計可讓`callvirt`指示中進行一致的方式獨立是否`thisType`是實值類型或參考型別。

trans-unit.source: When a `callvirt` `method` instruction has been prefixed by `constrained` `thisType`, the instruction is executed as follows:
trans-unit.target: 當`callvirt``method`指令加`constrained` `thisType`，指示執行，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If `thisType` is a reference type (as opposed to a value type) then `ptr` is dereferenced and passed as the 'this' pointer to the `callvirt` of `method`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`thisType`是參考類型 （而不是實值類型），則`ptr`已取值，而且傳遞 'this' 指標`callvirt`的`method`。

trans-unit.source: If `thisType` is a value type and `thisType` implements `method` then `ptr` is passed unmodified as the 'this' pointer to a `call` `method` instruction, for the implementation of `method` by `thisType`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`thisType`是實值類型和`thisType`實作`method`然後`ptr`傳遞未修改與 'this' 指標`call``method`指示，用於實作的`method`由`thisType`.

trans-unit.source: If `thisType` is a value type and `thisType` does not implement `method` then `ptr` is dereferenced, boxed, and passed as the 'this' pointer to the `callvirt` `method` instruction.
trans-unit.target: 如果`thisType`是實值類型和`thisType`未實作`method`然後`ptr`是取值，會進行 boxed 處理，以及傳遞做為 'this' 指標`callvirt``method`指令。

trans-unit.source: This last case can occur only when `method` was defined on <xref:System.Object>, <xref:System.ValueType>, or <xref:System.Enum> and not overridden by `thisType`.
trans-unit.target: 最後一個案例中可能會發生時，才`method`上已定義<xref:System.Object>， <xref:System.ValueType>，或<xref:System.Enum>不覆寫`thisType`。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the boxing causes a copy of the original object to be made.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，boxing 會設為原始物件的複本。

trans-unit.source: However, because none of the methods of <xref:System.Object>, <xref:System.ValueType>, and <xref:System.Enum> modify the state of the object, this fact cannot be detected.
trans-unit.target: 不過，因為沒有任何方法的<xref:System.Object>， <xref:System.ValueType>，和<xref:System.Enum>修改狀態的物件，無法偵測出此事實。

trans-unit.source: The `constrained` prefix supports IL generators that create generic code.
trans-unit.target: `constrained`前置詞支援建立泛型程式碼的 IL 產生器。

trans-unit.source: Normally the `callvirt` instruction is not valid on value types.
trans-unit.target: 通常`callvirt`指令實值型別無效。

trans-unit.source: Instead it is required that IL compilers effectively perform the 'this' transformation outlined above at compile time, depending on the type of `ptr` and the method being called.
trans-unit.target: 而是它需要 IL 編譯器有效地執行以上所述，在編譯時期，根據類型的 'this' 的轉換`ptr`和被呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: However, when `ptr` is a generic type that is unknown at compile time, it is not possible to make this transformation at compile time.
trans-unit.target: 不過，當`ptr`不明在編譯時期為泛型型別不可能執行這項轉換在編譯時間。

trans-unit.source: The `constrained` opcode allows IL compilers to make a call to a virtual function in a uniform way independent of whether `ptr` is a value type or a reference type.
trans-unit.target: `constrained` Opcode 允許進行統一的虛擬函式的呼叫是否方式無關的 IL 編譯器`ptr`是實值類型或參考型別。

trans-unit.source: Although it is intended for the case where `thisType` is a generic type variable, the `constrained` prefix also works for nongeneric types and can reduce the complexity of generating virtual calls in languages that hide the distinction between value types and reference types.
trans-unit.target: 雖然本指南適用於大小寫，但其中`thisType`是泛型型別變數，`constrained`首碼也適用於非泛型型別，而且可以減少虛擬呼叫產生的隱藏實值型別之間的差別語言的複雜性和參考型別。

trans-unit.source: Using the `constrained` prefix also avoids potential versioning problems with value types.
trans-unit.target: 使用`constrained`前置詞也可避免潛在的版本控制問題實值類型。

trans-unit.source: If the `constrained` prefix is not used, different IL must be emitted depending on whether or not a value type overrides a method of System.Object.
trans-unit.target: 如果`constrained`不使用前置詞，根據實值類型是否會覆寫 System.Object 的方法必須發出不同的 IL。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a value type `V` overrides the Object.ToString() method, a `call` `V.ToString()` instruction is emitted; if it does not, a `box` instruction and a `callvirt` `Object.ToString()` instruction are emitted.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果實值類型`V`覆寫 object.tostring （） 方法， `call` `V.ToString()`指令，就會發出; 如果沒有出現，請`box`指令和`callvirt``Object.ToString()`指令會發出。

trans-unit.source: A versioning problem can arise in the former case if the override is later removed, and in the latter case if an override is later added.
trans-unit.target: 版本控制問題可能會發生在先前的情況下，如果稍後移除覆寫，並在後者的情況下如果稍後加入覆寫。

trans-unit.source: The `constrained` prefix can also be used for invocation of interface methods on value types, because the value type method implementing the interface method can be changed using a `MethodImpl`.
trans-unit.target: `constrained`前置詞也可用在實值類型上的介面方法引動過程因為實作介面方法的值類型方法可以使用變更`MethodImpl`。

trans-unit.source: If the `constrained` prefix is not used, the compiler is forced to choose which of the value type's methods to bind to at compile time.
trans-unit.target: 如果`constrained`不使用前置詞時，編譯器會強制選擇其中一個值在編譯時期繫結至類型的方法。

trans-unit.source: Using the `constrained` prefix allows the MSIL to bind to the method that implements the interface method at run time, rather than at compile time.
trans-unit.target: 使用`constrained`前置詞可讓繫結至的方法，在執行階段，而不是在編譯時期實作介面方法的 MSIL。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `constrained` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`constrained`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

trans-unit.source: Converts the value on top of the evaluation stack to <see langword="native int" />.
trans-unit.target: 將評估堆疊頂端的值轉換成 <see langword="native int" />。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: D3
trans-unit.target: D3

trans-unit.source: conv.i
trans-unit.target: conv.i

trans-unit.source: Convert to `native int`, pushing `native int` on stack.
trans-unit.target: 將轉換成`native int`、 推送`native int`堆疊上。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: `value` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value` is popped from the stack and the conversion operation is attempted.
trans-unit.target: `value` 時會推出堆疊，並轉換從嘗試作業。

trans-unit.source: If the conversion is successful, the resulting value is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 如果轉換成功，會產生的值推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The `conv.i` opcode converts the `value` on top of the stack to the type specified in the opcode, and leave that converted value on the top of the stack.
trans-unit.target: `conv.i` Opcode 轉換`value`opcode 及轉換的堆疊頂端的值保持在指定的型別堆疊的頂端。

trans-unit.source: Integer values of less than 4 bytes are extended to `int32` when they are loaded onto the evaluation stack (unless `conv.i` or `conv.u` is used, in which case the result is also `native int`).
trans-unit.target: 小於 4 個位元組的整數值已擴充來`int32`載入至評估堆疊 (除非`conv.i`或`conv.u`使用時，結果在此情況下也是`native int`)。

trans-unit.source: Floating-point values are converted to the `F` type.
trans-unit.target: 浮點數的值會轉換成`F`型別。

trans-unit.source: Conversion from floating-point numbers to integer values truncates the number toward zero.
trans-unit.target: 將浮點數轉換為整數值會截斷趨近於零的數字。

trans-unit.source: When converting from a `float64` to a `float32`, precision can be lost.
trans-unit.target: 當轉換從`float64`至`float32`，有效位數，可能會遺失。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is too large to fit in a `float32 (F)`, positive infinity (if `value` is positive) or negative infinity (if `value` is negative) is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`太大，以致於無法納入`float32 (F)`，正無限大 (如果`value`為正值) 或負的無限值 (如果`value`為負) 會傳回。

trans-unit.source: If overflow occurs converting one integer type to another, the high order bits are truncated.
trans-unit.target: 如果轉換一個整數類型之間發生溢位，則會截斷高序位位元。

trans-unit.source: If the result is smaller than an `int32`, the value is sign-extended to fill the slot.
trans-unit.target: 如果結果為小於`int32`，值是帶正負號擴充以填滿的位置。

trans-unit.source: If overflow occurs converting a floating-point type to an integer the value returned is unspecified.
trans-unit.target: 如果發生溢位浮點類型轉換成整數傳回的值是 unspecified。

trans-unit.source: No exceptions are ever thrown when using this field.
trans-unit.target: 使用此欄位時，曾經會擲不回任何例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Conv_Ovf_I> and <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Conv_Ovf_I_Un> for equivalent instructions that will throw an exception when the result type can not properly represent the result value.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Conv_Ovf_I>和<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Conv_Ovf_I_Un>為對應的結果型別不可以正確地表示的結果值時將會擲回例外狀況的指示。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `conv.i` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`conv.i`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.target: 將評估堆疊頂端的值轉換成 <see langword="int8" />，然後將它擴充 (填補) 到 <see langword="int32" />。

trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: conv.i1
trans-unit.target: conv.i1

trans-unit.source: Convert to `int8`, pushing `int32` on stack.
trans-unit.target: 將轉換成`int8`、 推送`int32`堆疊上。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: `value` is pushed onto the stack.

trans-unit.source: Integer values of less than 4 bytes are extended to `int32` when they are loaded onto the evaluation stack (unless `conv.i` or `conv.u` is used, in which case the result is also `native int`).
trans-unit.target: 小於 4 個位元組的整數值已擴充來`int32`載入至評估堆疊 (除非`conv.i`或`conv.u`使用時，結果在此情況下也是`native int`)。

trans-unit.source: Floating-point values are converted to the `F` type.
trans-unit.target: 浮點數的值會轉換成`F`型別。

trans-unit.source: Conversion from floating-point numbers to integer values truncates the number toward zero.
trans-unit.target: 將浮點數轉換為整數值會截斷趨近於零的數字。

trans-unit.source: When converting from a `float64` to a `float32`, precision can be lost.

trans-unit.source: If `value` is too large to fit in a `float32 (F)`, positive infinity (if `value` is positive) or negative infinity (if `value` is negative) is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`太大，以致於無法納入`float32 (F)`，正無限大 (如果`value`為正值) 或負的無限值 (如果`value`為負) 會傳回。

trans-unit.source: If overflow occurs converting one integer type to another, the high order bits are truncated.
trans-unit.target: 如果轉換一個整數類型之間發生溢位，則會截斷高序位位元。

trans-unit.source: If the result is smaller than an `int32`, the value is sign-extended to fill the slot.
trans-unit.target: 如果結果為小於`int32`，值是帶正負號擴充以填滿的位置。

trans-unit.source: If overflow occurs converting a floating-point type to an integer the value returned is unspecified.
trans-unit.target: 如果發生溢位浮點類型轉換成整數傳回的值是 unspecified。

trans-unit.source: No exceptions are ever thrown when using this field.
trans-unit.target: 使用此欄位時，曾經會擲不回任何例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Conv_Ovf_I1> and <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Conv_Ovf_I1_Un> for equivalent instructions that will throw an exception when the result type can not properly represent the result value.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Conv_Ovf_I1>和<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Conv_Ovf_I1_Un>為對應的結果型別不可以正確地表示的結果值時將會擲回例外狀況的指示。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `conv.i1` opcode:

trans-unit.source: Convert to `int16`, pushing `int32` on stack.
trans-unit.target: 將轉換成`int16`、 推送`int32`堆疊上。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: `value` is pushed onto the stack.

trans-unit.target: 小於 4 個位元組的整數值已擴充來`int32`載入至評估堆疊 (除非`conv.i`或`conv.u`使用時，結果在此情況下也是`native int`)。

trans-unit.source: Floating-point values are converted to the `F` type.
trans-unit.target: 浮點數的值會轉換成`F`型別。

trans-unit.source: Conversion from floating-point numbers to integer values truncates the number toward zero.
trans-unit.target: 將浮點數轉換為整數值會截斷趨近於零的數字。

trans-unit.source: When converting from a `float64` to a `float32`, precision can be lost.
trans-unit.target: 當轉換從`float64`至`float32`，有效位數，可能會遺失。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is too large to fit in a `float32 (F)`, positive infinity (if `value` is positive) or negative infinity (if `value` is negative) is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`太大，以致於無法納入`float32 (F)`，正無限大 (如果`value`為正值) 或負的無限值 (如果`value`為負) 會傳回。

trans-unit.source: If overflow occurs converting one integer type to another, the high order bits are truncated.
trans-unit.target: 如果轉換一個整數類型之間發生溢位，則會截斷高序位位元。

trans-unit.source: If the result is smaller than an `int32`, the value is sign-extended to fill the slot.
trans-unit.target: 如果結果為小於`int32`，值是帶正負號擴充以填滿的位置。

trans-unit.source: If overflow occurs converting a floating-point type to an integer the value returned is unspecified.
trans-unit.target: 如果發生溢位浮點類型轉換成整數傳回的值是 unspecified。

trans-unit.source: No exceptions are ever thrown when using this field.
trans-unit.target: 使用此欄位時，曾經會擲不回任何例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Conv_Ovf_I2> and <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Conv_Ovf_I2_Un> for equivalent instructions that will throw an exception when the result type can not properly represent the result value.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Conv_Ovf_I2>和<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Conv_Ovf_I2_Un>為對應的結果型別不可以正確地表示的結果值時將會擲回例外狀況的指示。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `conv.i2` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`conv.i2`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.source: Converts the value on top of the evaluation stack to <see langword="int32" />.
trans-unit.target: 將評估堆疊頂端的值轉換成 <see langword="int32" />。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: conv.i4
trans-unit.target: conv.i4

trans-unit.source: Convert to `int32`, pushing `int32` on stack.
trans-unit.target: 將轉換成`int32`、 推送`int32`堆疊上。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: `value` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value` is popped from the stack and the conversion operation is attempted.
trans-unit.target: `value` 時會推出堆疊，並轉換從嘗試作業。

trans-unit.source: If the conversion is successful, the resulting value is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 如果轉換成功，會產生的值推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The `conv.i4` opcode converts the `value` on top of the stack to the type specified in the opcode, and leave that converted value on the top of the stack.
trans-unit.target: `conv.i4` Opcode 轉換`value`opcode 及轉換的堆疊頂端的值保持在指定的型別堆疊的頂端。

trans-unit.source: Integer values of less than 4 bytes are extended to `int32` when they are loaded onto the evaluation stack (unless `conv.i` or `conv.u` is used, in which case the result is also `native int`).
trans-unit.target: 小於 4 個位元組的整數值已擴充來`int32`載入至評估堆疊 (除非`conv.i`或`conv.u`使用時，結果在此情況下也是`native int`)。

trans-unit.source: Floating-point values are converted to the `F` type.
trans-unit.target: 浮點數的值會轉換成`F`型別。

trans-unit.source: Conversion from floating-point numbers to integer values truncates the number toward zero.
trans-unit.target: 將浮點數轉換為整數值會截斷趨近於零的數字。

trans-unit.source: When converting from a `float64` to a `float32`, precision can be lost.
trans-unit.target: 當轉換從`float64`至`float32`，有效位數，可能會遺失。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is too large to fit in a `float32 (F)`, positive infinity (if `value` is positive) or negative infinity (if `value` is negative) is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`太大，以致於無法納入`float32 (F)`，正無限大 (如果`value`為正值) 或負的無限值 (如果`value`為負) 會傳回。

trans-unit.source: If overflow occurs converting one integer type to another, the high order bits are truncated.
trans-unit.target: 如果轉換一個整數類型之間發生溢位，則會截斷高序位位元。

trans-unit.source: If the result is smaller than an `int32`, the value is sign-extended to fill the slot.
trans-unit.target: 如果結果為小於`int32`，值是帶正負號擴充以填滿的位置。

trans-unit.source: If overflow occurs converting a floating-point type to an integer the value returned is unspecified.
trans-unit.target: 如果發生溢位浮點類型轉換成整數傳回的值是 unspecified。

trans-unit.source: No exceptions are ever thrown when using this field.
trans-unit.target: 使用此欄位時，曾經會擲不回任何例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Conv_Ovf_I4> and <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Conv_Ovf_I4_Un> for equivalent instructions that will throw an exception when the result type can not properly represent the result value.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Conv_Ovf_I4>和<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Conv_Ovf_I4_Un>為對應的結果型別不可以正確地表示的結果值時將會擲回例外狀況的指示。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `conv.i4` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`conv.i4`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.source: `value` is popped from the stack and the conversion operation is attempted.

trans-unit.source: If the conversion is successful, the resulting value is pushed onto the stack.

trans-unit.target: 如果`value`太大，以致於無法納入`float32 (F)`，正無限大 (如果`value`為正值) 或負的無限值 (如果`value`為負) 會傳回。

trans-unit.source: If overflow occurs converting one integer type to another, the high order bits are truncated.
trans-unit.target: 如果轉換一個整數類型之間發生溢位，則會截斷高序位位元。

trans-unit.source: If the result is smaller than an `int32`, the value is sign-extended to fill the slot.
trans-unit.target: 如果結果為小於`int32`，值是帶正負號擴充以填滿的位置。

trans-unit.source: If overflow occurs converting a floating-point type to an integer the value returned is unspecified.
trans-unit.target: 如果發生溢位浮點類型轉換成整數傳回的值是 unspecified。

trans-unit.source: No exceptions are ever thrown when using this field.
trans-unit.target: 使用此欄位時，曾經會擲不回任何例外狀況。

trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Conv_Ovf_I8>和<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Conv_Ovf_I8_Un>為對應的結果型別不可以正確地表示的結果值時將會擲回例外狀況的指示。

trans-unit.source: Converts the signed value on top of the evaluation stack to signed <see langword="native int" />, throwing <see cref="T:System.OverflowException" /> on overflow.
trans-unit.target: 將評估堆疊頂端帶正負號的值轉換成帶正負號的 <see langword="native int" />，並在溢位上擲回 <see cref="T:System.OverflowException" />。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: D4
trans-unit.target: D4

trans-unit.source: conv.ovf.i
trans-unit.target: conv.ovf.i

trans-unit.source: Convert to a `native int` (on the stack as `native int`) and throw an exception on overflow.
trans-unit.target: 將轉換成`native int`(做為在堆疊上`native int`) 和溢位時擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: `value` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value` is popped from the stack and the conversion operation is attempted.
trans-unit.target: `value` 時會推出堆疊，並轉換從嘗試作業。

trans-unit.source: If overflow occurs, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果發生溢位，則會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the conversion is successful, the resulting value is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 如果轉換成功，會產生的值推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The `conv.ovf.i` opcode converts the `value` on top of the stack to the type specified in the opcode, and places that converted value on the top of the stack.
trans-unit.target: `conv.ovf.i` Opcode 轉換`value`opcode 及轉換值的堆疊頂端的位置中指定的型別堆疊的頂端。

trans-unit.source: If the value is too large or too small to be represented by the target type, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果值太大或太小，表示由目標類型，則會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Conversions from floating-point numbers to integer values truncate the number toward zero.
trans-unit.target: 浮點數轉換成整數值會截斷趨近於零的數字。

trans-unit.source: Note that integer values of less than 4 bytes are extended to `int32` when they are loaded onto the evaluation stack (unless `conv.ovf.i` or `conv.ovf.u` are used, in which case the result is also `native int`).
trans-unit.target: 請注意少於 4 個位元組的整數值會擴充以`int32`載入至評估堆疊 (除非`conv.ovf.i`或`conv.ovf.u`使用時，結果在此情況下也是`native int`)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.OverflowException> is thrown if the result can not be represented in the result type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.OverflowException> 如果結果不會顯示結果型別，會擲回。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `conv.ovf.i` opcode:

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.source: Converts the unsigned value on top of the evaluation stack to signed <see langword="int8" /> and extends it to <see langword="int32" />, throwing <see cref="T:System.OverflowException" /> on overflow.
trans-unit.target: 將評估堆疊頂端不帶正負號的值轉換成帶正負號的 <see langword="int8" />，將它擴充到 <see langword="int32" />，並在溢位上擲回 <see cref="T:System.OverflowException" />。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: conv.ovf.i1.un
trans-unit.target: conv.ovf.i1.un

trans-unit.source: Converts an unsigned value to an `int8` (on the stack as `int32`) and throw an exception on overflow.
trans-unit.target: 將不帶正負號的值轉換`int8`(做為在堆疊上`int32`) 和溢位時擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: `value` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value` is popped from the stack and the conversion operation is attempted.
trans-unit.target: `value` 時會推出堆疊，並轉換從嘗試作業。

trans-unit.source: If overflow occurs, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果發生溢位，則會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the conversion is successful, the resulting value is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 如果轉換成功，會產生的值推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The `conv.ovf.i1.un` opcode converts the `value` on top of the stack to the type specified in the opcode, and places that converted value on the top of the stack.
trans-unit.target: `conv.ovf.i1.un` Opcode 轉換`value`opcode 及轉換值的堆疊頂端的位置中指定的型別堆疊的頂端。

trans-unit.source: If the value is too large or too small to be represented by the target type, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果值太大或太小，表示由目標類型，則會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Conversions from floating-point numbers to integer values truncate the number toward zero.
trans-unit.target: 浮點數轉換成整數值會截斷趨近於零的數字。

trans-unit.source: Note that integer values of less than 4 bytes are extended to `int32` when they are loaded onto the evaluation stack (unless `conv.ovf.i` or `conv.ovf.u` are used, in which case the result is also `native int`).
trans-unit.target: 請注意少於 4 個位元組的整數值會擴充以`int32`載入至評估堆疊 (除非`conv.ovf.i`或`conv.ovf.u`使用時，結果在此情況下也是`native int`)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.OverflowException> is thrown if the result can not be represented in the result type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.OverflowException> 如果結果不會顯示結果型別，會擲回。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `conv.ovf.i1.un` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`conv.ovf.i1.un`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: conv.ovf.i8.un
trans-unit.target: conv.ovf.i8.un

trans-unit.source: Converts an unsigned value to an `int64` (on the stack as `int64`) and throw an exception on overflow.
trans-unit.target: 將不帶正負號的值轉換`int64`(做為在堆疊上`int64`) 和溢位時擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: `value` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value` is popped from the stack and the conversion operation is attempted.
trans-unit.target: `value` 時會推出堆疊，並轉換從嘗試作業。

trans-unit.source: If overflow occurs, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果發生溢位，則會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the conversion is successful, the resulting value is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 如果轉換成功，會產生的值推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The `conv.ovf.i8.un` opcode converts the `value` on top of the stack to the type specified in the opcode, and places that converted value on the top of the stack.
trans-unit.target: `conv.ovf.i8.un` Opcode 轉換`value`opcode 及轉換值的堆疊頂端的位置中指定的型別堆疊的頂端。

trans-unit.source: If the value is too large or too small to be represented by the target type, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果值太大或太小，表示由目標類型，則會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Conversions from floating-point numbers to integer values truncate the number toward zero.
trans-unit.target: 浮點數轉換成整數值會截斷趨近於零的數字。

trans-unit.source: Note that integer values of less than 4 bytes are extended to `int32` when they are loaded onto the evaluation stack (unless `conv.ovf.i` or `conv.ovf.u` are used, in which case the result is also `native int`).
trans-unit.target: 請注意少於 4 個位元組的整數值會擴充以`int32`載入至評估堆疊 (除非`conv.ovf.i`或`conv.ovf.u`使用時，結果在此情況下也是`native int`)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.OverflowException> is thrown if the result can not be represented in the result type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.OverflowException> 如果結果不會顯示結果型別，會擲回。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `conv.ovf.i8.un` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`conv.ovf.i8.un`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.source: Converts the signed value on top of the evaluation stack to <see langword="unsigned native int" />, throwing <see cref="T:System.OverflowException" /> on overflow.
trans-unit.target: 將評估堆疊頂端帶正負號的值轉換成 <see langword="unsigned native int" />，並在溢位上擲回 <see cref="T:System.OverflowException" />。

trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.source: Converts an unsigned value to an `unsigned int16` (on the stack as `int32`) and throw an exception on overflow.
trans-unit.target: 將不帶正負號的值轉換`unsigned int16`(做為在堆疊上`int32`) 和溢位時擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: `value` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value` is popped from the stack and the conversion operation is attempted.
trans-unit.target: `value` 時會推出堆疊，並轉換從嘗試作業。

trans-unit.source: If overflow occurs, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果發生溢位，則會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the conversion is successful, the resulting value is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 如果轉換成功，會產生的值推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The `conv.ovf.u2.un` opcode converts the `value` on top of the stack to the type specified in the opcode, and places that converted value on the top of the stack.
trans-unit.target: `conv.ovf.u2.un` Opcode 轉換`value`opcode 及轉換值的堆疊頂端的位置中指定的型別堆疊的頂端。

trans-unit.source: If the value is too large or too small to be represented by the target type, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果值太大或太小，表示由目標類型，則會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Conversions from floating-point numbers to integer values truncate the number toward zero.
trans-unit.target: 浮點數轉換成整數值會截斷趨近於零的數字。

trans-unit.source: Note that integer values of less than 4 bytes are extended to `int32` when they are loaded onto the evaluation stack (unless `conv.ovf.i` or `conv.ovf.u` are used, in which case the result is also `native int`).
trans-unit.target: 請注意少於 4 個位元組的整數值會擴充以`int32`載入至評估堆疊 (除非`conv.ovf.i`或`conv.ovf.u`使用時，結果在此情況下也是`native int`)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.OverflowException> is thrown if the result can not be represented in the result type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.OverflowException> 如果結果不會顯示結果型別，會擲回。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `conv.ovf.u2.un` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`conv.ovf.u2.un`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.source: Converts the signed value on top of the evaluation stack to <see langword="unsigned int32" />, throwing <see cref="T:System.OverflowException" /> on overflow.
trans-unit.target: 將評估堆疊頂端帶正負號的值轉換成 <see langword="unsigned int32" />，並在溢位上擲回 <see cref="T:System.OverflowException" />。

trans-unit.source: Converts the unsigned integer value on top of the evaluation stack to <see langword="float32" />.
trans-unit.target: 將評估堆疊頂端不帶正負號的整數 (Unsigned Integer) 值轉換成 <see langword="float32" />。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: conv.r.un
trans-unit.target: conv.r.un

trans-unit.source: Convert unsigned integer to floating-point, pushing `F` on stack.
trans-unit.target: 轉換不帶正負號的整數到浮點數，推入`F`堆疊上。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: `value` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value` is popped from the stack and the conversion operation is attempted.
trans-unit.target: `value` 時會推出堆疊，並轉換從嘗試作業。

trans-unit.source: If the conversion is successful, the resulting value is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 如果轉換成功，會產生的值推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The `conv.r.un` opcode converts the `value` on top of the stack to the type specified in the opcode, and leave that converted value on the top of the stack.
trans-unit.target: `conv.r.un` Opcode 轉換`value`opcode 及轉換的堆疊頂端的值保持在指定的型別堆疊的頂端。

trans-unit.source: Integer values of less than 4 bytes are extended to `int32` when they are loaded onto the evaluation stack (unless `conv.i` or `conv.u` is used, in which case the result is also `native int`).
trans-unit.target: 小於 4 個位元組的整數值已擴充來`int32`載入至評估堆疊 (除非`conv.i`或`conv.u`使用時，結果在此情況下也是`native int`)。

trans-unit.source: Floating-point values are converted to the `F` type.
trans-unit.target: 浮點數的值會轉換成`F`型別。

trans-unit.source: Conversion from floating-point numbers to integer values truncates the number toward zero.
trans-unit.target: 將浮點數轉換為整數值會截斷趨近於零的數字。

trans-unit.source: When converting from a `float64` to a `float32`, precision can be lost.
trans-unit.target: 當轉換從`float64`至`float32`，有效位數，可能會遺失。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is too large to fit in a `float32 (F)`, positive infinity (if `value` is positive) or negative infinity (if `value` is negative) is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`太大，以致於無法納入`float32 (F)`，正無限大 (如果`value`為正值) 或負的無限值 (如果`value`為負) 會傳回。

trans-unit.source: If overflow occurs converting one integer type to another, the high order bits are truncated.
trans-unit.target: 如果轉換一個整數類型之間發生溢位，則會截斷高序位位元。

trans-unit.source: If the result is smaller than an `int32`, the value is sign-extended to fill the slot.
trans-unit.target: 如果結果為小於`int32`，值是帶正負號擴充以填滿的位置。

trans-unit.source: If overflow occurs converting a floating-point type to an integer the `result` returned is unspecified.
trans-unit.target: 如果發生溢位浮點類型轉換成整數`result`傳回未指定。

trans-unit.source: The `conv.r.un` operation takes an integer off the stack, interprets it as unsigned, and replaces it with a floating-point number to represent the integer: either a `float32`, if this is wide enough to represent the integer without loss of precision, or else a `float64`.
trans-unit.target: `conv.r.un`作業接受整數堆疊、 將它解譯為不帶正負號，並取代浮點數，表示整數： 任一`float32`，如果這是寬度不足以表示不會遺失有效位數的整數或其他`float64`。

trans-unit.source: No exceptions are ever thrown when using this field.
trans-unit.target: 使用此欄位時，曾經會擲不回任何例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `conv.r.un` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`conv.r.un`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.source: Converts the value on top of the evaluation stack to <see langword="float32" />.
trans-unit.target: 將評估堆疊頂端的值轉換成 <see langword="float32" />。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: 6B
trans-unit.target: 6B

trans-unit.source: conv.r4
trans-unit.target: conv.r4

trans-unit.source: Convert to `float32`, pushing `F` on stack.
trans-unit.target: 將轉換成`float32`、 推送`F`堆疊上。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: `value` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value` is popped from the stack and the conversion operation is attempted.
trans-unit.target: `value` 時會推出堆疊，並轉換從嘗試作業。

trans-unit.source: If the conversion is successful, the resulting value is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 如果轉換成功，會產生的值推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The `conv.r4` opcode converts the `value` on top of the stack to the type specified in the opcode, and leave that converted value on the top of the stack.
trans-unit.target: `conv.r4` Opcode 轉換`value`opcode 及轉換的堆疊頂端的值保持在指定的型別堆疊的頂端。

trans-unit.source: Integer values of less than 4 bytes are extended to `int32` when they are loaded onto the evaluation stack (unless `conv.i` or `conv.u` is used, in which case the result is also `native int`).
trans-unit.target: 小於 4 個位元組的整數值已擴充來`int32`載入至評估堆疊 (除非`conv.i`或`conv.u`使用時，結果在此情況下也是`native int`)。

trans-unit.source: Floating-point values are converted to the `F` type.
trans-unit.target: 浮點數的值會轉換成`F`型別。

trans-unit.source: Conversion from floating-point numbers to integer values truncates the number toward zero.
trans-unit.target: 將浮點數轉換為整數值會截斷趨近於零的數字。

trans-unit.source: When converting from an `float64` to an `float32`, precision can be lost.
trans-unit.target: 當轉換從`float64`至`float32`，有效位數，可能會遺失。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is too large to fit in a `float32 (F)`, positive infinity (if `value` is positive) or negative infinity (if `value` is negative) is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`太大，以致於無法納入`float32 (F)`，正無限大 (如果`value`為正值) 或負的無限值 (如果`value`為負) 會傳回。

trans-unit.source: If overflow occurs converting one integer type to another, the high order bits are truncated.
trans-unit.target: 如果轉換一個整數類型之間發生溢位，則會截斷高序位位元。

trans-unit.source: If the result is smaller than an `int32`, the value is sign-extended to fill the slot.
trans-unit.target: 如果結果為小於`int32`，值是帶正負號擴充以填滿的位置。

trans-unit.source: If overflow occurs converting a floating-point type to an integer the value returned is unspecified.
trans-unit.target: 如果發生溢位浮點類型轉換成整數傳回的值是 unspecified。

trans-unit.source: No exceptions are ever thrown when using this field.
trans-unit.target: 使用此欄位時，曾經會擲不回任何例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `conv.r4` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`conv.r4`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: 6D
trans-unit.target: 6D

trans-unit.source: conv.u4
trans-unit.target: conv.u4

trans-unit.source: Convert to `unsigned int32`, pushing `int32` on stack.
trans-unit.target: 將轉換成`unsigned int32`、 推送`int32`堆疊上。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: `value` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value` is popped from the stack and the conversion operation is attempted.
trans-unit.target: `value` 時會推出堆疊，並轉換從嘗試作業。

trans-unit.source: If the conversion is successful, the resulting value is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 如果轉換成功，會產生的值推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The `conv.u4` opcode converts the `value` on top of the stack to the type specified in the opcode, and leave that converted value on the top of the stack.
trans-unit.target: `conv.u4` Opcode 轉換`value`opcode 及轉換的堆疊頂端的值保持在指定的型別堆疊的頂端。

trans-unit.source: Integer values of less than 4 bytes are extended to `int32` when they are loaded onto the evaluation stack (unless `conv.i` or `conv.u` is used, in which case the result is also `native int`).
trans-unit.target: 小於 4 個位元組的整數值已擴充來`int32`載入至評估堆疊 (除非`conv.i`或`conv.u`使用時，結果在此情況下也是`native int`)。

trans-unit.source: Floating-point values are converted to the `F` type.
trans-unit.target: 浮點數的值會轉換成`F`型別。

trans-unit.source: Conversion from floating-point numbers to integer values truncates the number toward zero.
trans-unit.target: 將浮點數轉換為整數值會截斷趨近於零的數字。

trans-unit.source: When converting from an `float64` to an `float32`, precision can be lost.
trans-unit.target: 當轉換從`float64`至`float32`，有效位數，可能會遺失。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is too large to fit in a `float32 (F)`, positive infinity (if `value` is positive) or negative infinity (if `value` is negative) is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`太大，以致於無法納入`float32 (F)`，正無限大 (如果`value`為正值) 或負的無限值 (如果`value`為負) 會傳回。

trans-unit.source: If overflow occurs converting one integer type to another, the high order bits are truncated.
trans-unit.target: 如果轉換一個整數類型之間發生溢位，則會截斷高序位位元。

trans-unit.source: If the result is smaller than an `int32`, the value is sign-extended to fill the slot.
trans-unit.target: 如果結果為小於`int32`，值是帶正負號擴充以填滿的位置。

trans-unit.source: If overflow occurs converting a floating-point type to an integer the value returned is unspecified.
trans-unit.target: 如果發生溢位浮點類型轉換成整數傳回的值是 unspecified。

trans-unit.source: No exceptions are ever thrown when using this field.
trans-unit.target: 使用此欄位時，曾經會擲不回任何例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Conv_Ovf_I4> and <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Conv_Ovf_I4_Un> for equivalent instructions that will throw an exception when the result type can not properly represent the result value.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Conv_Ovf_I4>和<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Conv_Ovf_I4_Un>為對應的結果型別不可以正確地表示的結果值時將會擲回例外狀況的指示。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `conv.u4` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`conv.u4`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.source: `value` is pushed onto the stack.

trans-unit.source: `value` is popped from the stack and the conversion operation is attempted.

trans-unit.source: Floating-point values are converted to the `F` type.

trans-unit.source: If `value` is too large to fit in a `float32 (F)`, positive infinity (if `value` is positive) or negative infinity (if `value` is negative) is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`太大，以致於無法納入`float32 (F)`，正無限大 (如果`value`為正值) 或負的無限值 (如果`value`為負) 會傳回。

trans-unit.source: If overflow occurs converting one integer type to another, the high order bits are truncated.
trans-unit.target: 如果轉換一個整數類型之間發生溢位，則會截斷高序位位元。

trans-unit.source: If the result is smaller than an `int32`, the value is sign-extended to fill the slot.

trans-unit.target: 如果發生溢位浮點類型轉換成整數傳回的值是 unspecified。

trans-unit.target: 使用此欄位時，曾經會擲不回任何例外狀況。

trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Conv_Ovf_I8>和<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Conv_Ovf_I8_Un>為對應的結果型別不可以正確地表示的結果值時將會擲回例外狀況的指示。
