trans-unit.source: Floating-point values are expanded to their native size (type `F`).
trans-unit.target: 浮點數值會展開成其原生的大小 (型別`F`)。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `ldloc.2` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`ldloc.2`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.source: Loads the local variable at index 3 onto the evaluation stack.
trans-unit.target: 將位於索引 3 的區域變數載入至評估堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: ldloc.3
trans-unit.target: ldloc.3

trans-unit.source: Loads the local variable at index 3 onto the evaluation stack.
trans-unit.target: 將位於索引 3 的區域變數載入至評估堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: The local variable value at the index 3 is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 位於索引 3 的區域變數值推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `ldloc.3` is an especially efficient encoding for <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Ldloc>, allowing access to the local variable at index 3.
trans-unit.target: `ldloc.3` 是有效的編碼方式，如<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Ldloc>，位於索引 3 允許本機變數的存取權。

trans-unit.source: The type of the value is the same as the type of the local variable, which is specified in the method header.
trans-unit.target: 值的類型是方法標頭中指定的本機變數的類型相同。

trans-unit.source: Local variables that are smaller than 4 bytes long are expanded to type `int32` when they are loaded onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 小於 4 個位元組長的本機變數會展開為輸入`int32`時載入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: Floating-point values are expanded to their native size (type `F`).
trans-unit.target: 浮點數值會展開成其原生的大小 (型別`F`)。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `ldloc.3` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`ldloc.3`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.source: Loads the local variable at a specific index onto the evaluation stack, short form.
trans-unit.target: 載入位於指定索引的區域變數至評估堆疊 (簡短形式)。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: 11 < `unsigned int8` >
trans-unit.target: 11 < `unsigned int8` >

trans-unit.source: ldloc.s `index`
trans-unit.target: ldloc.s `index`

trans-unit.source: Loads the local variable at index `index` onto stack, short form.
trans-unit.target: 載入位於索引的區域變數`index`至堆疊，簡短形式。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: The local variable value at the specified index is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 指定索引處的區域變數值推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The `ldloc.s` instruction pushes the contents of the local variable number at the passed index onto the evaluation stack, where the local variables are numbered 0 onwards.
trans-unit.target: `ldloc.s`指令推播通知的區域變數編號內容在傳遞的索引至評估堆疊，區域變數是從的 0 開始的位置。

trans-unit.source: Local variables are initialized to 0 before entering the method if the initialize flag on the method is true.
trans-unit.target: 之前輸入的方法，如果在方法上的初始化旗標為 true，本機變數會初始化為 0。

trans-unit.source: There are 256 (2^8) local variables possible (0-255) in the short form, which is a more efficient encoding than `ldloc`.
trans-unit.target: 有 256 (2 ^8) 中的區域變數可能 (0-255) 的簡短形式，這是更有效率的編碼方式與`ldloc`。

trans-unit.source: The type of the value is the same as the type of the local variable, which is specified in the method header.
trans-unit.target: 值的類型是方法標頭中指定的本機變數的類型相同。

trans-unit.source: See Partition I. Local variables that are smaller than 4 bytes long are expanded to type `int32` when they are loaded onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱小於 4 個位元組會展開成輸入的資料分割 I.本機變數`int32`時載入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: Floating-point values are expanded to their native size (type `F`).
trans-unit.target: 浮點數值會展開成其原生的大小 (型別`F`)。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overloads can use the `ldloc.s` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載可以使用`ldloc.s`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, LocalBuilder)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, LocalBuilder)

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, byte)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode，byte）

trans-unit.source: Loads the address of the local variable at a specific index onto the evaluation stack.
trans-unit.target: 載入位於指定索引的區域變數位址至評估堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: FE OD < `unsigned int16` >
trans-unit.target: FE OD < `unsigned int16` >

trans-unit.source: ldloca `index`
trans-unit.target: ldloca `index`

trans-unit.source: Loads the address of the local variable at `index` onto the evaluation stack.
trans-unit.target: 載入位於區域變數的位址`index`至評估堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: The address stored in the local variable at the specified index is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 儲存在位於指定索引的區域變數的位址被推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The `ldloca` instruction pushes the address of the local variable number at the passed index onto the stack, where local variables are numbered 0 onwards.
trans-unit.target: `ldloca`指令會推入數目的本機變數的位址位於傳遞至堆疊中，索引其中區域變數會從的 0 開始。

trans-unit.source: The value pushed on the stack is already aligned correctly for use with instructions like <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Ldind_I> and <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Stind_I>.
trans-unit.target: 推入堆疊的值已正確對齊用於指示像<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Ldind_I>和<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Stind_I>。

trans-unit.source: The result is a transient pointer (type `*`).
trans-unit.target: 結果是暫時性的指標 (類型`*`)。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `ldloca` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`ldloca`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, short)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, short)

trans-unit.source: Loads the address of the local variable at a specific index onto the evaluation stack, short form.
trans-unit.target: 載入位於指定索引的區域變數位址至評估堆疊 (簡短形式)。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: 12 < `unsigned int8` >
trans-unit.target: 12 < `unsigned int8` >

trans-unit.source: ldloca.s `index`
trans-unit.target: ldloca.s `index`

trans-unit.source: Loads the address of the local variable at `index` onto the evaluation stack, short form.
trans-unit.target: 載入位於區域變數的位址`index`至評估堆疊，簡短形式。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: The address stored in the local variable at the specified index is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 儲存在位於指定索引的區域變數的位址被推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The `ldloca.s` instruction pushes the address of the local variable number at the passed index onto the stack, where local variables are numbered 0 onwards.
trans-unit.target: `ldloca.s`指令會推入數目的本機變數的位址位於傳遞至堆疊中，索引其中區域變數會從的 0 開始。

trans-unit.source: The value pushed on the stack is already aligned correctly for use with instructions like <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Ldind_I> and <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Stind_I>.
trans-unit.target: 推入堆疊的值已正確對齊用於指示像<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Ldind_I>和<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Stind_I>。

trans-unit.source: The result is a transient pointer (type `*`).
trans-unit.target: 結果是暫時性的指標 (類型`*`)。

trans-unit.source: The `ldloca.s` instruction provides an efficient encoding for use with the local variables 0 through 255.
trans-unit.target: `ldloca.s`指令提供有效的編碼方式，使用以 0 到 255 的本機變數。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `ldloca.s` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`ldloca.s`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, byte)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode，byte）

trans-unit.source: Pushes a null reference (type <see langword="O" />) onto the evaluation stack.
trans-unit.target: 推入 Null 參考 (型別 <see langword="O" />) 至評估堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: ldnull
trans-unit.target: ldnull

trans-unit.source: push a null reference onto the stack
trans-unit.target: 推送至堆疊的 null 參考

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: A null object reference is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: Null 物件的參考會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `ldnull` pushes a null reference (type `O`) on the stack.
trans-unit.target: `ldnull` 推播通知為 null 參考 (類型`O`) 堆疊上。

trans-unit.source: This is used to initialize locations before they are populated with data, or when they become deprecated.
trans-unit.target: 這用來初始化之前會填入資料，或在它們被取代的位置。

trans-unit.source: `ldnull` provides a null reference that is size-independent.
trans-unit.target: `ldnull` 提供與大小無關的 null 參考。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `ldnull` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`ldnull`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.source: Copies the value type object pointed to by an address to the top of the evaluation stack.
trans-unit.target: 複製位址所指向的實值類型物件到評估堆疊的頂端。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: ldobj `class`
trans-unit.target: ldobj `class`

trans-unit.source: Copy instance of value type `class` to the stack.
trans-unit.target: 實值類型的複本執行個體`class`的堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: The address of a value type object is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 實值類型物件的位址被推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The address is popped from the stack and the instance at that particular address is looked up.
trans-unit.target: 從堆疊推出位址，並在該特定位址的執行個體查閱。

trans-unit.source: The value of the object stored at that address is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 儲存在該位址之物件的值會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The `ldobj` instruction is used to pass a value type as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: `ldobj`指示用來做為參數傳遞實值類型。

trans-unit.source: The `ldobj` instruction copies the value pointed to by `addrOfValObj` (of type `&`, `*`, or `native int`) to the top of the stack.
trans-unit.target: `ldobj`指令會將指向的值複製`addrOfValObj`(型別`&`， `*`，或`native int`) 至堆疊的頂端。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes copied depends on the size of the class (as specified by the `class` parameter).
trans-unit.target: 複製的位元組數目取決於類別的大小 (依指定`class`參數)。

trans-unit.source: The `class` parameter is a metadata token representing the value type.
trans-unit.target: `class`參數是代表實值型別中繼資料語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: The operation of the `ldobj` instruction can be altered by an immediately preceding <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Volatile> or <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Unaligned> prefix instruction.
trans-unit.target: 作業`ldobj`可以更改指令前面<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Volatile>或<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Unaligned>指令的前置詞。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.TypeLoadException> is thrown if class cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TypeLoadException> 如果找不到類別，會擲回。

trans-unit.source: This is typically detected when the Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instruction is converted to native code rather than at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 這通常是偵測到的 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 指令轉換為原生程式碼，而不是在執行階段時。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `ldobj` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`ldobj`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

trans-unit.source: Pushes the value of a static field onto the evaluation stack.
trans-unit.target: 推送靜態欄位的值至評估堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: ldsfld `field`
trans-unit.target: ldsfld `field`

trans-unit.source: Push the value of `field` on the stack.
trans-unit.target: 推入的值`field`堆疊上。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: The value of the specific field is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 特定欄位的值會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The `ldsfld` instruction pushes the value of a static (shared among all instances of a class) field on the stack.
trans-unit.target: `ldsfld`指令會推入靜態 （在類別的所有執行個體之間共用） 的值在堆疊上的欄位。

trans-unit.source: The return type is that associated with the passed metadata token `field`.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞的中繼資料語彙基元相關聯的傳回型別是`field`。

trans-unit.source: The `ldsfld` instruction can have a <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Volatile> prefix.
trans-unit.target: `ldsfld`指令可以有<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Volatile>前置詞。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `ldsfld` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`ldsfld`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, FieldInfo)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, FieldInfo)

trans-unit.source: Pushes the address of a static field onto the evaluation stack.
trans-unit.target: 推送靜態欄位的位址至評估堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: ldsflda `field`
trans-unit.target: ldsflda `field`

trans-unit.source: Push the address of `field` on the stack
trans-unit.target: 推送的位址`field`堆疊上

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: The address of a specific field is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 特定欄位的位址被推入堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The `ldsflda` instruction pushes the address of a static (shared among all instances of a class) field on the stack.
trans-unit.target: `ldsflda`指令會推入靜態 （在類別的所有執行個體之間共用） 的地址欄位在堆疊上。

trans-unit.source: The address may be represented as a transient pointer (type `*`) if the metadata token `field` refers to a type whose memory is managed.
trans-unit.target: 位址可表示為暫時性指標 (類型`*`) 如果中繼資料語彙基元`field`參考管理其記憶體的型別。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it corresponds to an unmanaged pointer (type `native int`).
trans-unit.target: 否則，它會對應至 unmanaged 指標 (類型`native int`)。

trans-unit.source: Note that `field` may be a static global with an assigned relative virtual address (the offset of the field from the base address at which its containing PE file is loaded into memory) where the memory is unmanaged.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，`field`可能是靜態指派的相對虛擬位址 （基底位址，其包含的 PE 檔載入記憶體中的欄位位移） 與全域所在 unmanaged 記憶體。

trans-unit.source: The `ldsflda` instruction can have a <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Volatile> prefix.
trans-unit.target: `ldsflda`指令可以有<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Volatile>前置詞。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.MissingFieldException> is thrown if field is not found in the metadata.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.MissingFieldException> 如果在中繼資料中找不到欄位，會擲回。

trans-unit.source: This is typically checked when Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions are converted to native code, not at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 這通常會檢查 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 指示轉換成原生程式碼，不在執行階段時。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `ldsflda` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`ldsflda`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, FieldInfo)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, FieldInfo)

trans-unit.source: Pushes a new object reference to a string literal stored in the metadata.
trans-unit.target: 推送新的物件參考至儲存於中繼資料的字串常值 (String Literal)。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: ldstr `mdToken`
trans-unit.target: ldstr `mdToken`

trans-unit.source: Pushes a string object for the metadata string token `mdToken`.
trans-unit.target: 推播通知的中繼資料字串語彙基元的字串物件`mdToken`。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: An object reference to a string is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 字串物件參考推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The `ldstr` instruction pushes an object reference (type `O`) to a new string object representing the specific string literal stored in the metadata.
trans-unit.target: `ldstr`指令的物件參考推送 (型別`O`) 成新的字串物件，代表特定字串常值儲存在中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: The `ldstr` instruction allocates the requisite amount of memory and performs any format conversion required to convert the string literal from the form used in the file to the string format required at runtime.
trans-unit.target: `ldstr`指令會配置必要的記憶體量，並進行任何必要轉換在執行階段所需的字串格式檔案中所使用的形式的字串常值的格式轉換。

trans-unit.source: The Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) guarantees that the result of two `ldstr` instructions referring to two metadata tokens that have the same sequence of characters return precisely the same string object (a process known as "string interning").
trans-unit.target: 通用語言基礎結構 (CLI) 可確保兩個結果`ldstr`兩個具有相同的字元序列的中繼資料語彙基元所參考的指示會傳回精確的說相同的字串物件 （稱為 「 字串拘留 」 的程序）。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `ldstr` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`ldstr`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, string)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, string)

trans-unit.source: Converts a metadata token to its runtime representation, pushing it onto the evaluation stack.
trans-unit.target: 將中繼資料語彙基元轉換成它的執行階段表示，並將它推送至評估堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: ldtoken `token`
trans-unit.target: ldtoken `token`

trans-unit.source: Converts a metadata token to its runtime representation.
trans-unit.target: 將中繼資料語彙基元轉換成它的執行階段表示。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: The passed token is converted to a `RuntimeHandle` and pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞的語彙基元會轉換成`RuntimeHandle`和推入堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The `ldtoken` instruction pushes a `RuntimeHandle` for the specified metadata token.
trans-unit.target: `ldtoken`指令推播通知`RuntimeHandle`指定的中繼資料語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: A `RuntimeHandle` can be a `fieldref/fielddef`, a `methodref/methoddef`, or a `typeref/typedef`.
trans-unit.target: A`RuntimeHandle`可以`fieldref/fielddef`、 `methodref/methoddef`，或`typeref/typedef`。

trans-unit.source: The value pushed on the stack can be used in calls to `Reflection` methods in the system class library.
trans-unit.target: 推入堆疊的值可用於呼叫`Reflection`系統類別庫中的方法。

trans-unit.source: For information on runtime handles, see the following classes: <xref:System.RuntimeFieldHandle>, <xref:System.RuntimeTypeHandle>, and <xref:System.RuntimeMethodHandle>.
trans-unit.target: 在執行階段控制代碼上的資訊，請參閱下列類別： <xref:System.RuntimeFieldHandle>， <xref:System.RuntimeTypeHandle>，和<xref:System.RuntimeMethodHandle>。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overloads can use the `ldtoken` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載可以使用`ldtoken`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, MethodInfo)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode，MethodInfo）

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, FieldInfo)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, FieldInfo)

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

trans-unit.source: Pushes an unmanaged pointer (type <see langword="native int" />) to the native code implementing a particular virtual method associated with a specified object onto the evaluation stack.
trans-unit.target: 推入實作與指定的物件相關聯的特定虛擬方法之機器碼的 Unmanaged 指標 (型別 <see langword="native int" />) 至評估堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: ldvirtftn `method`
trans-unit.target: ldvirtftn `method`

trans-unit.source: Pushes the pointer to an object's virtual method `method` on the stack.
trans-unit.target: 將指標物件的虛擬方法推入`method`堆疊上。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: An object reference is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 物件參考推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The object reference is popped from the stack and the address of the entry point to the method (as specified by the metadata token `method`) is looked up.
trans-unit.target: 從堆疊] 和 [進入點位址推出物件參考給方法 (依中繼資料語彙基元的指定`method`) 查詢。

trans-unit.source: The pointer to `method` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 將指標`method`推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The resulting unmanaged pointer pushed onto the stack by the `ldvirtftn` instruction can be called using the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Calli> instruction if it references a managed method (or a stub that transitions from managed to unmanaged code).
trans-unit.target: 產生 unmanaged 的指標推入至堆疊方式`ldvirtftn`指令可以使用呼叫<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Calli>如果參考的 managed 的方法 （或從 managed 轉換到 unmanaged 程式碼 stub） 的指示。

trans-unit.source: The unmanaged pointer points to native code using the CLR calling convention.
trans-unit.target: Unmanaged 的指標會指向使用 CLR 的呼叫慣例的原生程式碼。

trans-unit.source: This method pointer should not be passed to unmanaged native code as a callback routine.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的指標不應該傳遞至未受管理的原生程式碼中，但會當做回呼常式。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `ldvirtftn` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`ldvirtftn`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, MethodInfo)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode，MethodInfo）

trans-unit.source: Exits a protected region of code, unconditionally transferring control to a specific target instruction.
trans-unit.target: 結束程式碼的保護區，無條件地將控制權傳輸至特定的目標指令。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: DD < `int32` >
trans-unit.target: DD < `int32` >

trans-unit.source: leave `target`
trans-unit.target: 保留 `target`

trans-unit.source: Exits a protected region of code.
trans-unit.target: 受保護的區域的程式碼就會結束。

trans-unit.source: There is no stack transition behavior specified for this instruction.
trans-unit.target: 不沒有指定此指示任何堆疊轉換行為。

trans-unit.source: The `leave` instruction unconditionally transfers control to the specific target instruction, represented as a 4-byte signed offset from the beginning of the instruction following the current instruction.
trans-unit.target: `leave`指令無條件地將控制權傳輸至特定目標指令，表示成 4 位元組帶正負號位移從緊跟在目前指令的開頭。

trans-unit.source: The `leave` instruction is similar to the `br` instruction, but it can be used to exit a `try`, `filter`, or `catch` block whereas the ordinary branch instructions can only be used in such a block to transfer control within it.
trans-unit.target: `leave`指示是類似於`br`指令，但它可以用來結束`try`， `filter`，或`catch`封鎖而一般分支指示僅能在這類區塊傳輸中的控制項它。

trans-unit.source: The `leave` instruction empties the evaluation stack and ensures that the appropriate surrounding `finally` blocks are executed.
trans-unit.target: `leave`指令會清空評估堆疊，並確保適當的周圍`finally`區塊會執行。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use a `leave` instruction to exit a `finally` block.
trans-unit.target: 您無法使用`leave`指令，以便結束`finally`區塊。

trans-unit.source: To ease code generation for exception handlers it is valid from within a catch block to use a `leave` instruction to transfer control to any instruction within the associated `try` block.
trans-unit.target: 為了簡化從 catch 區塊內使用有效的例外狀況處理常式的程式碼產生`leave`指令，以便將控制權轉移至中相關聯的任何指令`try`區塊。

trans-unit.source: If an instruction has one or more prefix codes, control can only be transferred to the first of these prefixes.
trans-unit.target: 指令會有一或多個前置詞程式碼，如果控制項只傳送到第一個一個前置詞。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overloads can use the `leave` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載可以使用`leave`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Label)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode，標籤）

trans-unit.source: Exits a protected region of code, unconditionally transferring control to a target instruction (short form).
trans-unit.target: 結束程式碼的保護區，無條件地將控制權傳輸至目標指令 (簡短形式)。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: DE < `int8` >
trans-unit.target: DE < `int8` >

trans-unit.source: leave.s `target`
trans-unit.target: leave.s `target`

trans-unit.source: Exit a protected region of code, short form.
trans-unit.target: 結束受保護的區域，程式碼，簡短形式。

trans-unit.source: There is no stack transition behavior specified for this instruction.
trans-unit.target: 不沒有指定此指示任何堆疊轉換行為。

trans-unit.source: The `leave.s` instruction unconditionally transfers control to the passed target instruction, represented as a 1-byte signed offset from the beginning of the instruction following the current instruction.
trans-unit.target: `leave.s`指令無條件地將控制權傳輸至傳遞的目標指令，表示為 1 個位元組帶正負號的位移，從開頭緊跟在目前的指令。

trans-unit.source: The `leave.s` instruction is similar to the `br` instruction, but it can be used to exit a `try`, `filter`, or `catch` block whereas the ordinary branch instructions can only be used in such a block to transfer control within it.
trans-unit.target: `leave.s`指示是類似於`br`指令，但它可以用來結束`try`， `filter`，或`catch`封鎖而一般分支指示僅能在這類區塊傳輸中的控制項它。

trans-unit.source: The `leave.s` instruction empties the evaluation stack and ensures that the appropriate surrounding `finally` blocks are executed.
trans-unit.target: `leave.s`指令會清空評估堆疊，並確保適當的周圍`finally`區塊會執行。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use a `leave.s` instruction to exit a `finally` block.
trans-unit.target: 您無法使用`leave.s`指令，以便結束`finally`區塊。

trans-unit.source: To ease code generation for exception handlers it is valid from within a catch block to use a `leave.s` instruction to transfer control to any instruction within the associated `try` block.
trans-unit.target: 為了簡化從 catch 區塊內使用有效的例外狀況處理常式的程式碼產生`leave.s`指令，以便將控制權轉移至中相關聯的任何指令`try`區塊。

trans-unit.source: If an instruction has one or more prefix codes, control can only be transferred to the first of these prefixes.
trans-unit.target: 指令會有一或多個前置詞程式碼，如果控制項只傳送到第一個一個前置詞。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `leave.s` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`leave.s`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Label)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode，標籤）

trans-unit.source: Allocates a certain number of bytes from the local dynamic memory pool and pushes the address (a transient pointer, type <see langword="*" />) of the first allocated byte onto the evaluation stack.
trans-unit.target: 從區域動態記憶體集區中配置某些數量的位元組，並將第一個配置的位元組的位址 (暫時性指標，型別 <see langword="*" />) 推入至評估堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: FE 0F
trans-unit.target: FE 0F

trans-unit.source: localloc
trans-unit.target: localloc

trans-unit.source: Allocate space from the local heap.
trans-unit.target: 從本機堆積中配置空間。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to be allocated is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 要配置的位元組數會推送到堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes is popped from the stack; an amount of memory corresponding to the size is allocated from the local heap.
trans-unit.target: 從堆疊，則會彈出的位元組數目，從本機堆積配置大小相對應的記憶體數量。

trans-unit.source: A pointer to the first byte of the allocated memory is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 配置的記憶體中的第一個位元組的指標會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The `localloc` instruction allocates `size` (type `natural unsigned int`) bytes from the local dynamic memory pool and returns the address (a transient pointer, type `*`) of the first allocated byte.
trans-unit.target: `localloc`指令配置`size`(型別`natural unsigned int`) 位元組從區域的動態記憶體集區，並將位址傳回 (暫時性指標、 型別`*`) 配置的第一個位元組。

trans-unit.source: The block of memory returned is initialized to 0 only if the initialize flag on the method is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 只有在方法上的初始化旗標是初始化為 0 的記憶體區塊傳回`true`。

trans-unit.source: When the current method executes a <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Ret>, the local memory pool is made available for reuse.
trans-unit.target: 當目前的方法執行<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Ret>，本機記憶體集區可供重複使用。

trans-unit.source: The resulting address is aligned so that any primitive data type can be stored there using the `stind` instructions (such as <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Stind_I4>) and loaded using the `ldind` instructions (such as <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Ldind_I4>).
trans-unit.target: 產生的位址對齊使任何基本資料類型可以儲存在該處使用`stind`指示 (例如<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Stind_I4>) 和使用載入`ldind`指示 (例如<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Ldind_I4>)。

trans-unit.source: The `localloc` instruction cannot occur within a `filter`, `catch`, `finally`, or `fault` block.
trans-unit.target: `localloc`指令不能出現在`filter`， `catch`， `finally`，或`fault`區塊。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.StackOverflowException> is thrown if there is insufficient memory to service the request.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.StackOverflowException> 如果記憶體不足，無法服務此要求，會擲回。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `localloc` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`localloc`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.source: Pushes a typed reference to an instance of a specific type onto the evaluation stack.
trans-unit.target: 將特定類型的執行個體之類型參考推送至評估堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: mkrefany `class`
trans-unit.target: mkrefany 使用 `class`

trans-unit.source: Pushes a typed reference of type `class` onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 具類型的參考類型的推播通知`class`至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: A pointer to piece of data is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 指標的資料推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The pointer is popped and converted to a typed reference of type `class`.
trans-unit.target: 取出並轉換成具類型的參考類型的指標`class`。

trans-unit.source: The typed reference is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 具類型的參考會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The `mkrefany` instruction supports the passing of dynamically typed references.
trans-unit.target: `mkrefany`指令支援動態具型別的參考傳遞。

trans-unit.source: The pointer must be of type `&`, `*`, or `native int`, and hold the valid address of a piece of data.
trans-unit.target: 滑鼠指標必須是型別`&`， `*`，或`native int`，並保留一段資料的有效位址。

trans-unit.source: `Class` is the class token describing the type of the data referenced by the pointer.
trans-unit.target: `Class` 類別語彙基元描述資料指標所參考的類型。

trans-unit.source: `Mkrefany` pushes a typed reference on the stack, providing an opaque descriptor of the pointer and the type `class`.
trans-unit.target: `Mkrefany` 將具類型的參考推送至堆疊，並提供指標和類型的不透明的描述元`class`。

trans-unit.source: The only valid operation permitted upon a typed reference is to pass it to a method that requires a typed reference as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 允許在具類型的參考時唯一有效的作業是將它傳遞到要求做為參數的型別的參考的方法。

trans-unit.source: The callee can then use the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Refanytype> and <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Refanyval> instructions to retrieve the type (class) and the address respectively.
trans-unit.target: 被呼叫端可以使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Refanytype>和<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Refanyval>分別擷取的型別 （類別） 與位址的指示。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.TypeLoadException> is thrown if `class` cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TypeLoadException> 如果擲回`class`找不到。

trans-unit.source: This is typically detected when Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions are converted to native code rather than at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 這通常是偵測到 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 指示轉換為原生程式碼，而不是在執行階段時。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `mkrefany` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`mkrefany`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

trans-unit.source: Multiplies two values and pushes the result on the evaluation stack.
trans-unit.target: 將兩個值相乘，並將結果推送至評估堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: 5A
trans-unit.target: 5A

trans-unit.source: mul
trans-unit.target: mul

trans-unit.source: Multiplies two values on the stack.
trans-unit.target: 將在堆疊上的兩個值相乘。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: `value1` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value1` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `value1` is multiplied by `value2`.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 和`value1`取出從堆疊。`value1`乘以`value2`。

trans-unit.source: The result is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 結果會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The `mul` instruction multiplies `value1` by `value2` and pushes the result on the stack.
trans-unit.target: `mul`指令乘以`value1`由`value2`並將結果推至堆疊上。

trans-unit.source: Integer operations silently truncate the upper bits on overflow.
trans-unit.target: 整數運算以無訊息模式截斷發生溢位較高的位元。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Mul_Ovf> for an integer-specific multiply operation with overflow handling.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Mul_Ovf>整數特定乘溢位處理作業。

trans-unit.source: For floating-point types, 0 * infinity = NaN.
trans-unit.target: 浮點類型，0 * 無限大 = NaN。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `mul` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`mul`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.source: Multiplies two integer values, performs an overflow check, and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.
trans-unit.target: 將兩個整數值相乘、執行溢位檢查，並將結果推送至評估堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: D8
trans-unit.target: D8

trans-unit.source: mul.ovf
trans-unit.target: mul.ovf

trans-unit.source: Multiplies two integer values on the stack with an overflow check.
trans-unit.target: 將具有溢位檢查的堆疊上的兩個整數值相乘。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: `value1` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value1` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `value1` is multiplied by `value2`, with an overflow check.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 和`value1`取出從堆疊。`value1`乘以`value2`，有溢位檢查。

trans-unit.source: The result is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 結果會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The `mul.ovf` instruction multiplies integer `value1` by integer `value2` and pushes the result on the stack.
trans-unit.target: `mul.ovf`指令乘以整數`value1`由整數`value2`並將結果推至堆疊上。

trans-unit.source: An exception is thrown if the result will not fit in the result type.
trans-unit.target: 如果結果不符合的結果型別，則會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.OverflowException> is thrown if the result can not be represented in the result type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.OverflowException> 如果結果不會顯示結果型別，會擲回。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `mul.ovf` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`mul.ovf`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.source: Multiplies two unsigned integer values, performs an overflow check, and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.
trans-unit.target: 將兩個不帶正負號的整數值相乘、執行溢位檢查，再將結果推送至評估堆疊。

trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: D9
trans-unit.target: D9

trans-unit.source: mul.ovf.un
trans-unit.target: mul.ovf.un

trans-unit.source: Multiplies two unsigned values on the stack with an overflow check.
trans-unit.target: 乘上兩個不帶正負號的值有溢位檢查堆疊上。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: `value1` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value1` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `value1` is multiplied by `value2`, with an overflow check.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 和`value1`取出從堆疊。`value1`乘以`value2`，有溢位檢查。

trans-unit.source: The result is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 結果會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The `mul.ovf.un` instruction multiplies unsigned integer `value1` by unsigned integer `value2` and pushes the result on the stack.
trans-unit.target: `mul.ovf.un`指示將不帶正負號的整數`value1`的不帶正負號的整數`value2`並將結果推至堆疊上。

trans-unit.source: An exception is thrown if the result will not fit in the result type.
trans-unit.target: 如果結果不符合的結果型別，則會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.OverflowException> is thrown if the result can not be represented in the result type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.OverflowException> 如果結果不會顯示結果型別，會擲回。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `mul.ovf.un` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`mul.ovf.un`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.source: Negates a value and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.
trans-unit.target: 將值變成相反值，並將結果推送至評估堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: neg
trans-unit.target: 協商

trans-unit.source: Negates the value currently on top of the stack.
trans-unit.target: 堆疊頂端的目前值的否定運算。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: A value is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 值，會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: A value is popped from the stack and negated.
trans-unit.target: 值，從堆疊取出並相反值。

trans-unit.source: The result is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 結果會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The `neg` instruction negates value and pushes the result on top of the stack.
trans-unit.target: `neg`指令變換正負號的值，並將結果的堆疊的頂端。

trans-unit.source: The return type is the same as the operand type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回類型是運算元類型相同。

trans-unit.source: Negation of integral values is standard two's complement negation.
trans-unit.target: 整數值的否定是標準二補數否定。

trans-unit.source: In particular, negating the most negative number (which does not have a positive counterpart) yields the most negative number.
trans-unit.target: 特別是，否定最大負數數字 （沒有對應的正數） 會產生最大負數的數字。

trans-unit.source: To detect this overflow use the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Sub_Ovf> instruction instead (that is, subtract from 0).
trans-unit.target: 若要偵測此溢位，請使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Sub_Ovf>指令改用 （也就是從 0 減）。

trans-unit.source: Negating a floating-point number cannot overflow, and negating NaN returns NaN.
trans-unit.target: 將浮點數值不能溢位，並取消 NaN 傳回 NaN。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `neg` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`neg`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.source: Pushes an object reference to a new zero-based, one-dimensional array whose elements are of a specific type onto the evaluation stack.
trans-unit.target: 將新的以零為起始一維陣列 (其項目屬於特定類型) 的物件參考推送至評估堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: newarr `etype`
trans-unit.target: newarr `etype`

trans-unit.source: Creates a new array with elements of type `etype`.
trans-unit.target: 建立新的陣列型別的項目與`etype`。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the array is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 陣列中的項目數會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements is popped from the stack and the array is created.
trans-unit.target: 從堆疊推出的項目數，並在建立陣列。

trans-unit.source: An object reference to the new array is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 新陣列的物件參考推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The `newarr` instruction pushes an object reference (type `O`) to a new zero-based, one-dimensional array whose elements are of type `etype` (a metadata token describing the type).
trans-unit.target: `newarr`指令的物件參考推送 (型別`O`) 到新以零為起始的一維陣列的元素屬於類型`etype`（描述類型的中繼資料語彙基元）。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the new array should be specified as a `native int`.
trans-unit.target: 新陣列中的項目數目應該指定為`native int`。

trans-unit.source: Valid array indexes range from zero to the maximum number of elements minus one.
trans-unit.target: 陣列的有效索引範圍是從零到最大項目數減一。

trans-unit.source: The elements of an array can be any type, including value types.
trans-unit.target: 陣列的項目可以是任何類型，包括實值類型。

trans-unit.source: Zero-based, one-dimensional arrays of numbers are created using a metadata token referencing the appropriate value type (<xref:System.Int32>, and so on).
trans-unit.target: 數字的以零為起始的一維陣列會建立使用參考適當的值類型的中繼資料語彙基元 (<xref:System.Int32>等等)。

trans-unit.source: Elements of the array are initialized to 0 of the appropriate type.
trans-unit.target: 陣列的元素會初始化為 0 的適當類型。

trans-unit.source: Nonzero-based one-dimensional arrays and multidimensional arrays are created using <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Newobj> rather than `newarr`.
trans-unit.target: Nonzero-根據一維陣列和多維度陣列則會使用建立<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Newobj>而不是`newarr`。

trans-unit.source: More commonly, they are created using the methods of the <xref:System.Array> class in the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 通常，它們會建立使用的方法<xref:System.Array>.NET Framework 中的類別。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.OutOfMemoryException> is thrown if there is insufficient memory to satisfy the request.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.OutOfMemoryException> 如果沒有記憶體不足，無法滿足要求，會擲回。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.OverflowException> is thrown if `numElems` is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.OverflowException> 如果擲回`numElems`小於 0。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `newarr` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`newarr`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

trans-unit.source: Creates a new object or a new instance of a value type, pushing an object reference (type <see langword="O" />) onto the evaluation stack.
trans-unit.target: 建立實值型別的新物件或新執行個體，將物件參考 (型別 <see langword="O" />) 推入至評估堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: newobj `ctor`
trans-unit.target: newobj `ctor`

trans-unit.source: Allocates an uninitialized object or value type and calls the constructor method `ctor`.
trans-unit.target: 配置未初始化的物件或實值類型，並呼叫建構函式方法`ctor`。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: Arguments `arg1` through `argn` are pushed on the stack in sequence.
trans-unit.target: 引數`arg1`透過`argn`順序推入堆疊。

trans-unit.source: Arguments `argn` through `arg1` are popped from the stack and passed to `ctor` for object creation.
trans-unit.target: 引數`argn`透過`arg1`會從堆疊取出並傳遞給`ctor`建立物件。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the new object is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 新物件的參考會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The `newobj` instruction creates a new object or a new instance of a value type.
trans-unit.target: `newobj`指示建立新的物件或實值類型的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: `Ctor` is a metadata token (a `methodref` or `methoddef` that must be marked as a constructor) that indicates the name, class and signature of the constructor to call.
trans-unit.target: `Ctor` 為中繼資料語彙基元 (`methodref`或`methoddef`，必須標示為建構函式)，表示名稱、 類別和簽章的建構函式呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The `newobj` instruction allocates a new instance of the class associated with `ctor` and initializes all the fields in the new instance to 0 (of the proper type) or null references as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: `newobj`指令會配置與相關聯之類別的新執行個體`ctor`並初始化 0 （或適當的型別） 或 null 參考，適當地將新執行個體中的所有欄位。

trans-unit.source: It then calls the constructor `ctor` with the given arguments along with the newly created instance.
trans-unit.target: 然後它會呼叫建構函式`ctor`與指定的引數，以及新建立的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: After the constructor has been called, the now initialized object reference (type `O`) is pushed on the stack.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫建構函式之後，立即初始化物件參考 (類型`O`) 推送到堆疊上。

trans-unit.source: From the constructor's point of view, the uninitialized object is argument 0 and the other arguments passed to newobj follow in order.
trans-unit.target: 從建構函式的觀點來看，未初始化的物件是引數 0，而其他引數傳遞至 newobj 順序。

trans-unit.source: All zero-based, one-dimensional arrays are created using <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Newarr>, not `newobj`.
trans-unit.target: 使用建立所有的以零為起始的一維陣列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Newarr>，而非`newobj`。

trans-unit.source: On the other hand, all other arrays (more than one dimension, or one-dimensional but not zero-based) are created using `newobj`.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，所有其他陣列 （一個維度，或一維但未以零為起始） 會建立使用`newobj`。

trans-unit.source: Value types are not usually created using `newobj`.
trans-unit.target: 實值類型不通常會建立使用`newobj`。

trans-unit.source: They are usually allocated either as arguments or local variables, using `newarr` (for zero-based, one-dimensional arrays), or as fields of objects.
trans-unit.target: 它們通常會配置做為引數或本機變數，使用`newarr`（適用於以零為起始的一維陣列），或做為欄位的物件。

trans-unit.source: Once allocated, they are initialized using <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Initobj>.
trans-unit.target: 配置之後，它們會使用初始化<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Initobj>。

trans-unit.source: However, the `newobj` instruction can be used to create a new instance of a value type on the stack, that can then be passed as an argument, stored in a local, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 不過，`newobj`指令可以用來建立實值類型的新執行個體上的堆疊，接著可以傳遞做為引數，儲存在區域變數中等等。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.OutOfMemoryException> is thrown if there is insufficient memory to satisfy the request.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.OutOfMemoryException> 如果沒有記憶體不足，無法滿足要求，會擲回。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.MissingMethodException> is thrown if a constructor method `ctor` with the indicated name, class and signature could not be found.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.MissingMethodException> 如果建構函式方法會擲回`ctor`使用指定的名稱、 類別和簽章找不到。

trans-unit.source: This is typically detected when Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions are converted to native code, rather than at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 這通常是偵測到 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 指示轉換至原生程式碼，而不是在執行階段時。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `newobj` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`newobj`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, ConstructorInfo)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode，ConstructorInfo）

trans-unit.source: Fills space if opcodes are patched.
trans-unit.target: 如果已完成修補作業碼，則填滿空間。

trans-unit.source: No meaningful operation is performed although a processing cycle can be consumed.
trans-unit.target: 雖然會耗用處理循環，卻不會執行任何有意義的運算。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: nop
trans-unit.target: nop

trans-unit.source: Performs an operation without behavior.
trans-unit.target: 執行無行為的運算。

trans-unit.source: There is no stack transitional behavior defined for this instruction.
trans-unit.target: 不沒有定義此指示任何堆疊過渡期行為。

trans-unit.source: The `nop` operation does nothing.
trans-unit.target: `nop`作業不做任何動作。

trans-unit.source: It is intended to fill in space if opcodes are patched.
trans-unit.target: 它被要填滿空間中，如果已完成修補 opcode。

trans-unit.source: Computes the bitwise complement of the integer value on top of the stack and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack as the same type.
trans-unit.target: 計算堆疊頂端的整數值的位元補數 (Complement)，並將結果當做相同類型來推送至評估堆疊。

trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: not
trans-unit.target: not

trans-unit.source: Computes the bitwise complement of a value.
trans-unit.target: 計算值的位元補數。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: `value` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value` is popped from the stack and its bitwise complement computed.
trans-unit.target: `value` 從堆疊，而且其位元推出計算的補數。

trans-unit.source: The result is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 結果會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The `not` instruction computes the bitwise complement of an integer value and pushes the result onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `not`指令會計算整數值的位元補數，並將推送至堆疊的結果。

trans-unit.source: The return type is the same as the operand type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回類型是運算元類型相同。

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.source: Computes the bitwise OR of two integer values, returns an integer.
trans-unit.target: 計算位元或兩個整數值，傳回一個整數。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: `value1` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value1` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack and their bitwise OR computed.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 和`value1`自堆疊，而且其位元 OR 取出計算。

trans-unit.source: The result is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 結果會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The `or` instruction computes the bitwise OR of two values atop the stack, pushing the result onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `or`指令會計算推送至堆疊的結果位元 OR 堆疊頂端兩個值。

trans-unit.source: `Or` is an integer-specific operation.
trans-unit.target: `Or` 是整數特定作業。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the subsequent array address operation performs no type check at run time, and that it returns a managed pointer whose mutability is restricted.
trans-unit.target: 指定後續陣列位址作業在執行階段不執行任何類型檢查，且會傳回限制其變動性的 Managed 指標。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: FE 1E
trans-unit.target: FE 1E

trans-unit.source: readonly.
trans-unit.target: readonly。

trans-unit.source: Specify that the subsequent array address operation performs no type check at run time, and that it returns a managed pointer with restricted mutability.
trans-unit.target: 指定後續陣列位址作業會執行任何類型檢查，在執行階段，以及它在具有限制變動性傳回 managed 的指標。

trans-unit.source: This prefix can only appear immediately preceding the `ldelema` instruction and calls to the special `Address` method on arrays.
trans-unit.target: 此前置詞只能出現之前`ldelema`指令和呼叫特殊`Address`陣列上的方法。

trans-unit.source: Its effect on the subsequent operation is twofold:
trans-unit.target: 其會影響後續的作業有兩個：

trans-unit.source: At run time, no type check operation is performed.
trans-unit.target: 執行階段類型檢查會不執行任何作業。

trans-unit.source: Note that there is normally an implicit type check for the `ldelema` and `stelem` instructions when used on reference type arrays.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，通常隱含型別檢查`ldelema`和`stelem`參考上使用時的指示輸入陣列。

trans-unit.source: There is never a run-time type check for value classes, so `readonly` is a no-op in that case.
trans-unit.target: 都不會實值類別的執行階段類型檢查因此`readonly`在此情況下沒有任何作業。

trans-unit.source: The verifier treats the result of the address-of operation as a managed pointer with restricted mutability.
trans-unit.target: 檢查器視為 managed 指標具有限制變動性的地址的作業結果。

trans-unit.source: The pointer is said to have restricted mutability because the defining type controls whether the value can be mutated.
trans-unit.target: 指標就稱為具有限制變動，因為定義的類型可讓您控制是否可以變更值。

trans-unit.source: For value classes that expose no public fields or methods that update the value in place, the pointer is read-only (hence the name of the prefix).
trans-unit.target: 實值類別沒有公用欄位或更新的位置中的值的方法公開 （expose） 的指標是唯讀的 (因此前置詞的名稱)。

trans-unit.source: In particular, the classes representing primitive types (for example, System.Int32) do not expose mutators and thus are read-only.
trans-unit.target: 特別是，表示基本類型 (例如，System.Int32) 的類別會公開 mutator，因此對於是唯讀。

trans-unit.source: A managed pointer restricted in this fashion can be used only in the following ways:
trans-unit.target: 這種方式在受限制的 managed 的指標只能用於透過下列方式：

trans-unit.source: As the `object` parameter for the `ldfld`, `ldflda`, `stfld`, `call`, or`constrained callvirt` instructions.
trans-unit.target: 做為`object`參數`ldfld`， `ldflda`， `stfld`， `call`，或`constrained callvirt`指示。

trans-unit.source: As the `pointer` parameter to the `ldobj` instruction or to one of the `ldind` instructions.
trans-unit.target: 做為`pointer`參數`ldobj`指令或其中一個`ldind`指示。

trans-unit.source: As the `source` parameter to the `cpobj` instruction.
trans-unit.target: 做為`source`參數`cpobj`指令。

trans-unit.source: All other operations disallowed, including the `stobj`, `initobj`, or `mkrefany` operations, or any of the `stind` instructions.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他作業，包括`stobj`， `initobj`，或`mkrefany`作業，或任何`stind`指示。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of the `readonly` prefix is to avoid a type check when fetching an element from an array in generic code.
trans-unit.target: 目的`readonly`前置詞是以泛型程式碼中的陣列中擷取元素時，避免型別檢查。

trans-unit.source: For example, the expression `arr[i].m()`, where the element type of the array `arr` is a generic type that has been constrained to have an interface with method `m`, might compile to the following MSIL.
trans-unit.target: 例如，運算式`arr[i].m()`，其中的陣列型別`arr`是已被限於必須有一個介面，方法是泛型類型`m`，可能會編譯成下列 MSIL。

trans-unit.source: Without the `readonly` prefix, the `ldelema` instruction would perform a type check in the case where !0 was a reference type.
trans-unit.target: 不含`readonly`前置詞，`ldelema`指令案例中會執行類型檢查其中 ！ 0 是參考型別。

trans-unit.source: Not only is this type check inefficient, but it is semantically incorrect.
trans-unit.target: 不僅沒有效率，此類型檢查，但卻語意不正確。

trans-unit.source: The type check for `ldelema` is an exact match, which is too strong.
trans-unit.target: 類型檢查`ldelema`完全相符，也就是太強式。

trans-unit.source: If the array held subclasses of type !0, the code above would fail the type check.
trans-unit.target: 如果陣列類型的子類別 ！ 0，上述程式碼會失敗類型檢查。

trans-unit.source: The address of the array element is fetched, instead of the element itself, in order to have a handle for `arr[i]` that works for both value types and reference types, and thus can be passed to the `constrained callvirt` instruction.
trans-unit.target: 陣列元素的位址會擷取，而不是項目本身，以獲得的控制代碼`arr[i]`適用於同時實值類型和參考型別，並因此可傳遞至`constrained callvirt`指令。

trans-unit.source: In general it would be unsafe to skip the run-time check if the array held elements of a reference type.
trans-unit.target: 一般情況下將不安全，如果陣列是參考類型的項目，跳過執行階段檢查。

trans-unit.source: To be safe, it is necessary to ensure that no modifications to the array are made through this pointer.
trans-unit.target: 為了安全起見，就必須確定對陣列進行任何修改都會經過這個指標。

trans-unit.source: The verifier rules ensure this.
trans-unit.target: 驗證器規則可確保這。

trans-unit.source: The restricted managed pointer can be passed as the object of instance method calls, so it is not strictly speaking read-only for value types, but there is no type safety problem for value types.
trans-unit.target: 受限制的 managed 的指標可以傳遞物件的執行個體方法呼叫，因此它沒有嚴格唯讀，對於實值類型，但是是實值型別沒有型別安全問題。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `readonly` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`readonly`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the type token embedded in a typed reference.
trans-unit.target: 擷取內嵌於類型參考中的類型語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: FE 1D
trans-unit.target: FE 1D

trans-unit.source: refanytype
trans-unit.target: refanytype

trans-unit.source: Pushes the type token stored in a typed reference.
trans-unit.target: 推播通知儲存在具類型參考的類型語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: A value type reference is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 實值類型參考推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The typed reference is popped from the stack and its corresponding type token retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 具類型的參考從堆疊取出並擷取其對應的類型語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: The type token is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 類型語彙基元會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: A typed reference contains a type token and an address to an object instance.
trans-unit.target: 具類型的參考包含類型的語彙基元和物件執行個體的位址。

trans-unit.source: The `refanytype` instruction retrieves the type token embedded in the typed reference.
trans-unit.target: `refanytype`指令會擷取內嵌在型別參考的類型語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Mkrefany> instruction for information on creating typed references.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Mkrefany>如需有關建立詳細的指示輸入參考。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `refanytype` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`refanytype`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the address (type <see langword="&" />) embedded in a typed reference.
trans-unit.target: 擷取內嵌於型別參考中的位址 (型別 <see langword="&" />)。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: refanyval `type`
trans-unit.target: refanyval `type`

trans-unit.source: Pushes the address stored in a typed reference.
trans-unit.target: 推送位址儲存在具類型的參考。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: A value type reference is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 實值類型參考推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The typed reference is popped from the stack and the corresponding address retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 從堆疊取出具類型的參考，並擷取對應的位址。

trans-unit.source: The address is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 位址會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: A typed reference contains a type token and an address to an object instance.
trans-unit.target: 具類型的參考包含類型的語彙基元和物件執行個體的位址。

trans-unit.source: The `refanyval` instruction retrieves the address embedded in the a typed reference.
trans-unit.target: `refanyval`指令會擷取內嵌於位址具類型的參考。

trans-unit.source: The type embedded in the typed reference supplied on the stack must match the type specified by `type` (a metadata token, either a `typedef` or a `typeref`).
trans-unit.target: 內嵌在堆疊上提供的型別參考的類型必須符合所指定之類型`type`(中繼資料語彙基元，是`typedef`或`typeref`)。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Mkrefany> instruction for related content.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Mkrefany>相關內容的指示。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.InvalidCastException> is thrown if `type` is not identical to the type stored in the type reference (in this case, `type` is the class supplied to the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Mkrefany> instruction that constructed said typed reference).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.InvalidCastException> 如果擲回`type`不相同的型別參考類型 (在此情況下，`type`類別提供給<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Mkrefany>建構指令稱為具類型的參考)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.TypeLoadException> is thrown if `type` cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TypeLoadException> 如果擲回`type`找不到。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `refanyval` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`refanyval`作業碼：
