trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

trans-unit.source: Divides two values and pushes the remainder onto the evaluation stack.
trans-unit.target: 將兩個值相除，並將餘數推送至評估堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: 5D
trans-unit.target: 5D

trans-unit.source: rem
trans-unit.target: rem

trans-unit.source: Pushes the remainder of dividing `value1` by `value2` onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 將餘數推送`value1`由`value2`至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: ReplaceThisText
trans-unit.target: ReplaceThisText

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: A `value1` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: A`value1`推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack and the remainder of `value1` `div` `value2` computed.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 和`value1`從堆疊，而且的其餘部分會推出`value1` `div` `value2`計算。

trans-unit.source: The result is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 結果會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `result` = `value1` `rem` `value2` satisfies the following conditions:
trans-unit.target: `result` = `value1` `rem` `value2` 符合下列條件：

trans-unit.source: `result` = `value1` - `value2` `×` (`value1` `div` `value2`), and:
trans-unit.target: `result` = `value1` - `value2` `×` (`value1` `div` `value2`)，以及：

trans-unit.source: 0 = | `result` | < | `value2` |, sign(`result`) = sign(`value1`), where `div` is the division instruction that truncates towards zero.
trans-unit.target: 0 = | `result` | < | `value2` |，標誌 (`result`) = 號 (`value1`)，其中`div`為除法指令會截斷推向零。

trans-unit.source: If `value2` is zero or `value1` is infinity the result is NaN.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value2`為零或`value1`是的無限大的結果為 NaN。

trans-unit.source: If `value2` is infinity, the result is `value1` (negated for `-infinity`).
trans-unit.target: 如果`value2`是無限大，結果是`value1`(否定的`-infinity`)。

trans-unit.source: Integral operations throw <xref:System.DivideByZeroException> if `value2` is zero.
trans-unit.target: 整數類資料的作業會擲回<xref:System.DivideByZeroException>如果`value2`為零。

trans-unit.source: Note that on the Intel-based platforms an <xref:System.OverflowException> is thrown when computing (minint `rem` -1).
trans-unit.target: 請注意，在 Intel 平台上<xref:System.OverflowException>計算時，就會擲回 (minint `rem` -1)。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `rem` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`rem`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.source: Divides two unsigned values and pushes the remainder onto the evaluation stack.
trans-unit.target: 將兩個不帶正負號的值相除，並將餘數推送至評估堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: 5E
trans-unit.target: 5E

trans-unit.source: rem.un
trans-unit.target: rem.un

trans-unit.source: Pushes the remainder of dividing unsigned `value1` by unsigned `value2` onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 將餘數推送不帶正負號`value1`的不帶正負號`value2`至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: `value1` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value1` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack and the remainder of `value1` `div` `value2` computed.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 和`value1`從堆疊，而且的其餘部分會推出`value1` `div` `value2`計算。

trans-unit.source: The result is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 結果會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `result` = `value1` `rem.un` `value2` satisfies the following conditions:
trans-unit.target: `result` = `value1` `rem.un` `value2` 符合下列條件：

trans-unit.source: `result` = `value1` - `value2` x(`value1` `div.un` `value2`), and:
trans-unit.target: `result` = `value1` - `value2` x (`value1` `div.un` `value2`)，以及：

trans-unit.source: 0 = `result` < `value2`, where `div.un` is the unsigned division instruction.
trans-unit.target: 0 = `result` < `value2`，其中`div.un`為不帶正負號的除法指令。

trans-unit.source: The `rem.un` instruction computes `result` and pushes it on the stack.
trans-unit.target: `rem.un`指令計算`result`並將它推入堆疊上。

trans-unit.source: `Rem.un` treats its arguments as unsigned integers, while <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Rem> treats them as signed integers.
trans-unit.target: `Rem.un` 它的引數視為不帶正負號的整數，而<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Rem>將它們視為為帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: `Rem.un` is unspecified for floating-point numbers.
trans-unit.target: `Rem.un` 未指定為浮點數值。

trans-unit.source: Integral operations throw <xref:System.DivideByZeroException> if `value2` is zero.
trans-unit.target: 整數類資料的作業會擲回<xref:System.DivideByZeroException>如果`value2`為零。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `rem.un` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`rem.un`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.source: Returns from the current method, pushing a return value (if present) from the callee's evaluation stack onto the caller's evaluation stack.
trans-unit.target: 從目前方法傳回，將被呼叫端評估堆疊的傳回值 (如果有) 推送至呼叫端的評估堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: 2A
trans-unit.target: 2A

trans-unit.source: ret
trans-unit.target: ret

trans-unit.source: Returns from method, possibly returning a value.
trans-unit.target: 從方法傳回，可能傳回值。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: The return value is popped from the callee evaluation stack.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值是從被呼叫端評估堆疊中取出。

trans-unit.source: The return value obtained in step 1 is pushed onto the caller evaluation stack.
trans-unit.target: 步驟 1 中取得的傳回值推送至呼叫端評估堆疊。

trans-unit.source: If the return value is not present on the callee evaluation stack, no value is returned (no stack transition behaviors for either the callee or caller method).
trans-unit.target: 如果傳回的值不存在，被呼叫端評估堆疊上，會傳回任何值 （沒有堆疊轉換行為在被呼叫端或呼叫端的方法）。

trans-unit.source: The type of the return value, if any, of the current method determines the type of value to be fetched from the top of the stack and copied onto the stack of the method that called the current method.
trans-unit.target: 類型的傳回值，如果有的話，目前方法的決定從堆疊頂端和複製到堆疊呼叫目前方法的方法擷取值的類型。

trans-unit.source: The evaluation stack for the current method must be empty except for the value to be returned.
trans-unit.target: 目前方法的評估堆疊必須是空的除了要傳回的值。

trans-unit.source: The `ret` instruction cannot be used to transfer control out of a`try`, `filter`, `catch`, or `finally` block.
trans-unit.target: `ret`指令無法用來傳送出的控制`try`， `filter`， `catch`，或`finally`區塊。

trans-unit.source: From within a `try` or `catch`, use the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Leave> instruction with a destination of a `ret` instruction that is outside all enclosing exception blocks.
trans-unit.target: 從`try`或`catch`，使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Leave>指示目的地`ret`之外所有封入的例外狀況區塊的指示。

trans-unit.source: Because the `filter` and `finally` blocks are logically part of exception handling and not the method in which their code is embedded, correctly generated Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions do not perform a method return from within a `filter` or `finally`.
trans-unit.target: 因為`filter`和`finally`區塊在邏輯上是例外狀況處理和非內嵌程式碼方法的一部分，正確地產生的 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 指示不會執行傳回從方法`filter`或`finally`。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `ret` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`ret`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.source: Rethrows the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 重新擲回目前的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: FE 1A
trans-unit.target: FE 1A

trans-unit.source: rethrow
trans-unit.target: 重新擲回

trans-unit.source: Rethrows the current exception
trans-unit.target: 會重新擲回目前例外狀況

trans-unit.source: No stack transition behavior is defined for this instruction.
trans-unit.target: 這個指令會不定義任何堆疊轉換行為。

trans-unit.source: The `rethrow` instruction is only permitted within the body of a `catch` handler.
trans-unit.target: `rethrow`指令只允許的主體內`catch`處理常式。

trans-unit.source: It throws the same exception that was caught by this handler.
trans-unit.target: 它會擲回相同這個處理常式所攔截的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `rethrow` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`rethrow`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.source: Shifts an integer value to the left (in zeroes) by a specified number of bits, pushing the result onto the evaluation stack.
trans-unit.target: 將整數值向左移 (使用零) 指定的位元數，將結果推送至評估堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: shl
trans-unit.target: shl

trans-unit.source: Shifts an integer to the left (shifting in zeros).
trans-unit.target: 將左側 （移位零） 的整數。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: A value is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 值，會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The amount of bits to be shifted is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 要移位的位元數量會推送到堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The number of bits to be shifted and the value are popped from the stack; the value is shifted left by the specified number of bits.
trans-unit.target: 要移位的位元數字和值會從堆疊推出;值是向左移位指定的位元數。

trans-unit.source: The result is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 結果會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The `shl` instruction shifts the value (type `int32`, `int64` or `native int`) left by the specified number of bits.
trans-unit.target: `shl`指令移位值 (類型`int32`，`int64`或`native int`) 保留指定的位元數。

trans-unit.source: The number of bits is a value of type `int32` or `native int`.
trans-unit.target: 位元數是型別值`int32`或`native int`。

trans-unit.source: The return value is unspecified if the number of bits to be shifted is greater than or equal to the width (in bits) of the supplied value.
trans-unit.target: 要移位的位元數字是否大於或等於所提供的寬度 （以位元），則傳回值會是值的 unspecified。

trans-unit.source: `Shl` inserts a zero bit in the lowest position on each shift.
trans-unit.target: `Shl` 在每個排班上最低的位置插入零的位元。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `shl` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`shl`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.source: Shifts an integer value (in sign) to the right by a specified number of bits, pushing the result onto the evaluation stack.
trans-unit.target: 將整數值 (使用正負號) 向右移指定的位元數，將結果推送至評估堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: shr
trans-unit.target: shr

trans-unit.source: Shifts an integer to the right (shifting in sign).
trans-unit.target: 您可以將整數向右移 （符號都會移位）。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: A value is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 值，會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The amount of bits to be shifted is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 要移位的位元數量會推送到堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The number of bits to be shifted and the value are popped from the stack; the value is shifted right by the specified number of bits.
trans-unit.target: 要移位的位元數字和值會從堆疊推出;值是向右移位指定的位元數。

trans-unit.source: The result is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 結果會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The `shr.un` instruction shifts the value (type `int32`, `int64` or `native int`) right by the specified number of bits.
trans-unit.target: `shr.un`指令移位值 (類型`int32`，`int64`或`native int`) 向右旋轉指定的位元數。

trans-unit.source: The number of bits is a value of type `int32` or `native int`.
trans-unit.target: 位元數是型別值`int32`或`native int`。

trans-unit.source: The return value is unspecified if the number of bits to be shifted is greater than or equal to the width (in bits) of the supplied value.
trans-unit.target: 要移位的位元數字是否大於或等於所提供的寬度 （以位元），則傳回值會是值的 unspecified。

trans-unit.source: `Shr` replicates the high order bit on each shift, preserving the sign of the original value in the `result`.
trans-unit.target: `Shr` 複寫高序位位元上每個排班，保留原始值的正負號`result`。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `shr` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`shr`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.source: Shifts an unsigned integer value (in zeroes) to the right by a specified number of bits, pushing the result onto the evaluation stack.
trans-unit.target: 將不帶正負號的整數值 (使用零) 向右移指定的位元數，將結果推送至評估堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: shr.un
trans-unit.target: shr.un

trans-unit.source: Shifts an integer to the right (shifting in zeroes).
trans-unit.target: 您可以將整數向右移 （移位零）。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: A value is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 值，會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The amount of bits to be shifted is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 要移位的位元數量會推送到堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The number of bits to be shifted and the value are popped from the stack; the value is shifted right by the specified number of bits.
trans-unit.target: 要移位的位元數字和值會從堆疊推出;值是向右移位指定的位元數。

trans-unit.source: The result is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 結果會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The `shr.un` instruction shifts the value (type `int32`, `int64` or `native int`) right by the specified number of bits.
trans-unit.target: `shr.un`指令移位值 (類型`int32`，`int64`或`native int`) 向右旋轉指定的位元數。

trans-unit.source: The number of bits is a value of type `int32`, `int64` or `native int`.
trans-unit.target: 位元數是型別值`int32`，`int64`或`native int`。

trans-unit.source: The return value is unspecified if the number of bits to be shifted is greater than or equal to the width (in bits) of the supplied value.
trans-unit.target: 要移位的位元數字是否大於或等於所提供的寬度 （以位元），則傳回值會是值的 unspecified。

trans-unit.source: `Shr.un` inserts a zero bit in the highest position on each shift.
trans-unit.target: `Shr.un` 將插入每個排班的最高位置零的位元。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `shr.un` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`shr.un`作業碼：

trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.source: Pushes the size, in bytes, of a supplied value type onto the evaluation stack.
trans-unit.target: 將所提供實值類型的大小推送至評估堆疊 (以位元組為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: FE 1C < `T` >
trans-unit.target: FE 1C < `T` >

trans-unit.source: sizeof `valType`
trans-unit.target: sizeof `valType`

trans-unit.source: Push the size, in bytes, of a value type as an `unsigned int32`.
trans-unit.target: Push 大小，以位元組為單位為實值類型`unsigned int32`。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: The size (in bytes) of the supplied value type (`valType`) is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 提供的值類型的大小 （以位元組為單位） (`valType`) 推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `valType` must be a metadata token (a `typeref` or `typedef`) that specifies a value type, reference type, or generic type parameter.
trans-unit.target: `valType` 必須是中繼資料語彙基元 (`typeref`或`typedef`)，在指定實值類型、 參考類型或泛型型別參數。

trans-unit.source: For a reference type, the size returned is the size of a reference value of the corresponding type (4 bytes on 32-bit systems), not the size of the data stored in objects referred to by the reference value.
trans-unit.target: 對於參考類型，傳回的大小會是對應的參考值的大小 （32 位元系統上的 4 位元組），輸入不參考值所參考之物件中儲存之資料的大小。

trans-unit.source: A generic type parameter can be used only in the body of the type or method that defines it.
trans-unit.target: 泛型型別參數僅用於型別或其定義的方法主體。

trans-unit.source: When that type or method is instantiated, the generic type parameter is replaced by a value type or reference type.
trans-unit.target: 該類型或方法具現化時，泛型型別參數取代為實值類型或參考型別。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `sizeof` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`sizeof`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

trans-unit.source: Stores the value on top of the evaluation stack in the argument slot at a specified index.
trans-unit.target: 在指定索引的引數槽中將值存放在評估堆疊的頂端。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: FE 0B < `unsigned int16` >
trans-unit.target: FE 0B < `unsigned int16` >

trans-unit.source: starg `num`
trans-unit.target: starg `num`

trans-unit.source: Pops the top value from the stack and stores it in argument slot `num`.
trans-unit.target: 取出從堆疊頂端的值，並將它儲存在引數槽`num`。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: The value currently on top of the stack is popped and placed in argument slot `num`.
trans-unit.target: 取出堆疊頂端的目前值，並放在引數槽中`num`。

trans-unit.source: The `starg` instruction pops a value from the stack and places it in argument slot `num`.
trans-unit.target: `starg`指令從堆疊取出值，並將它放在引數槽`num`。

trans-unit.source: The type of the value must match the type of the argument, as specified in the current method's signature.
trans-unit.target: 值的類型必須符合的引數，目前方法的簽章中指定的類型。

trans-unit.source: For procedures that take a variable argument list, the `starg` instruction can be used only for the initial fixed arguments, not those in the variable part of the signature.
trans-unit.target: 變數引數清單中，程序`starg`指令只能用於初始的固定引數不是那些在簽章的變數。

trans-unit.source: Performing a store into arguments that hold an integer value smaller than 4 bytes long truncates the value as it moves from the stack to the argument.
trans-unit.target: 執行存放區保存小於 4 個位元組的整數值的引數會截斷值，從堆疊移動的引數。

trans-unit.source: Floating-point values are rounded from their native size (type `F`) to the size associated with the argument.
trans-unit.target: 從原生大小會四捨五入的浮點值 (類型`F`) 相關聯的引數的大小。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `starg` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`starg`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, short)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, short)

trans-unit.source: Stores the value on top of the evaluation stack in the argument slot at a specified index, short form.
trans-unit.target: 在指定索引 (簡短形式) 的引數位置中將值儲存於評估堆疊的頂端。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: 10 < `unsigned int8` >
trans-unit.target: 10 < `unsigned int8` >

trans-unit.source: starg.s `num`
trans-unit.target: starg.s `num`

trans-unit.source: Pops the top value from the stack and stores it in argument slot `num`, short form.
trans-unit.target: 取出從堆疊頂端的值，並將它儲存在引數槽`num`，簡短形式。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: The value currently on top of the stack is popped and placed in argument slot `num`.
trans-unit.target: 取出堆疊頂端的目前值，並放在引數槽中`num`。

trans-unit.source: The `starg.s` instruction pops a value from the stack and places it in argument slot `num`.
trans-unit.target: `starg.s`指令從堆疊取出值，並將它放在引數槽`num`。

trans-unit.source: The type of the value must match the type of the argument, as specified in the current method's signature.
trans-unit.target: 值的類型必須符合的引數，目前方法的簽章中指定的類型。

trans-unit.source: The `starg.s` instruction provides an efficient encoding for use with the first 256 arguments.
trans-unit.target: `starg.s`指令提供有效的編碼方式的前 256 個引數搭配使用。

trans-unit.source: For procedures that take a variable argument list, the `starg.s` instruction can be used only for the initial fixed arguments, not those in the variable part of the signature.
trans-unit.target: 變數引數清單中，程序`starg.s`指令只能用於初始的固定引數不是那些在簽章的變數。

trans-unit.source: Performing a store into arguments that hold an integer value smaller than 4 bytes long truncates the value as it moves from the stack to the argument.
trans-unit.target: 執行存放區保存小於 4 個位元組的整數值的引數會截斷值，從堆疊移動的引數。

trans-unit.source: Floating-point values are rounded from their native size (type `F`) to the size associated with the argument.
trans-unit.target: 從原生大小會四捨五入的浮點值 (類型`F`) 相關聯的引數的大小。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `starg.s` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`starg.s`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, byte)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode，byte）

trans-unit.source: Replaces the array element at a given index with the value on the evaluation stack, whose type is specified in the instruction.
trans-unit.target: 使用評估堆疊上的值 (其類型在指令中指定)，取代在指定之索引處的陣列項目。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: stelem `typeTok`
trans-unit.target: stelem `typeTok`

trans-unit.source: Replaces the array element at the supplied index with a value of type `typeTok` on the stack.
trans-unit.target: 取代類型值的陣列索引處的元素提供`typeTok`堆疊上。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: An object reference to an array, `array`, is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 物件參考陣列， `array`，推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: An index value, `index`, to an element in `array` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 索引值，`index`中的項目`array`推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: A value of the type specified in the instruction is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 在指示中所指定型別的值推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The value, the index, and the array reference are popped from the stack; the value is put into the array element at the given index.
trans-unit.target: 值、 索引及陣列參考是從堆疊推出。值會放入指定的索引處的陣列項目。

trans-unit.source: The `stelem` instruction replaces the value of the element at the supplied zero-based index in the one-dimensional array `array` with the value.
trans-unit.target: `stelem`指令取代的一維陣列中提供的以零為起始索引處的項目值`array`的值。

trans-unit.source: The value has the type specified by the token `typeTok` in the instruction.
trans-unit.target: 值有語彙基元所指定的型別`typeTok`指令中。

trans-unit.source: Arrays are objects, and hence represented by a value of type `O`.
trans-unit.target: 陣列是物件，並由類型的值表示`O`。

trans-unit.source: The index is type `native int`.
trans-unit.target: 索引是型別`native int`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.NullReferenceException> is thrown if `array` is a null reference.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.NullReferenceException> 如果擲回`array`為 null 參考。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IndexOutOfRangeException> is thrown if `index` is negative, or larger than the bound of `array`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IndexOutOfRangeException> 如果擲回`index`是負數或大於的繫結`array`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException> is thrown if `array` does not hold elements of the required type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException> 如果擲回`array`未包含必要的型別項目。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `stelem` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`stelem`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

trans-unit.target: 以在評估堆疊上的 <see langword="native int" /> 值來取代在指定索引的陣列元素。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: An object reference to an array, `array`, is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 物件參考陣列， `array`，推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: A valid index to an element in `array` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 有效的索引中的項目`array`推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: A value is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 值，會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The value, the index, and the array reference are popped from the stack; the value is put into the array element at the given index.
trans-unit.target: 值、 索引及陣列參考是從堆疊推出。值會放入指定的索引處的陣列項目。

trans-unit.source: The `stelem.i` instruction replaces the value of the element `index` in the one-dimensional array `array` with the `native int` value pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `stelem.i`指令取代項目的值`index`一維陣列中`array`與`native int`值推入堆疊。

trans-unit.source: Arrays are objects and hence represented by a value of type `O`.
trans-unit.target: 陣列物件，表示類型的值由`O`。

trans-unit.source: The index is type `native int`.
trans-unit.target: 索引是型別`native int`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.NullReferenceException> is thrown if `array` is a null reference.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.NullReferenceException> 如果擲回`array`為 null 參考。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IndexOutOfRangeException> is thrown if `index` is negative, or larger than the bound of `array`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IndexOutOfRangeException> 如果擲回`index`是負數或大於的繫結`array`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException> is thrown if `array` does not hold elements of the required type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException> 如果擲回`array`未包含必要的型別項目。

trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: 9F
trans-unit.target: 9F

trans-unit.source: stelem.i8
trans-unit.target: stelem.i8

trans-unit.source: Replaces an array element at the supplied index with the `int64` value on the stack.
trans-unit.target: 在提供的索引與陣列項目取代`int64`堆疊上的值。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: An object reference to an array, `array`, is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 物件參考陣列， `array`，推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: A valid index to an element in `array` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 有效的索引中的項目`array`推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: A value is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 值，會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The value, the index, and the array reference are popped from the stack; the value is put into the array element at the given index.
trans-unit.target: 值、 索引及陣列參考是從堆疊推出。值會放入指定的索引處的陣列項目。

trans-unit.source: The `stelem.i8` instruction replaces the value of the element `index` in the one-dimensional array `array` with the `int64` value pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `stelem.i8`指令取代項目的值`index`一維陣列中`array`與`int64`值推入堆疊。

trans-unit.source: Arrays are objects and hence represented by a value of type `O`.
trans-unit.target: 陣列物件，表示類型的值由`O`。

trans-unit.source: The index is type `native int`.
trans-unit.target: 索引是型別`native int`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.NullReferenceException> is thrown if `array` is a null reference.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.NullReferenceException> 如果擲回`array`為 null 參考。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IndexOutOfRangeException> is thrown if `index` is negative, or larger than the bound of `array`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IndexOutOfRangeException> 如果擲回`index`是負數或大於的繫結`array`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException> is thrown if `array` does not hold elements of the required type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException> 如果擲回`array`未包含必要的型別項目。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `stelem.i8` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`stelem.i8`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.source: Replaces an array element at the supplied index with the `float64` value on the stack.
trans-unit.target: 在提供的索引與陣列項目取代`float64`堆疊上的值。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: An object reference to an array, `array`, is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 物件參考陣列， `array`，推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: A valid index to an element in `array` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 有效的索引中的項目`array`推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: A value is pushed onto the stack.

trans-unit.source: The value, the index, and the array reference are popped from the stack; the value is put into the array element at the given index.
trans-unit.target: 值、 索引及陣列參考是從堆疊推出。值會放入指定的索引處的陣列項目。

trans-unit.source: The `stelem.r8` instruction replaces the value of the element `index` in the one-dimensional array `array` with the `float64` value pushed onto the stack.

trans-unit.source: Replaces the array element at a given index with the object ref value (type <see langword="O" />) on the evaluation stack.
trans-unit.target: 以在評估堆疊上的物件參考值 (型別 <see langword="O" />) 來取代在指定索引的陣列元素。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: A2
trans-unit.target: A2

trans-unit.source: stelem.ref
trans-unit.target: stelem.ref

trans-unit.source: Replaces an array element at the supplied index with the `ref` value (type `O`) on the stack.
trans-unit.target: 在提供的索引與陣列項目取代`ref`值 (類型`O`) 堆疊上。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: An object reference to an array, `array`, is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 物件參考陣列， `array`，推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: A valid index to an element in `array` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 有效的索引中的項目`array`推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: A value is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 值，會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The value, the index, and the array reference are popped from the stack; the value is put into the array element at the given index.
trans-unit.target: 值、 索引及陣列參考是從堆疊推出。值會放入指定的索引處的陣列項目。

trans-unit.source: The `stelem.ref` instruction replaces the value of the element at the supplied index in the one-dimensional array `array` with the `ref` (type `O`) value pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `stelem.ref`指令取代的一維陣列中提供的索引處的項目值`array`與`ref`(型別`O`) 推送至堆疊的值。

trans-unit.source: Arrays are objects and hence represented by a value of type `O`.
trans-unit.target: 陣列物件，表示類型的值由`O`。

trans-unit.source: The index is type `native int`.
trans-unit.target: 索引是型別`native int`。

trans-unit.source: Note that `stelem.ref` implicitly casts the supplied value to the element type of `array` before assigning the value to the array element.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，`stelem.ref`隱含地將轉換的項目類型所提供的值`array`指派值的陣列項目之前。

trans-unit.source: This cast can fail, even for verified code.
trans-unit.target: 此轉換可能會失敗，即使的已驗證的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Thus the `stelem.ref` instruction can throw <xref:System.InvalidCastException>.
trans-unit.target: 因此`stelem.ref`指令可以擲回<xref:System.InvalidCastException>。

trans-unit.source: For one-dimensional arrays that aren't zero-based and for multidimensional arrays, the <xref:System.Array> class provides a <xref:System.Array.SetValue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 多維陣列，以及針對不是以零為起始的一維陣列<xref:System.Array>類別提供<xref:System.Array.SetValue%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.NullReferenceException> is thrown if `array` is a null reference.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.NullReferenceException> 如果擲回`array`為 null 參考。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IndexOutOfRangeException> is thrown if `index` is negative, or larger than the bound of `array`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IndexOutOfRangeException> 如果擲回`index`是負數或大於的繫結`array`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException> is thrown if `array` does not hold elements of the required type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ArrayTypeMismatchException> 如果擲回`array`未包含必要的型別項目。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `stelem.ref` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`stelem.ref`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.source: Replaces the value stored in the field of an object reference or pointer with a new value.
trans-unit.target: 以新值取代儲存在物件參考或指標的欄位中的值。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: stfld `field`
trans-unit.target: stfld `field`

trans-unit.source: Replaces the value of `field` of the object with a new value.
trans-unit.target: 取代的值`field`具有新值的物件。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: An object reference or pointer is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 物件參考或指標會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: A value is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 值，會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The value and the object reference/pointer are popped from the stack; the value of `field` in the object is replaced with the supplied value.
trans-unit.target: 值和物件參考/指標會從堆疊推出。值`field`物件中會取代所提供的值。

trans-unit.source: The `stfld` instruction replaces the value of a field of an object (type `O`) or via a pointer (type `native int`, `&`, or `*`) with a given value.
trans-unit.target: `stfld`指令取代的物件中的欄位值 (類型`O`) 或透過指標 (類型`native int`， `&`，或`*`) 具有給定值。

trans-unit.source: `Field` is a metadata token that refers to a field member reference.
trans-unit.target: `Field` 是指欄位成員參考中繼資料語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: The `stfld` instruction can have a prefix of either or both of <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Unaligned> and <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Volatile>.
trans-unit.target: `stfld`指令可以包含一個或兩個前置詞<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Unaligned>和<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Volatile>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.NullReferenceException> is thrown if the object reference or pointer is a null reference and the field isn't static.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.NullReferenceException> 如果物件參考或指標為 null 參考，且欄位並非靜態，會擲回。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.MissingFieldException> is thrown if `field` is not found in the metadata.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.MissingFieldException> 如果擲回`field`中繼資料中找不到。

trans-unit.source: This is typically checked when the Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instruction is converted to native code, not at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 這通常會檢查 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 指令被轉換成原生程式碼，不在執行階段時。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `stfld` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`stfld`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, FieldInfo)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, FieldInfo)

trans-unit.source: Stores a value of type <see langword="native int" /> at a supplied address.
trans-unit.target: 於所提供的位址儲存 <see langword="native int" /> 型別的值。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: DF
trans-unit.target: DF

trans-unit.source: stind.i
trans-unit.target: stind.i

trans-unit.source: Stores a `native int` value at a given address.
trans-unit.target: 存放區`native int`位於指定的位址值。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: An address is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 位址會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: A value is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 值，會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The value and the address are popped from the stack; the value is stored at the address.
trans-unit.target: 值和位址會從堆疊推出。值會儲存在位址。

trans-unit.source: The `stind.i` instruction stores a `native int` value at the supplied address (type `native int`, `*`, or `&`).
trans-unit.target: `stind.i`指令存放區`native int`提供的位址值 (類型`native int`， `*`，或`&`)。

trans-unit.source: Type safe operation requires that the `stind.i` instruction be used in a manner consistent with the type of the pointer.
trans-unit.target: 類型安全的作業需要`stind.i`指令的使用方式與指標類型一致。

trans-unit.source: The operation of the `stind.i` instruction can be altered by an immediately preceding <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Volatile> or <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Unaligned> prefix instruction.
trans-unit.target: 作業`stind.i`可以更改指令前面<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Volatile>或<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Unaligned>指令的前置詞。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.NullReferenceException> is thrown if `addr` is not naturally aligned for the argument type implied by the instruction suffix.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.NullReferenceException> 如果擲回`addr`不會自然對齊的指示後置詞所隱含的引數類型。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `stind.i` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`stind.i`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.source: Stores a value of type <see langword="int8" /> at a supplied address.
trans-unit.target: 於所提供的位址儲存 <see langword="int8" /> 型別的值。

trans-unit.source: stind.i2

trans-unit.source: Stores an `int16` value at a given address.
trans-unit.target: 存放區`int16`位於指定的位址值。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: An address is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 位址會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: A value is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 值，會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The value and the address are popped from the stack; the value is stored at the address.
trans-unit.target: 值和位址會從堆疊推出。值會儲存在位址。

trans-unit.source: The `stind.i2` instruction stores an `int16` value at the supplied address (type `native int`, `*`, or `&`).
trans-unit.target: `stind.i2`指令存放區`int16`提供的位址值 (類型`native int`， `*`，或`&`)。

trans-unit.source: Type safe operation requires that the `stind.2i` instruction be used in a manner consistent with the type of the pointer.
trans-unit.target: 類型安全的作業需要`stind.2i`指令的使用方式與指標類型一致。

trans-unit.source: The operation of the `stind.i2` instruction can be altered by an immediately preceding <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Volatile> or <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Unaligned> prefix instruction.
trans-unit.target: 作業`stind.i2`可以更改指令前面<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Volatile>或<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Unaligned>指令的前置詞。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.NullReferenceException> is thrown if `addr` is not naturally aligned for the argument type implied by the instruction suffix.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.NullReferenceException> 如果擲回`addr`不會自然對齊的指示後置詞所隱含的引數類型。

trans-unit.source: Pops the current value from the top of the evaluation stack and stores it in a the local variable list at a specified index.
trans-unit.target: 從評估堆疊的頂端取出目前值，並將它存放在指定索引的區域變數清單中。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: FE 0E < `unsigned int16` >
trans-unit.target: FE 0E < `unsigned int16` >

trans-unit.source: stloc `index`
trans-unit.target: stloc `index`

trans-unit.source: Pops a value from the stack and stores it in local variable `index`.
trans-unit.target: 從堆疊取出值，並將它儲存在區域變數中`index`。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: A value is popped off of the stack and placed in local variable `index`.
trans-unit.target: 值，會從堆疊取出並放置於本機變數`index`。

trans-unit.source: The `stloc` instruction pops the top value off the evaluation stack and moves it into local variable number `index`, where local variables are numbered 0 onwards.
trans-unit.target: `stloc`指令取出評估堆疊頂端的值，並將它移動至區域變數編號`index`，其中的本機變數是從的 0 開始。

trans-unit.source: The type of the value must match the type of the local variable as specified in the current method's local signature.
trans-unit.target: 值的類型必須符合目前方法的本機簽章中指定本機變數的類型。

trans-unit.source: Storing into locals that hold an integer value smaller than 4 bytes long truncates the value as it moves from the stack to the local variable.
trans-unit.target: 儲存至存放小於 4 個位元組的整數值的區域變數會截斷值，從堆疊移動。

trans-unit.source: Floating-point values are rounded from their native size (type `F`) to the size associated with the argument.
trans-unit.target: 從原生大小會四捨五入的浮點值 (類型`F`) 相關聯的引數的大小。

trans-unit.source: Correct Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions require that `index` be a valid local index.
trans-unit.target: 正確的 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 指示需要`index`是有效的本機索引。

trans-unit.source: For the `stloc` instruction, `index` must lie in the range 0 to 65534 inclusive (specifically, 65535 is not valid).
trans-unit.target: 如`stloc`指示`index`必須介於範圍 0 到 65534 內含 （具體而言，65535 不是有效）。

trans-unit.source: The reason for excluding 65535 is pragmatic: likely implementations will use a 2-byte integer to track both a local's index, as well as the total number of locals for a given method.
trans-unit.target: 65535 排除在外的原因是 14k： 類似的實作會使用 2 位元組整數來追蹤區域的索引，以及指定方法的區域變數的總數。

trans-unit.source: If an index of 65535 had been made valid, it would require a wider integer to track the number of locals in such a method.
trans-unit.target: 如果 65535 的索引已經變成有效，它將需要更多的整數，來追蹤在這種方法中區域變數的數目。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overloads can use the `stloc` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載可以使用`stloc`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, LocalBuilder)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, LocalBuilder)

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, short)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, short)

trans-unit.source: Pops the current value from the top of the evaluation stack and stores it in a the local variable list at index 0.
trans-unit.target: 從評估堆疊的頂端取出目前值，並將它存放在索引 0 的區域變數清單中。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: 0A
trans-unit.target: 0A

trans-unit.source: stloc.0
trans-unit.target: stloc.0

trans-unit.source: Pops a value from the stack into local variable 0.
trans-unit.target: 從堆疊中的值為 0 的區域變數中取出。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: A value is popped off of the stack and placed in the local variable indexed by 0.
trans-unit.target: 值，從堆疊取出並放在本機變數索引為 0。

trans-unit.source: The `stloc.0` instruction pops the top value off the evaluation stack and moves it into the local variable indexed by 0.
trans-unit.target: `stloc.0`指令取出評估堆疊頂端的值，並將它移至索引為 0 的區域變數。

trans-unit.source: The type of the value must match the type of the local variable as specified in the current method's local signature.
trans-unit.target: 值的類型必須符合目前方法的本機簽章中指定本機變數的類型。

trans-unit.source: `stloc.0` is an especially efficient encoding for storing values in local variable 0.
trans-unit.target: `stloc.0` 是有效的編碼方式，將值儲存在本機變數 0。

trans-unit.source: Storing into locals that hold an integer value smaller than 4 bytes long truncates the value as it moves from the stack to the local variable.
trans-unit.target: 儲存至存放小於 4 個位元組的整數值的區域變數會截斷值，從堆疊移動。

trans-unit.source: Floating-point values are rounded from their native size (type `F`) to the size associated with the argument.
trans-unit.target: 從原生大小會四捨五入的浮點值 (類型`F`) 相關聯的引數的大小。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `stloc.0` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`stloc.0`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.source: stloc.s `index`
trans-unit.target: stloc.s `index`

trans-unit.source: Pops a value from the stack and stores it in local variable `index`, short form.
trans-unit.target: 從堆疊取出值，並將它儲存在區域變數中`index`，簡短形式。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: A value is popped off of the stack and placed in local variable `index`.
trans-unit.target: 值，會從堆疊取出並放置於本機變數`index`。

trans-unit.source: The `stloc.s` instruction pops the top value off the evaluation stack and moves it into local variable number `index`, where local variables are numbered 0 onwards.
trans-unit.target: `stloc.s`指令取出評估堆疊頂端的值，並將它移動至區域變數編號`index`，其中的本機變數是從的 0 開始。

trans-unit.source: The type of the value must match the type of the local variable as specified in the current method's local signature.
trans-unit.target: 值的類型必須符合目前方法的本機簽章中指定本機變數的類型。

trans-unit.source: The `stloc.s` instruction provides an efficient encoding for local variables 0 through 255.
trans-unit.target: `stloc.s`指令提供區域變數 0 到 255 之間的有效編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: Storing into locals that hold an integer value smaller than 4 bytes long truncates the value as it moves from the stack to the local variable.
trans-unit.target: 儲存至存放小於 4 個位元組的整數值的區域變數會截斷值，從堆疊移動。

trans-unit.source: Floating-point values are rounded from their native size (type `F`) to the size associated with the argument.
trans-unit.target: 從原生大小會四捨五入的浮點值 (類型`F`) 相關聯的引數的大小。

trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, LocalBuilder)

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, byte)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode，byte）

trans-unit.source: Copies a value of a specified type from the evaluation stack into a supplied memory address.
trans-unit.target: 從評估堆疊複製指定類型的值到所提供的記憶體位址。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: stobj `class`
trans-unit.target: stobj `class`

trans-unit.source: Stores a value of type `class` from the stack into memory.
trans-unit.target: 儲存類型的值`class`從堆疊記憶體。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: An address is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 位址會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: A value type object of type `class` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 類型的實值類型物件`class`推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The object and the address are popped from the stack; the value type object is stored at the address.
trans-unit.target: 物件和位址會從堆疊推出。實值類型物件會儲存在位址。

trans-unit.source: The `stobj` instruction copies the value type object into the address specified by the address (a pointer of type `native int`, `*`, or `&`).
trans-unit.target: `stobj`指令將實值類型物件複製到該位址所指定的地址 (類型的指標`native int`， `*`，或`&`)。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes copied depends on the size of the class represented by `class`, a metadata token representing a value type.
trans-unit.target: 複製的位元組數目取決於所表示之類別的大小`class`、 代表實值類型的中繼資料語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: The operation of the `stobj` instruction can be altered by an immediately preceding <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Volatile> or <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Unaligned> prefix instruction.
trans-unit.target: 作業`stobj`可以更改指令前面<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Volatile>或<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Unaligned>指令的前置詞。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.TypeLoadException> is thrown if class cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TypeLoadException> 如果找不到類別，會擲回。

trans-unit.source: This is typically detected when Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions are converted to native code rather than at run time.
trans-unit.target: 這通常是偵測到 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 指示轉換為原生程式碼，而不是在執行階段時。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `stobj` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`stobj`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

trans-unit.source: Replaces the value of a static field with a value from the evaluation stack.
trans-unit.target: 以來自評估堆疊的值取代靜態欄位的值。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: stsfld `field`
trans-unit.target: 這個前置 `field`

trans-unit.source: Replaces the value in `field` with a supplied value.
trans-unit.target: 中的值會取代`field`與提供的值。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: A value is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 值，會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: A value is popped from the stack and stored in `field`.
trans-unit.target: 值，會從堆疊取出並儲存在`field`。

trans-unit.source: The `stsfld` instruction replaces the value of a static field with a value from the stack.
trans-unit.target: `stsfld`指令以堆疊中的值取代靜態欄位的值。

trans-unit.source: `field` is a metadata token that must refer to a static field member.
trans-unit.target: `field` 是靜態欄位成員必須參考中繼資料語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: The `stsfld` instruction may be prefixed by <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Volatile>.
trans-unit.target: `stsfld`指示可能加<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Volatile>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.MissingFieldException> is thrown if field is not found in the metadata.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.MissingFieldException> 如果在中繼資料中找不到欄位，會擲回。

trans-unit.source: This is typically checked when Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions are converted to native code, not at run time.
trans-unit.target: 這通常會檢查 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 指示轉換成原生程式碼，不在執行階段時。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `stsfld` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`stsfld`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, FieldInfo)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, FieldInfo)

trans-unit.source: Subtracts one value from another and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.
trans-unit.target: 將另一個值減去某一個值，並將結果推送至評估堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: sub
trans-unit.target: sub

trans-unit.source: Subtracts one value from another, returning a new numeric value.
trans-unit.target: 將一個值減去另一個，傳回新的數值。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: `value1` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value1` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `value2` is subtracted from `value1`.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 和`value1`取出從堆疊。`value2`會減去`value1`。

trans-unit.source: The result is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 結果會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: Overflow is not detected for integer operations (for proper overflow handling, see <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Sub_Ovf>).
trans-unit.target: 溢位未偵測到適用於整數作業 (如適當溢位處理，請參閱<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Sub_Ovf>)。

trans-unit.source: Integer subtraction wraps, rather than saturates.
trans-unit.target: 整數減法會包裝，而不是飽和。

trans-unit.source: For example: assuming 8-bit integers, where `value1` is set to 0 and `value2` is set to 1, the "wrapped" result will be 255.
trans-unit.target: 例如： 假設 8 位元整數，其中`value1`設為 0 和`value2`設為 1 時，「 包裝 」 的結果會是 255。

trans-unit.source: Floating-point overflow returns `+inf` (`PositiveInfinity`) or `-inf` (`NegativeInfinity`).
trans-unit.target: 傳回浮點溢位`+inf`(`PositiveInfinity`) 或`-inf`(`NegativeInfinity`)。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `sub` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`sub`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.source: Subtracts one integer value from another, performs an overflow check, and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.
trans-unit.target: 將另一個值減去某一個值、執行溢位檢查，並將結果推送至評估堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: DA
trans-unit.target: DA

trans-unit.source: sub.ovf
trans-unit.target: sub.ovf

trans-unit.source: Subtracts one integer value from another with an overflow check.
trans-unit.target: 將一個整數值減去另一個具有溢位檢查。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: `value1` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value1` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `value2` is subtracted from `value1` with a check for overflow.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 和`value1`取出從堆疊。`value2`會減去`value1`有溢位檢查。

trans-unit.source: The result is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 結果會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.OverflowException> is thrown if the result can not be represented in the result type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.OverflowException> 如果結果不會顯示結果型別，會擲回。

trans-unit.source: This operation is performed on signed integers; for floating-point values, use <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Sub>.
trans-unit.target: 帶正負號的整數; 上執行這項作業浮點值，使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Sub>。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `sub.ovf` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`sub.ovf`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.target: 將另一個不帶正負號的值減去某一個不帶正負號的值、執行溢位檢查，並將結果推送至評估堆疊。

trans-unit.target: sub.ovf.un

trans-unit.source: Subtracts one unsigned integer value from another with an overflow check.
trans-unit.target: 將一個不帶正負號的整數值減去另一個具有溢位檢查。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: `value1` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value1` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `value2` is subtracted from `value1` with a check for overflow.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 和`value1`取出從堆疊。`value2`會減去`value1`有溢位檢查。

trans-unit.source: The result is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 結果會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.OverflowException> is thrown if the result can not be represented in the result type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.OverflowException> 如果結果不會顯示結果型別，會擲回。

trans-unit.source: This operation is performed on signed integers; for floating-point values, use <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Sub>.
trans-unit.target: 帶正負號的整數; 上執行這項作業浮點值，使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Sub>。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `sub.ovf.un` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`sub.ovf.un`作業碼：
