trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.source: Implements a jump table.
trans-unit.target: 實作跳躍表格。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: 45 < `unsigned int32` > < `int32` >... < `int32` >
trans-unit.target: 45 < `unsigned int32` > < `int32` >... < `int32` >

trans-unit.source: Jumps to one of `N` values.
trans-unit.target: 跳到其中一個`N`值。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: A value is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 值，會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The value is popped off the stack and execution is transferred to the instruction at the offset indexed by the value, where the value is less than `N`.
trans-unit.target: 值從堆疊取出並將執行轉移至在位移值編製索引指令其中的值是小於`N`。

trans-unit.source: The `switch` instruction implements a jump table.
trans-unit.target: `switch`指令實作跳躍表格。

trans-unit.source: The format of the instruction is an `unsigned int32` representing the number of targets `N`, followed by `N` int32 values specifying jump targets.
trans-unit.target: 指示的格式是`unsigned int32`代表目標數目`N`，後面接著`N`int32 值，指定跳躍的目標。

trans-unit.source: These targets are represented as offsets (positive or negative) from the beginning of the instruction following this `switch` instruction.
trans-unit.target: 這些目標以位移 （正數或負數） 表示接下來的指示從頭`switch`指令。

trans-unit.source: The `switch` instruction pops a value off the stack and compares it, as an unsigned integer, to `N`.
trans-unit.target: `switch`指令從堆疊取出值，並可將其比較的不帶正負號的整數， `N`。

trans-unit.source: If value is less than `N`, execution is transferred to the target indexed by value, where targets are numbered from 0 (for example, a value of 0 takes the first target, a value of 1 takes the second target, and so on).
trans-unit.target: 如果值為小於`N`，執行會傳輸至目標值，索引會從 0 開始編號目標 （例如，值為 0 會採用第一個目標，1 的值會採用第二個目標，依此類推）。

trans-unit.source: If the value is greater than or equal to `N`, execution continues at the next instruction (fall through).
trans-unit.target: 如果值大於或等於`N`，繼續執行下一個指令 （失敗）。

trans-unit.source: If the target instruction has one or more prefix codes, control can only be transferred to the first of these prefixes.
trans-unit.target: 目標指令有一或多個前置詞程式碼，如果控制項只傳送到第一個前置詞。

trans-unit.source: Control transfers into and out of `try`, `catch`, `filter`, and `finally` blocks cannot be performed by this instruction.
trans-unit.target: 控制傳入和傳出傳輸`try`， `catch`， `filter`，和`finally`區塊無法執行這個指令。

trans-unit.source: (Such transfers are severely restricted and must use the leave instruction instead).
trans-unit.target: （這類傳輸嚴重限制而必須改用）。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `switch` opcode.
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`switch`opcode。

trans-unit.source: The `Label[]` argument is an array of Labels representing 32-bit offsets.
trans-unit.target: `Label[]`引數是標籤代表 32 位元位移的陣列。

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Label[])
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Label[])

trans-unit.source: The following code sample illustrates the use of the `Switch` opcode to generate a jump table using an array of <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.Label>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用`Switch`opcode 來產生使用陣列的跳躍點表格<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.Label>。

trans-unit.source: Performs a postfixed method call instruction such that the current method's stack frame is removed before the actual call instruction is executed.
trans-unit.target: 執行後置的方法呼叫指令 (例如目前方法的堆疊框架) 會在執行實際的呼叫指令之前移除。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: FE 14
trans-unit.target: FE 14

trans-unit.source: tail.
trans-unit.target: 結尾。

trans-unit.source: Subsequent call terminates current methods
trans-unit.target: 後續呼叫會終止目前的方法

trans-unit.source: There is no stack transition behavior defined for this instruction.
trans-unit.target: 不沒有定義此指示任何堆疊轉換行為。

trans-unit.source: The `tail` prefix instruction must immediately precede a <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Call>, <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Calli>, or <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Callvirt> instruction.
trans-unit.target: `tail`前置詞指令必須緊接著<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Call>， <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Calli>，或<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Callvirt>指令。

trans-unit.source: It indicates that the current method's stack frame should be removed before the call instruction is executed.
trans-unit.target: 表示呼叫指令執行之前，應該移除目前方法的堆疊框架。

trans-unit.source: It also implies that the value returned from the following call is also the value returned by the current method, and the call can therefore be converted into a cross-method jump.
trans-unit.target: 它也表示從下列呼叫傳回的值也是目前的方法所傳回的值，因此可以呼叫轉換成交叉方法跳躍。

trans-unit.source: The stack must be empty except for the arguments being transferred by the following call.
trans-unit.target: 堆疊必須是空的除了正在傳送下列呼叫的引數。

trans-unit.source: The instruction following the call instruction must be a ret. Thus the only valid code sequence is `tail. call` (or `calli` or `callvirt`).
trans-unit.target: 緊跟在呼叫指令必須是 ret。因此在唯一有效的程式碼序列是`tail. call`(或`calli`或`callvirt`)。

trans-unit.source: Correct Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions must not branch to the `call` instruction, but they may branch to the subsequent <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Ret>.
trans-unit.target: 正確的 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 指示不必須分支到`call`指令，但是它們可能分支到後續<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Ret>。

trans-unit.source: The current frame cannot be discarded when control is transferred from untrusted code to trusted code, since this would jeopardize code identity security.
trans-unit.target: 控制權會轉移信任的程式碼從信任的程式碼，因為這可能危及程式碼識別安全性時，無法捨棄目前的框架。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework security checks can therefore cause the `tail` to be ignored, leaving a standard <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Call> instruction.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性檢查，因此可能會導致`tail`被忽略，離開標準<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Call>指令。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, in order to allow the exit of a synchronized region to occur after the call returns, the `tail` prefix is ignored when used to exit a method that is marked synchronized.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，為了讓同步區域就會發生在呼叫傳回的結束，`tail`時用來結束標記為同步的方法，會忽略前置詞。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `tail` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`tail`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.source: An instance of an Opcode object.
trans-unit.target: Opcode 物件的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Returns true or false if the supplied opcode takes a single byte argument.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供的作業碼採用單一位元組引數，則傳回 True 或 False。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> or <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="True" /> 或 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to find which MSIL opcodes are "short form", for use in optimized code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可以用來找出哪些 MSIL opcode [簡短表單]，用於最佳化程式碼中。

trans-unit.source: `TakesSingleByteArgument` returns `true` if the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode> instance takes a single byte argument in the following cases:
trans-unit.target: `TakesSingleByteArgument` 傳回`true`如果<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode>執行個體使用單一位元組引數，在下列情況：

trans-unit.source: The opcode performs a branch instruction to a byte-sized address (for example, <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Br_S> and <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Bgt_S>).
trans-unit.target: 作業碼執行的分支指令，位元組大小的位址 (例如，<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Br_S>和<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Bgt_S>)。

trans-unit.source: The opcode pushes a byte value onto the stack (for example, <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Ldc_I4_S>).
trans-unit.target: 作業碼推送至堆疊的位元組值 (例如， <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Ldc_I4_S>)。

trans-unit.source: The opcode references a variable or argument via the byte-sized "short form" (for example, <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Ldloc_S> and <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Stloc_S>).
trans-unit.target: Opcode 參考變數或引數的位元組大小 」 簡短形式 」 透過 (例如，<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Ldloc_S>和<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Stloc_S>)。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則它會傳回 `false`。

trans-unit.source: The example below demonstrates the use of `TakesSingleByteArgument` by reflecting on to the `OpCodes` class and testing to see whether each `OpCode` field takes a single-byte argument.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用`TakesSingleByteArgument`透過反映入`OpCodes`類別和測試以查看是否每個`OpCode`欄位採用單一位元組引數。

trans-unit.source: Throws the exception object currently on the evaluation stack.
trans-unit.target: 擲回目前位於評估堆疊的例外狀況物件。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: 7A
trans-unit.target: 7A

trans-unit.source: throw
trans-unit.target: throw

trans-unit.source: Throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: An object reference (to an exception) is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: （將例外狀況） 的物件參考推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The object reference is popped from the stack and the exception thrown.
trans-unit.target: 物件參考是從取出堆疊並擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The `throw` instruction throws the exception object (type `O`) currently on the stack.
trans-unit.target: `throw`指令會擲回的例外狀況物件 (類型`O`) 目前的堆疊。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.NullReferenceException> is thrown if the object reference is a null reference.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.NullReferenceException> 如果物件參考為 null 參考，會擲回。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `throw` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`throw`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.source: Indicates that an address currently atop the evaluation stack might not be aligned to the natural size of the immediately following <see langword="ldind" />, <see langword="stind" />, <see langword="ldfld" />, <see langword="stfld" />, <see langword="ldobj" />, <see langword="stobj" />, <see langword="initblk" />, or <see langword="cpblk" /> instruction.
trans-unit.target: 表示目前位於評估堆疊頂端的位置可能未對齊緊接 <see langword="ldind" />、<see langword="stind" />、<see langword="ldfld" />、<see langword="stfld" />、<see langword="ldobj" />、<see langword="stobj" />、<see langword="initblk" /> 或 <see langword="cpblk" /> 指令的正常大小。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: FE 12 < `unsigned int8` >
trans-unit.target: FE 12 < `unsigned int8` >

trans-unit.source: unaligned.
trans-unit.target: 未對齊。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the subsequent pointer instruction may be unaligned.
trans-unit.target: 表示後續的指標指令可能未對齊。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: An address is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 位址會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `Unaligned` specifies that the address (an unmanaged pointer, `native int`) on the stack might not be aligned to the natural size of the immediately following `ldind`, `stind`, `ldfld`, `stfld`, `ldobj`, `stobj`, `initblk`, or `cpblk` instruction.
trans-unit.target: `Unaligned` 指定的位址 (unmanaged 的指標， `native int`) 堆疊上可能不會對齊，以自然的後置大小`ldind`， `stind`， `ldfld`， `stfld`， `ldobj`， `stobj`，`initblk`，或`cpblk`指令。

trans-unit.source: That is, for a <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Ldind_I4> instruction the alignment of the address may not be to a 4-byte boundary.
trans-unit.target: 也就是針對<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Ldind_I4>指令位址的對齊方式可能無法與 4 位元組界限。

trans-unit.source: For `initblk` and `cpblk` the default alignment is architecture dependent (4-byte on 32-bit CPUs, 8-byte on 64-bit CPUs).
trans-unit.target: 如`initblk`和`cpblk`預設對齊是架構相依 （4 位元組 32 位元 cpu，64 位元 Cpu 上的 8 位元組）。

trans-unit.source: Code generators that do not restrict their output to a 32-bit word size must use `unaligned` if the alignment is not known at compile time to be 8-byte.
trans-unit.target: 未將其輸出限制為 32 位元字組大小的程式碼產生器必須使用`unaligned`如果對齊方式不在編譯時期已知為 8 個位元組。

trans-unit.source: The value of alignment must be 1, 2, or 4 and means that the generated code should assume that the address is byte, double-byte, or quad-byte aligned, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 對齊的值必須是 1、 2 或 4 和產生的程式碼應該假設的位址是 byte、 雙位元組或 4 位元組對齊，分別表示。

trans-unit.source: Note that transient pointers (type `*`) are always aligned.
trans-unit.target: 請注意該暫時性指標 (類型`*`) 永遠對齊。

trans-unit.source: While the alignment for a `cpblk` instruction would logically require two numbers (one for the source and one for the destination), there is no noticeable impact on performance if only the lower number is specified.
trans-unit.target: 雖然的對齊方式`cpblk`指令會以邏輯方式需要兩個數字 （一個為來源），另一個用於目的地，所以不會嚴重影響效能如果只在指定的較低的數字。

trans-unit.source: The `unaligned` and `volatile` prefixes can be combined in either order.
trans-unit.target: `unaligned`和`volatile`可以按照任何順序結合前置詞。

trans-unit.source: They must immediately precede a `ldind`, `stind`, `ldfld`, `stfld`, `ldobj`, `stobj`, `initblk`, or `cpblk` instruction.
trans-unit.target: 它們必須緊接著`ldind`， `stind`， `ldfld`， `stfld`， `ldobj`， `stobj`， `initblk`，或`cpblk`指令。

trans-unit.source: Only the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Volatile> prefix is allowed for the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Ldsfld> and <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Stsfld> instructions.
trans-unit.target: 只有<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Volatile>允許前置詞<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Ldsfld>和<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Stsfld>指示。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overloads can use the `unaligned` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載可以使用`unaligned`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Label)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode，標籤）

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(Opcode, Byte)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit （Opcode，Byte）

trans-unit.source: Converts the boxed representation of a value type to its unboxed form.
trans-unit.target: 將實值類型的 boxed 表示轉換成它的 unboxed 形式。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: unbox `valType`
trans-unit.target: unbox `valType`

trans-unit.source: Extracts the value type data from `obj`, its boxed representation.
trans-unit.target: 擷取值的類型資料，從`obj`、 其表示法會進行 boxed 處理。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: An object reference is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 物件參考推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The object reference is popped from the stack and unboxed to a value type pointer.
trans-unit.target: 物件參考是從堆疊取出並實值類型指標來進行 unboxed 處理。

trans-unit.source: The value type pointer is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 實值類型指標會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: A value type has two separate representations within the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI):
trans-unit.target: 實值類型有兩種不同的表示法中通用語言基礎結構 (CLI):

trans-unit.source: A 'raw' form used when a value type is embedded within another object.
trans-unit.target: 「 原始 」 形式，實值類型內嵌在另一個物件時使用。

trans-unit.source: A 'boxed' form, where the data in the value type is wrapped (boxed) into an object so it can exist as an independent entity.
trans-unit.target: 實值型別中的資料都包裝 （進行 boxed 處理） 成物件，它可以做為獨立的實體 'boxed' 格式。

trans-unit.source: The `unbox` instruction converts the object reference (type `O`), the boxed representation of a value type, to a value type pointer (a managed pointer, type `&`), its unboxed form.
trans-unit.target: `unbox`指令將轉換的物件參考 (類型`O`)、 實值類型指標至 boxed 實值類型，表示法 (的 managed 的指標類型`&`)、 其進行 unboxed 處理表單。

trans-unit.source: The supplied value type (`valType`) is a metadata token indicating the type of value type contained within the boxed object.
trans-unit.target: 提供的值類型 (`valType`) 會指出類型的 boxed 物件內所包含的實值型別中繼資料語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: Unlike <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Box>, which is required to make a copy of a value type for use in the object, `unbox` is not required to copy the value type from the object.
trans-unit.target: 不同於<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Box>，所需物件中建立一份使用實值類型`unbox`不需要複製物件中的實值型別。

trans-unit.source: Typically it simply computes the address of the value type that is already present inside of the boxed object.
trans-unit.target: 通常它只會計算的位址已存在於 boxed 物件內的值類型。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.InvalidCastException> is thrown if the object is not boxed as `valType`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.InvalidCastException> 如果物件不會進行 boxed 處理做為擲回`valType`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.NullReferenceException> is thrown if the object reference is a null reference.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.NullReferenceException> 如果物件參考為 null 參考，會擲回。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.TypeLoadException> is thrown if the value type `valType` cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TypeLoadException> 如果類型值會擲回`valType`找不到。

trans-unit.source: This is typically detected when Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions are converted to native code, rather than at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 這通常是偵測到 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 指示轉換至原生程式碼，而不是在執行階段時。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `unbox` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`unbox`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

trans-unit.source: Converts the boxed representation of a type specified in the instruction to its unboxed form.
trans-unit.target: 將指令中指定之類型的 boxed 表示轉換成其 unboxed 形式。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: unbox.any `typeTok`
trans-unit.target: unbox.any `typeTok`

trans-unit.source: Extract the data from `obj`, its boxed representation.
trans-unit.target: 擷取從資料`obj`、 其表示法會進行 boxed 處理。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: An object reference `obj` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 物件參考`obj`推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The object reference is popped from the stack and unboxed to the type specified in the instruction.
trans-unit.target: 物件參考是從堆疊取出並指令中指定的型別進行 unboxed 處理。

trans-unit.source: The resulting object reference or value type is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 產生的物件參考或值類型會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: When applied to the boxed form of a value type, the `unbox.any` instruction extracts the value contained within `obj` (of type `O`), and is therefore equivalent to `unbox` followed by `ldobj`.
trans-unit.target: 當套用至 boxed 實值類型，`unbox.any`指令會擷取內含值`obj`(型別的`O`)，而且因此相當於`unbox`後面`ldobj`。

trans-unit.source: When applied to a reference type, the `unbox.any` instruction has the same effect as `castclass` `typeTok`.
trans-unit.target: 當套用至參考類型，`unbox.any`指令具有相同的效果`castclass` `typeTok`。

trans-unit.source: If the operand `typeTok` is a generic type parameter, then the runtime behavior is determined by the type that is specified for that generic type parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果運算元`typeTok`是泛型類型參數，則執行階段行為取決於指定給該泛型類型參數的類型。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.InvalidCastException> is thrown if `obj` is not a boxed type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.InvalidCastException> 如果擲回`obj`不 boxed 型別。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.NullReferenceException> is thrown if `obj` is a null reference.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.NullReferenceException> 如果擲回`obj`為 null 參考。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `unbox.any` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`unbox.any`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

trans-unit.source: Specifies that an address currently atop the evaluation stack might be volatile, and the results of reading that location cannot be cached or that multiple stores to that location cannot be suppressed.
trans-unit.target: 指定目前在評估堆疊頂端的位址可能是 volatile，並且無法快取讀取該位置的結果，或者無法隱藏存放該位置的多個存放區。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: FE 13
trans-unit.target: FE 13

trans-unit.source: volatile.
trans-unit.target: 變動性。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the subsequent pointer reference is volatile.
trans-unit.target: 表示後續指標參考是暫時性。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: An address is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 位址會推送至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `volatile`.
trans-unit.target: `volatile`。

trans-unit.source: specifies that the address is a volatile address (that is, it can be referenced externally to the current thread of execution) and the results of reading that location cannot be cached or that multiple stores to that location cannot be suppressed.
trans-unit.target: 指定的位址是動態位址 （也就是可以從外部參考目前的執行緒） 和讀取無法快取位置，或該位置的多個存放區不隱藏的結果。

trans-unit.source: Marking an access as `volatile` affects only that single access; other accesses to the same location must be marked separately.
trans-unit.target: 標示為存取`volatile`會影響只有單一存取; 必須分別標示其他存取相同的位置。

trans-unit.source: Access to volatile locations need not be performed atomically.
trans-unit.target: 不需要以不可分割方式執行變動性的位置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Unaligned> and `volatile` prefixes can be combined in either order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Unaligned>和`volatile`可以按照任何順序結合前置詞。

trans-unit.source: They must immediately precede a `ldind`, `stind`, `ldfld`, `stfld`, `ldobj`, `stobj`, `initblk`, or `cpblk` instruction.
trans-unit.target: 它們必須緊接著`ldind`， `stind`， `ldfld`， `stfld`， `ldobj`， `stobj`， `initblk`，或`cpblk`指令。

trans-unit.source: Only the `volatile` prefix is allowed for the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Ldsfld> and <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Stsfld> instructions.
trans-unit.target: 只有`volatile`允許前置詞<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Ldsfld>和<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.Stsfld>指示。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `volatile` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`volatile`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

trans-unit.source: Computes the bitwise XOR of the top two values on the evaluation stack, pushing the result onto the evaluation stack.
trans-unit.target: 計算評估堆疊頂端兩個值的位元 XOR，將結果推送至評估堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary:
trans-unit.target: 下表列出指令的十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：

trans-unit.source: Format
trans-unit.target: 格式

trans-unit.source: Assembly Format
trans-unit.target: 組件格式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: xor
trans-unit.target: xor

trans-unit.source: Computes the bitwise XOR of two integer values and returns an integer.
trans-unit.target: 計算兩個整數值的位元 XOR 並傳回一個整數。

trans-unit.source: The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is:
trans-unit.target: 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序為：

trans-unit.source: `value1` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value1` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: `value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack and their bitwise XOR computed.
trans-unit.target: `value2` 和`value1`取出從堆疊，而且其位元 XOR 計算。

trans-unit.source: The bitwise XOR of `value2` and `value1` is pushed onto the stack.
trans-unit.target: 位元 XOR`value2`和`value1`推入至堆疊。

trans-unit.source: The `xor` instruction computes the bitwise XOR of the top two values on the stack and leaves the result on the stack.
trans-unit.target: `xor`指令會計算前兩個的位元 XOR 值在堆疊上，並將結果留在堆疊上。

trans-unit.source: `Xor` is an integer-specific operation.
trans-unit.target: `Xor` 是整數特定作業。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A> method overload can use the `xor` opcode:
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit%2A>方法多載，可以使用`xor`作業碼：

trans-unit.source: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
trans-unit.target: ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
